S06psp_5u:2: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sacet svapnāntaragato 'pi svapnopamāṃś caiva sarvadharmān vyavalokayati,
S06psp_5u:3: pratiśrutkopamān marīcyupamān pratibhāsopamān nirmitakopamān gandharvanagaropamāṃś ca sarvadharmān vyavalokayati na ca sākṣātkaroti,
S06psp_5u:4: idaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāvinivartanīyalakṣaṇaṃ veditavyam. iti prathamaṃ liṅgam
S06psp_5u:5: punar aparaṃ subhūte svapnāntaragato 'pi bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā traidhātuke vā na spṛhayati na cittam utpādayati nānuśaṃsayati,
S06psp_5u:6: idam api subhūte 'vinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāvinivartanīyalakṣaṇaṃ veditavyam. iti dvitīyam
S06psp_5u:7_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sacet svapnāntaragatas tathāgatam anekaśataparivāram
S06psp_5u:7_3: parivṛtaṃ puraskṛtaṃ tathāgatam arhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ dharmaṃ deśayantaṃ paśyati,
S06psp_5u:8: sa taṃ dharmaṃ śrutvā tasya dharmasyārtham ājanāti dharmānudharmapratipanno viharati samayapratipanno 'nudharmacārī,
S06psp_5u:9: idam api subhūte 'vinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāvinivartanīyalakṣaṇaṃ veditavyam. iti tṛtīyam
S06psp_5u:10_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ svapnāntaragataḥ sacet tathāgataṃ paśyed
S06psp_5u:10_1: vaihāyasam atyudgamya bhikṣusaṃghasya dharmaṃ deśayantaṃ dvātriṃśadbhir mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ
S06psp_5u:10_2: samalaṃkṛtaṃ vyāmaprabham ṛddhiprātihāryañ ca nidarśayantan nirmitāṃś ca nirmiṇvantan
S06psp_5u:10_3: tāṃś caiva nirmitān anyeṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhakṛtyaṃ kurvataḥ,
S06psp_5u:11: idam api subhūte 'vinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāvinivartanīyasya lakṣaṇaṃ veditavyam. iti caturtham
S06psp_5u:13: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ svapnāntaragato 'pi nottrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsam āpadyate grāmaghāte vartamāne nagaraghāte vartamāne 'gnidāhe vartamāne,
S06psp_5u:14_0: vyāḍamṛgān vā dṛṣṭvā tadanyān vā caṇḍamṛgajātīr dṛṣṭvā pipāsitān dṛṣṭvā bubhuksitān
S06psp_5u:14_1: dṛṣṭvā mātāpitṛmaraṇaṃ vā dṛṣṭvā bhrātṛbhaginīmaraṇaṃ vā dṛṣṭvā putraduhitṛmaraṇaṃ
S06psp_5u:14_2: vā dṛṣṭvā mitrāmātyajñātisālohitamaraṇaṃ vā dṛṣṭvā na śokabhayabhairavasaṃtrāsam utpādayati,
S06psp_5u:15: tataś ca svapnāt samanantaravibuddhasya samānasyaivaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_5u:17: mayāpy anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhya svapnopamaṃ sarvatraidhātukam iti dharmo deśayitavyaḥ,
S06psp_5u:18: idam api subhūte 'vinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāvinivartanīyalakṣaṇaṃ veditavyam. iti pañcamam
S06psp_5u:19_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte kathaṃ vijñāyate yathāvinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyānuttarāṃ
S06psp_5u:19_1: samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya tatra buddhakṣetre sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ
S06psp_5u:20: sacet subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ svapnāntaragato nārakaṃ vā sattvaṃ dṛṣṭvā tiryagyonigataṃ vā sattvaṃ dṛṣṭvā yāmalokikaṃ vā sattvaṃ dṛṣṭvā,
S06psp_5u:21: evaṃ smṛtiṃ pratilabhate yena smṛtilabdhasya caivaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_5u:22: tathā kariṣyāmi tathā pratipatsye yathā me tatra buddhakṣetre 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ trayo 'pāyā na bhaviṣyanti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:23: tathā hi yaś ca svapno yaś cāhaṃ sarva ime dharmā advayā advaidhīkārāḥ,
S06psp_5u:24: idam api subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāvinivartanīyalakṣaṇaṃ veditavyam. iti saṣṭham
S06psp_5u:25: punar aparaṃ subhūte 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsatttvaḥ svapnāntaragato vā prativibuddho vā nagaradāhe vartamāne,
S06psp_5u:27_0: yena mayā svapnāntaragatena vā prativibuddhena vā ya ākārā yāni liṅgāni yāni nimittāni
S06psp_5u:27_1: dṛṣṭāni yair ākārair yair liṅgair yair nimittaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo
S06psp_5u:28: yadi ta ākārās tāni liṅgāni tāni nimittāni mama saṃvidyante tair avaivartiko bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ satyādhiṣṭhānaṃ karoti, (PSP_5:3)
S06psp_5u:29_0: yena satyena satyavacanenāhaṃ vyākṛto 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau tena satyena satyavacanenāyaṃ
S06psp_5u:29_1: nagaradāha upaśāmyatu śītībhavatv astaṃ gacchatu. saced upaśāmyati śītībhavaty astaṃ
S06psp_5u:29_2: gacchati veditavyaṃ subhūte vyākṛto batāyaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhāv
S06psp_5u:29_3: avinivartanīyatāyai. sacet punaḥ subhūte agniskandho 'tikramitvā gṛhād gṛhaṃ dahati
S06psp_5u:29_4: rathyāyā rathyā dahaty anyad gṛhaṃ dahaty anyad gṛhaṃ na dahaty anyāṃ rathyāṃ dahaty
S06psp_5u:29_5: anyāṃ rathyāṃ na dahati veditavyaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena dharmaṃ pratyākhyānasaṃvartanīyam
S06psp_5u:29_6: etaiḥ sattvaiḥ karmopacitaṃ yenaiteṣāṃ sattvānām ekaṃ gṛhaṃ dahyate,
S06psp_5u:31: teṣām etad dṛṣṭadhārmikam eva karma vipacyate,
S06psp_5u:32: ayaṃ subhūte hetur ayaṃ pratyayo 'vinivartanīyānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ yair hetubhir yaiḥ pratyayair avinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ. iti saptamam
S06psp_5u:33_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte yair ākārair yair liṅgair yair nimittaiḥ samanvāgato 'vinivartanīyo
S06psp_5u:33_1: bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyas tān ākārāṃs tāni liṅgāni tāni nimittāni deśayiṣyāmi.
S06psp_5u:33_2: sacet subhūte kaścid eva strī vā puruṣo vāmanuṣyeṇādhiṣṭhito bhavet,
S06psp_5u:35: saced ahaṃ vyākṛtas tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye,
S06psp_5u:36: pariśuddhaś ca me 'dhyāśayo yathāham anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbodhukāmo yathāham anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsye,
S06psp_5u:38: apagataṃ me śrāvakacittam apagataṃ me pratyekabuddhacittam,
S06psp_5u:41_0: abhisaṃbhotsya evāham anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodiṃ ye 'pi te 'saṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu
S06psp_5u:41_1: buddhā bhagavantas tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti teṣāṃ tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ
S06psp_5u:41_2: nāsti kiṃcid adṛṣṭaṃ vāśrutaṃ vāviditaṃ vāsākṣātkṛtaṃ vānabhisaṃbuddhaṃ vā yathā
S06psp_5u:41_3: te buddhā bhagavantaḥ prajānanti paśyanti mamādhyāśayara iti hy anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim
S06psp_5u:41_4: abhisaṃbhotsya etena satyena satyavacanenāyaṃ strī vā puruṣo vā yenāmanuṣyeṇa gṛhīto
S06psp_5u:43_0: sacet punaḥ subhūte so 'manuṣyas tato nāpakrāmati tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyaivaṃ
S06psp_5u:43_1: bhāṣamāṇasya veditavyam etat subhūte nāyaṃ vyākṛto bodhisattvo mahāsattvas tair pūrvakais
S06psp_5u:44_0: sacet punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyaivaṃ bhāṣamāṇasya so 'manuṣyas tato
S06psp_5u:44_1: 'pakrāmati veditavyaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena vyākṛto 'yaṃ bodhisattvo
S06psp_5u:44_2: mahāsattvas taiḥ pūrvakais tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye.
S06psp_5u:44_3: ebhiḥ subhūte ākārair ebhir liṅgair ebhir nimittaiḥ samanvāgato 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo
S06psp_5u:45_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte 'vinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu
S06psp_5u:45_2: āryāṣṭāṅge ca mārge caturṣv āryasatyeṣu śūnyatānimittāpraṇihiteṣu bodhisattvaniyāmam
S06psp_5u:45_3: anavakrāntasya satyādhiṣṭhānena māraḥ pāpīyān upasaṃkramiṣyati saced bodhisattvasyaivaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_5u:47: tena satyena satyavacanenāyam amanuṣyabhūta ito 'pakrāmatv ity evaṃ satyādhiṣṭhānaṃ kariṣyati. tatra māraḥ pāpīyān autsukyam āpatsyate katham amanuṣya ito 'pakrāmed?
S06psp_5u:49: tathā hi māraḥ pāpīyān balavattaraṃ ca tejovattaraṃ ca tatrautsukyam āpatsyate katham ayam amanuṣya ito 'pakrāmed iti,
S06psp_5u:51: evaṃ ca tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bhaviṣyati,
S06psp_5u:53: na punar evaṃ jñāsyati mārānubhāvenaiṣo 'manuṣya ito 'pakrānta iti. sa tenānyān bodhisattvān mahāsattvān avamaṃsyate ullāpayiṣyaty uccagghayiṣyati paṃsayiṣyaty,
S06psp_5u:54_0: ahaṃ vyākṛto 'nuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye taiḥ pūrvakais tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair
S06psp_5u:54_1: ete punar anye na vyākṛtā anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye. sa tena tāvanmātrakeṇa māraṃ vivardhayiṣyati,
S06psp_5u:55: dūrīkariṣyati sarvākārajñatāṃ dūrīkariṣyaty anuttaraṃ buddhajñānam. sa tathārūpo bodhisattvo mahāsattvas tāvanmātrakeṇānupāyakuśalo (PSP_5:5)
S06psp_5u:56: 'bhimānam utpādayiṣyati, tasya dve bhūmi pratikāṅkṣitavye. katame dve?
S06psp_5u:57: yad uta śrāvakabhūmir vā pratyekabuddhabhūmir vā. evaṃ satyādhiṣṭhānena bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mārakarmotpatsyate,
S06psp_5u:58: tatra sa kalyāṇamitrāṇi na seviṣyate na bhajiṣyate na paryupāsiṣyate tad eva mārabandhanam āgāḍhīkariṣyati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:59: yathāpi nāma ṣaṭsu pāramitāsv acaritatvād upāyakauśalena vāparigṛhītatvād,
S06psp_5u:60: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena satyādhiṣṭhānena mārakarma veditavyam.
S06psp_5u:61: kathaṃ ca punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya ṣaṭsu pāramitāsv acaritāvino yāvad bodhisattvaniyāmam anavakrāntasya satyādhiṣṭhānena māraḥ pāpīyān upasaṃkramiṣyati?
S06psp_5u:62: iha subhūte māraḥ pāpīyān anyatareṇa veṣeṇopasaṃkramya bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam evaṃ vakṣyati:
S06psp_5u:63: vyākṛtas tvaṃ kulaputra tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhenānuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye,
S06psp_5u:67: idan te mātur nāmadheyam idan te putraduhitṛbhaginīnāmadheyam,
S06psp_5u:68: idan te mitrāmātyajñātisālohitānāṃ yāvad āsaptamamātāmahapitāmahayugasya nāmadheyam upadekṣyati,
S06psp_5u:69: āmuṣmāt tvaṃ janapadād āmuṣmāt tvaṃ nagarād amuṣmād diśas tvam āgato,
S06psp_5u:70: 'muṣmin janapade tvaṃ jāto 'musmiṃ grāme vā nagare vā. sacet prakṛtyā mṛduko bhaviṣyati sa tam evaṃ vakṣyati:
S06psp_5u:71: pūrvam api tvam evaṃ mṛduka evābhūḥ,
S06psp_5u:72: sacet sa tīkṣṇo bhaviṣyati sa tam evaṃ vakṣyati: pūrvam api tvam evaṃ tīkṣṇa evābhūḥ,
S06psp_5u:76: sacet khalupunaḥpaścādbhaktiko bhaviṣyati saced ekāśaniko bhaviṣyati sacet prasthavpiṇḍiko bhaviṣyati,
S06psp_5u:88: sa tam evaṃ vakṣyati: pūrvam api tvaṃ mandabhāṣya evābhūḥ,
S06psp_5u:90: pūrvam api tvaṃ mandamantra evābhūḥ. tat kasya (PSP_5:6)
S06psp_5u:92: tathā hi tavaivaṃrūpā dhūtaguṇāḥ saṃvidyante niścayena te pūrvam apy eta eva dhūtagunāḥ saṃlekhā abhūvan.
S06psp_5u:93: so 'nena ca pūrvakeṇa nāmāpadeśena gotrāpadeśena ca pratyutpannadhūtaguṇāpadeśena ca manyanām utpādayiṣyati. tam enaṃ māraḥ pāpīyān upasaṃkramyaivaṃ vakṣyati:
S06psp_5u:94: vyākṛtas tvaṃ kulaputra tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye 'vinivartanīyatāyāṃ yathā te dhūtaguṇāḥ saṃvidyante.
S06psp_5u:103: vyākṛtas tvaṃ kulaputra tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhenānuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:104: tathā hi tavāmī guṇāḥ saṃvidyante 'vinivartanīyānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām.
S06psp_5u:105_0: ye ca te mayā subhūte 'vinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya ākārā liṅgāni
S06psp_5u:105_1: nimittāny ākhyātās te tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya na saṃvidyante. veditavyaṃ
S06psp_5u:105_2: subhūte tadanyair bodhisattvair mahāsattvair mārādhiṣṭhito batāyaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:106_0: tathā hi ya ākārā yāni liṅgāni yāni nimittāny 'vinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya
S06psp_5u:106_1: te cāsya na saṃvidyante. anena ca nāmāpadeśena tad anyān bodhisattvān mahāsattvān
S06psp_5u:107: idam api subhūte nāmāpadeśena nāmādhiṣṭhānena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena mārakarma veditavyam.
S06psp_5u:108: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena nāmādhiṣṭhānena mārakarma veditavyam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:109: tathā hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caritaḥ sattvānāṃ nāma na jānāti,
S06psp_5u:112: vijñānaṃ na jānāti. tasya māraḥ pāpīyān nāmādhiṣṭhānena vyākariṣyati,
S06psp_5u:113: yāvat te 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasyedaṃ nāma bhaviṣyati,
S06psp_5u:114: yat tena nāmadheyam anuvitarkitaṃ bhaviṣyaty anuvicāritam. tatra duṣprajñājātīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyānupāyakuśalasyaivaṃ bhaviṣyati:
S06psp_5u:116: yac ca mayā nāmadheyaṃ manasānuvitarkitam anuvicāritam, (PSP_5:7)
S06psp_5u:117: idaṃ mamānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya nāmadheyaṃ bhaviṣyati. tathā tathā māraḥ pāpīyān nirdekṣyati mārakāyikā vā devatā mārādhiṣṭhito vā bhikṣus tasyaivaṃ bhaviṣyati:
S06psp_5u:120: yathā cānena bhikṣunā nirdiṣṭaṃ sameti nāma sameti me nāmnā vyākṛto 'haṃ tais tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye.
S06psp_5u:121: ye ca mayā subhūte 'vinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyākārā liṅgāni nimittāny ākhyātāni tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya na saṃvidyante,
S06psp_5u:125_0: sa tayā manyanayā abhimanyatayā dūrībhaviṣyaty anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodhes tasyopāyakauśalyavirahitasya
S06psp_5u:125_1: prajñā pāramitāvirahitasya kalyāṇamitravirahitasya pāpamitraparigṛhītasya dve bhūmī
S06psp_5u:125_2: pratikāṅksitavye yad uta śrāvakabhūmir vā pratyekabuddhabhūmir vā. atha vā ciraṃ
S06psp_5u:125_3: suciraṃ saṃdhāvya saṃsṛtyemām eva prajñāpāramitām āgamyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim
S06psp_5u:125_4: abhisaṃbhotsyate. sacet sa priyān bodhisattvān mahāsattvān na kalyāṇamitrāṇy abhīkṣṇaṃ
S06psp_5u:126: sacet tenaivātmabhāvapratilābhena tān pūrvakāṃś cittotpādān na vigarhiṣyati na pratideśayiṣyati tasya dve bhūmī pratikāṅkṣitavye yad uta śrāvakabhūmir vā pratyekabuddhabhūmir vā.
S06psp_5u:127_0: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte bhikṣuś catasṛṇāṃ mūlāpattīnām anyatarānyatarām āpattim āpadyābhikṣur
S06psp_5u:127_1: bhavaty aśramaṇo 'śākyaputrīyaḥ. so 'bhavyas tenaiva cātmabhāvena caturṇāṃ śrāmaṇyaphalānām
S06psp_5u:128: evam eva subhūte ayaṃ tato gurutaraś cittotpādo yo 'yaṃ nāmāpadeśena bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya manyanāsahagataś cittotpāda utpannas,
S06psp_5u:129: tena ca nāmāpadeśamātreṇānyān bodhisattvān mahāsattvān avamaṃsyate,
S06psp_5u:132: pañcabhyo 'pi subhūte ānantaryebhyaḥ karmabhyo gurutaro 'yaṃ cittotpādo yo 'yaṃ (PSP_5:8)
S06psp_5u:133: bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya nāmāpadeśena manyanāsahagataś cittotpāda utpannas,
S06psp_5u:134: tena ca nāmāpadeśamātreṇānyān bodhisattvān mahāsattvān avamaṃsyate,
S06psp_5u:135: ayaṃ tato gurutaraś cittotpādo veditavyaḥ. iti hi subhūte imāni tāni nāmāni nāmāpadeśenotpadyamānāni mārakarmāṇi sūkṣmāṇi bhavanti.
S06psp_5u:136: punar aparaṃ subhūte vivekaguṇena bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya māraḥ pāpīyān hy upasaṃkramiṣyaty upasaṃkramyaivaṃ vakṣyati:
S06psp_5u:137: vivekasya tathāgato varṇavādī. nāhaṃ subhūte evaṃ vivekaṃ vadāmi bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya yad utāraṇyāni vanaprasthāni prāntāni śayanāsanāni.
S06psp_5u:139: kataraḥ punar bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyānyo viveko yadi nāraṇyāni vanaprasthāni prāntāni śayanāsanāni?
S06psp_5u:140: kathaṃrūpo bhagavann anyo viveko bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya?
S06psp_5u:142: sacet subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śrāvakapratisaṃyuktair manasikārair vivikto bhavati,
S06psp_5u:146_0: yo 'yaṃ mayā subhūte viveko 'nujñāto bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya. anena ca vivekena
S06psp_5u:146_1: rātriṃdivaṃ viharati viviktaś caiva viharati bodhisattvo mahāsatvo yad uta bodhisattvavivekena
S06psp_5u:146_2: nāraṇyavanaprasthaprāntaśayanāsanair viharati vivikta eva viharati bodhisattvo mahāsattvo,
S06psp_5u:147: grāmānte 'pi vā viharann anena vivekena viviktaś caiva viharati bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ,
S06psp_5u:148: yaś ca mayā subhūte viveko 'nujñāto bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya.
S06psp_5u:149: yañ ca punaḥ sa māraḥ pāpīyān vivekam upadekṣyaty araṇyavanaprasthaprāntaśayanāsanair viharati,
S06psp_5u:150_0: sa tena vivekena saṃkīrṇaś caiva samānaḥ śrāvakapratisaṃyuktair manasikāraiḥ viharati
S06psp_5u:150_2: sarvākārajñatāṃ na paripūrayati. evaṃ so 'nena vihāreṇa viharann apariśuddhadharmamanasikāraś
S06psp_5u:150_3: caiva samānas tadanyān api bodhisattvān mahāsattvān avamaṃsyate ye te grāmānte viharanti
S06psp_5u:152: atha ca punaḥ so 'nupāyakuśalo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ,
S06psp_5u:153_0: kiṃ cāpi yojanaśatikeṣv aṭavīkāntāreṣv apagatavyādamṛgapakṣiṣv apagatacaurakāntāreṣv
S06psp_5u:153_1: apagatabhṛśaparṇarākṣasānuvicariteṣu tatra madhye vā saṃkalpayed varṣaṃ vā varṣaśataṃ
S06psp_5u:153_2: vā varṣasahasraṃ vā varṣaśatasahasraṃ vā varṣakoṭīśataṃ vā varṣakoṭīsahasraṃ vā varṣakoṭīśatasahasraṃ vā tato vā uttari,
S06psp_5u:154: imaṃ ca vivekan na jānāti yena vivekena bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'dhyāśayasaṃprasthito viharati,
S06psp_5u:155: saṃkīrṇaś caiva viharati bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ saṃkliṣṭaś caiva tatra viveke niśrita ālīno 'dhyavasito na me sa tāvanmātrakeṇa cittam abhirādhayati,
S06psp_5u:156: yaś ca mayā viveka ākhyātas tasmin viveke na saṃdṛśyate.
S06psp_5u:157: tam enaṃ māraḥ pāpīyān upasaṃkramyopary antarīkṣe sthitvaivaṃ vadati:
S06psp_5u:158_0: sādhu sādhu kulaputra eṣa vivekas tathāgatenākhyāto yena viharasy evaṃ tvaṃ kṣipram
S06psp_5u:158_1: anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyase. sa tato vivekāt punar anyān vivekān avamanyamānas
S06psp_5u:158_2: tadanyān bodhisattvayānikān bhikṣūn peśalān kalyāṇadharmano 'vamaṃsyate saṃkīrṇavihāreṇa
S06psp_5u:158_3: bateme viharanty āyuṣmanta iti. ye ca viviktavihāreṇa viharanti bodhisattvā mahāsattvās
S06psp_5u:159: ye ca saṃkīrṇavihāreṇa viharanti tān viviktavihāreṇa samudācariṣyati tatra ca gauravam utpādayiṣyati,
S06psp_5u:160: yatra ca gauravam utpādayitavyaṃ tatra mānam utpādayiṣyati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:165: ayaṃ bodhisattvas tadanyān bodhisattvayānikān kulaputrān paṃsayiṣyaty avamaṃsyate ullāpayiṣyati kutsayiṣyati.
S06psp_5u:172: tajjātikaḥ pudgalo na sevitavyo na bhaktavyo na paryupāsitavyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:173: ādhimānikā hi subhūte tathārūpāḥ pudgalā veditavyāḥ. ity aṣṭamam
S06psp_5u:175: yasya khalu punar bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāparityaktā sarvākārajñatā,
S06psp_5u:176: aparityaktā anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhis tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvenādhyāśayenānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhukāmena,
S06psp_5u:177_0: sarvasattvānām arthaṃ kartukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena tajjātīyaḥ pudgalo na
S06psp_5u:177_1: sevitavyo na bhaktavyo na paryupāsitavyaḥ. api tu khalu svakāryayogam anuyuktena
S06psp_5u:177_3: tatra caiva maitry utpādayitavyā tatra caivānukampākaruṇotpādayitavyā muditotpādayitavyā upekṣotpādayitavyā,
S06psp_5u:178: tathā ca kariṣyāmi yathaite mama doṣāḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ na bhaviṣyanti notpatsyante,
S06psp_5u:179: saced utpatsyante kṣipram eva prahāsyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā. ayaṃ subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ svayamabhijñāya parākramo veditavyaḥ.
S06psp_5u:180: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvenādhyāśayenānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhukāmena kalyāṇamitrāṇi sevitavyāni bhaktavyāni paryupāsitavyāni.
S06psp_5u:181: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:182: kāni punar bhagavan bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ kalyāṇamitrāṇi veditavyāni?
S06psp_5u:183: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:184: buddhā bhagavantaḥ subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ kalyāṇamitrāṇi veditavyāni,
S06psp_5u:185: bodhisattvā mahāsattvāś ca subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ kalyāṇamitrāṇi veditavyāni,
S06psp_5u:186: śrāvakā api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ kalyāṇamitrāṇi veditavyāni.
S06psp_5u:187: ye ca ṣaṭ pāramitā ākhyāsyanti deśayiṣyanti prajñapayiṣyanti prasthāpayiṣyanti vivariṣyanti vibhajiṣyanti uttānīkariṣyanti saṃprakāśayiṣyanti,
S06psp_5u:188: ime 'pi subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ kalyāṇamitrāṇi veditavyāni. ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ kalyāṇamitrāṇi veditavyāni,
S06psp_5u:189_2: daśa balāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā
S06psp_5u:189_4: bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ kalyāṇamitrāṇi veditavyāni. ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ śāstāro veditavyāḥ
S06psp_5u:189_5: ṣaṭ pāramitā mārgaḥ ṣaṭ pāramitā ālokaḥ ṣaṭ pāramitā (PSP_5:11)
S06psp_5u:190_0: ulkā ṣaṭ pāramitā avabhāsaḥ ṣaṭ pāramitā bhūmiḥ ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ śaraṇaṃ ṣaṭ pāramitā
S06psp_5u:190_1: layanaṃ ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ parāyaṇaṃ ṣaṭ pāramitā mātā ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ pitā. catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni
S06psp_5u:190_4: catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ sarvākārajñatāyai
S06psp_5u:190_5: yāvat sarvavāsanānusaṃdhikleśaprahāṇāya saṃvartante. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:191_0: tathā hi subhūte ye 'pi te 'bhūvann atīte 'dhvani tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās
S06psp_5u:191_1: teṣām api buddhānāṃ bhagavatām ime caiva saptatriṃśad bodhipakṣyā dharmā mātāpitarāv
S06psp_5u:191_2: abhūtām. ye 'pi te subhūte bhaviṣyanty anāgate 'dhvani tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās
S06psp_5u:191_3: teṣām api buddhānāṃ bhagavatām ime caiva saptatriṃśad bodhipakṣyā dharmā mātāpitarau
S06psp_5u:191_4: bhaviṣyataḥ. ye 'pi te subhūte etarhi daśa diśi loke buddhā bhagavantas tiṣṭhanti
S06psp_5u:191_5: dhriyante yāpayanti dharmañ ca deśayanti teṣām api subhūte buddhānāṃ bhagavatām ime
S06psp_5u:191_6: caiva saptatriṃśad bodhipakṣyā dharmā mātāpitarau bhavataḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:192_0: tathā hi subhūte 'to nirjātā hy atītānāgatapratyutpannā buddhā bhagavantaḥ tasmāt
S06psp_5u:192_1: tarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvenānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhukāmenāparapraṇeyatāṃ
S06psp_5u:192_2: gantukāmenāparapraṇeyatāyāṃ sthātukāmena sarvasattvānāṃ saṃśayāṃś chrotukāmena buddhakṣetraṃ
S06psp_5u:192_3: pariśodhayitukāmena sarvasattvān paripācayitukāmena caturbhiḥ saṃgrahavastubhiḥ sattvāḥ
S06psp_5u:193: dānena priyavadyatayārthakriyayā samānārthatayā. idam apy ahaṃ subhūte 'rthavaśaṃ paśyann evaṃ vadāmi:
S06psp_5u:194: ete bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ śāstāro mātāpitarau layanaṃ trāṇaṃ dvīpaḥ śaraṇaṃ yad utema eva saptatriṃśad bodhipakṣyā dharmāḥ. iti navamam
S06psp_5u:195_0: tasmāt tarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvenāparapraṇeyatāṃ gantukāmenāparapraṇeyatāyāṃ
S06psp_5u:195_1: sthātukāmena sarvasattvānāṃ saṃśayāṃś chrotukāmena buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhayitukāmena
S06psp_5u:195_2: sarvasattvān paripācayitukāmena ihaiva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:196: atra hi prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sarvadharmā vistareṇopadiṣṭā yatra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śikṣitavyam. iti daśamam
S06psp_5u:197: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat: kiṃlakṣaṇā (PSP_5:12) bhagavan prajñāpāramitā?
S06psp_5u:199: asaṅgalakṣaṇā subhūte prajñāpāramitā na subhūte prajñāpāramitā lakṣaṇan na prajñāpāramitāyāḥ kiñcil lakṣaṇam.
S06psp_5u:201: syād bhagavan paryāyo yena lakṣaṇena prajñāpāramitā saṃvidyate tenaiva lakṣaṇena sarvadharmāḥ saṃvidyeran.
S06psp_5u:203: evam etad yena lakṣaṇena subhūte prajñāpāramitā saṃvidyate tenaiva lakṣaṇena sarvadharmāḥ saṃvidyante. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:204: sarvadharmā hi subhūte viviktā asvabhāvāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāḥ,
S06psp_5u:205: anena subhūte paryāyeṇa yena lakṣaṇena prajñāpāramitā saṃvidyate tenaiva lakṣaṇena sarvadharmāḥ saṃvidyante yad uta viviktalakṣaṇena śūnyatālakṣaṇena.
S06psp_5u:206: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:207: yadi bhagavan sarvadharmāḥ sarvadharmaviviktāḥ sarvadharmāḥ sarvadharmaiḥ śūnyās,
S06psp_5u:208: tat kathaṃ bhagavan sattvānāṃ saṃkleśaṃ vyavadānaṃ prajñāyate?
S06psp_5u:209: na bhagavan viviktaṃ vā śūnyatā vā saṃkliśyate vā vyavadāyate vā,
S06psp_5u:210: na viviktaṃ vā śūnyatā vānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate,
S06psp_5u:211: na vivikte vā śūnyatāyāṃ vā kaścid dharma upalabhyate,
S06psp_5u:212: yo bodhim abhisaṃbudhyetāsya caivaṃ bhagavan bhagavato bhāṣitasya katham arthaṃ jānīyām? iti.
S06psp_5u:213: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat: tat kiṃ manyase?
S06psp_5u:214: subhūte, api nu dīrgharātram ime sattvā ahaṃkāramamakāre caranti.
S06psp_5u:215: subhūtir āha: evam etad bhagavann evam etat sugata,
S06psp_5u:218: subhūte, api tv ahaṃkāramamakārau viviktāv api tv ahaṃkāramamakārau śūnyau.
S06psp_5u:219: subhūtir āha: vivikto bhagavan śūnyaḥ sugata.
S06psp_5u:220: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase? subhūte, ahaṃkāramamakāreṇa sattvāḥ saṃsāre saṃdhāvanti saṃsaranti.
S06psp_5u:221: subhūtir āha: evam etad bhagavann evam etat sugata,
S06psp_5u:222: ahaṃkāramamakāreṇa bhagavan sattvāḥ saṃsāre saṃdhāvanti saṃsaranti.
S06psp_5u:223: bhagavān āha: evaṃ khalu subhūte sattvānāṃ saṃkleśaḥ prajñāyate saṃsāre saṃdhāvatāṃ saṃsaratāṃ,
S06psp_5u:224: yatra subhūte nāhaṃkāro na mamakāras tatra nodgraho 'nena te sattvāḥ saṃsāre na saṃdhāvanti na saṃsaranti.
S06psp_5u:226: evaṃ khalu subhūte sattvānāṃ vyavadānaṃ prajñāyate saṃsāre na saṃdhāvatāṃ na saṃsaratām,
S06psp_5u:227: api tu khalu punar na kaścit tatra saṃkliśyate vā vyavadāyate vā,
S06psp_5u:228: evaṃ khalu subhūte saṃkleśo vyavadānañ ca prajñāyate. ity ekādaśam
S06psp_5u:229: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:230: evaṃ caran bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na rūpe carati,
S06psp_5u:231: na vedanāyāṃ na saṃjñāyāṃ na saṃskāreṣu,
S06psp_5u:233_0: na skandheṣu carati na dhātuṣu carati nāyataneṣu carati na pratītyasamutpāde carati
S06psp_5u:233_1: na pratītyasamutpādāṅgesu carati na smṛtyupasthāneṣu carati na samyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgeṣu
S06psp_5u:233_2: na mārgeṣu carati nāryasatyeṣu nāpramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattiṣu carati na sarvavimokṣasamādhisamāpattidhāraṇīmukheṣu
S06psp_5u:233_3: carati na śūnyatānimittāpraṇihiteṣu carati na pañcasv abhijñāsu carati na balavaiśāradyeṣu
S06psp_5u:233_4: carati na pratisaṃvitsu carati nāveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu carati na sarvākārajñatāyāṃ
S06psp_5u:234: tathā hi te dharmā nopalabhyante yo vā careta yena vā careta yatra vā careta,
S06psp_5u:235_0: evaṃ caran bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nabhibhavanīyo bhavati sadevamānuṣāsureṇa
S06psp_5u:235_1: lokena. evañ caran punar bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhair
S06psp_5u:236: tathā hi so 'nabhibhūte sthāne sthito yad uta bodhisattvaniyāme 'nabhibhūto hi bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatāmanasikārair viharann,
S06psp_5u:237: evañ caran punar bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatāyā abhyāśībhavati. iti dvādaśam ity uktaṃ liṅgam
S06psp_5u:239_0: subhūte ye jāmbūdvīpakāḥ sattvās te sarvamānuṣyakam ātmabhāvaṃ pratilabheran pratilabhyānuttarāṃ
S06psp_5u:239_1: samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhyeraṃs tān kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā yāvajjīvaṃ
S06psp_5u:240: tac ca kuśalamūlam anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye parināmayet. tat kiṃ manyase?
S06psp_5u:241: subhūte, api nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahupuṇyaṃ prasavet.
S06psp_5u:242: subhūtir āha: bahu bhagavan bahu sugata.
S06psp_5u:243: bhagavān āha: ataḥ sa subhūte kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ (PSP_5:14)
S06psp_5u:245_0: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pareṣām ākhyāyed deśayet prajñapayet prasthāpayed vivṛṇuyād
S06psp_5u:245_1: vibhajed vibhāvayeta uttānīkuryāt saṃprakāśayet prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair vihared,
S06psp_5u:246: evaṃ yāvantas trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvās te sarve 'pūrvācaramaṃ mānuṣyakam ātmabhāvaṃ pratilabheraṃs,
S06psp_5u:247: tān kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpayec,
S06psp_5u:248_0: caturṣu dhyāneṣu caturṣv apramāṇeṣu catasṛṣv ārūpyasamāpattiṣu srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpayet
S06psp_5u:248_2: anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayet tac ca kuśalamūlam anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye
S06psp_5u:249: subhūte, api nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahupuṇyaṃ prasavet.
S06psp_5u:250: subhūtir āha: bahu bhagavan bahu sugata.
S06psp_5u:251: bhagavān āha: ataḥ sa subhūte kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet,
S06psp_5u:252_0: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pareṣām ākhyāyed deśayet prajñapayet prasthāpayed vivṛṇuyād
S06psp_5u:252_1: vibhajed vibhāvayeta uttānīkuryāt saṃprakāśayet sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair vihared,
S06psp_5u:253: evaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvasattvānāṃ dakṣiṇīyatāṃ gacchati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:254: tathā hi na kasyacit sattvasya tādṛśo vihāro yathā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sthāpayitvā tathāgatam arhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddham. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:255: tathā hi te kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranto mahāmaitrīm abhinirharanti,
S06psp_5u:256: te prajñāpāramitāyāñ carantaḥ sarvasattvān vadhyagatān samanupaśyanti te mahākaruṇāṃ pratilabhante,
S06psp_5u:257: te tena vihāreṇa viharanto muditayā pramodante te mahāmuditām abhinirharanti,
S06psp_5u:258: te tena nimittena sārdhaṃ na saṃvasanti te mahopekṣāṃ pratilabhante,
S06psp_5u:259_0: ayaṃ subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mahān prajñāloko yad uta prajñāpāramitā
S06psp_5u:259_1: dhyānapāramitā vīryapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā śīlapāramitā dānapāramitālokaḥ. anabhisaṃbuddhā
S06psp_5u:259_2: api te kulaputrā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ dakṣiṇīyatāṃ gacchanti,
S06psp_5u:260: na ca vivartante 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodher yeṣāñ ca paribhuñjate (PSP_5:15)
S06psp_5u:262_0: pratisaṃyuktair manasikārair viharanto dāyakadānapatīnāṃ dakṣiṇāṃ śodhayanti sarvākārajñatāyāś
S06psp_5u:262_1: cābhyāśībhavanti. tasmāt tarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvenāmogharāṣṭrapiṇḍaṃ paribhoktukāmena,
S06psp_5u:266_0: sarvasattvānām anuttaraṃ prajñācakṣur viśodhayitukāmena prajñāpāramitā pratisaṃyuktair
S06psp_5u:266_1: manasikārair vihartavyam. saced bodhisattvo mahāsattva etān prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktān
S06psp_5u:267: tena prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktā caiva kathā kathayitavyā. iti prathamā vivṛddhiḥ
S06psp_5u:268: tena prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāṃ kathāṃ kathayitvā prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāś caiva manasikārā manasikartavyās,
S06psp_5u:269: tena prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktair mānasikārair viharatānyeṣāṃ manasikārāṇām avakāśo na dātavyas,
S06psp_5u:270: tathā ca kartavyaṃ yathā taiḥ prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair anikṣiptadhuro rātriṃdivaṃ viharet,
S06psp_5u:271: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte puruṣeṇa maṇiratnam apratilabdhapūrvaṃ syāt so 'pareṇa samayena pratilabhet,
S06psp_5u:272: sa tat maṇiratnaṃ pratilabhyodāreṇa prītiprāmodyena samanvāgato bhavet,
S06psp_5u:273: tasya saha pratilabdhantaṃ maṇiratnaṃ punar eva naśyet sa tatonidānaṃ mahatā duḥkhadaurmanasyena saṃyukto bhavet,
S06psp_5u:274: tasya satatasamitaṃ maṇiratnaṃ pratisaṃyuktā eva manasikārāḥ pravarteran,
S06psp_5u:275: aho batāhaṃ tena maṇiratnena viyukta iti. evaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ratnam idam iti sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair avirahitena bhavitavyam.
S06psp_5u:276: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:277: yadā punar bhagavan sarvamanasikārāḥ svabhāvena virahitāḥ,
S06psp_5u:279: tadā kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair avirahito bhavati?
S06psp_5u:280: na hy avirahito 'pi bodhisattvo mahāsattva upalabhyate manasikārā vā sarvākārajñatā vā.
S06psp_5u:281: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:282: sacet subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ jānāti,
S06psp_5u:283: virahitāḥ sarvadharmāḥ svabhāvena te na śrāvakair na pratyekabuddhair na buddhair bhagavadbhiḥ kṛtāḥ,
S06psp_5u:284: sthitāś caivaiteṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ dharmasthititā dharmaniyāmatā dharmatā dharmadhātus (PSP_5:16)
S06psp_5u:286: avirahito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitayā bhavati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:287: tathā hi subhūte prajñāpāramitā svabhāvena viviktā svabhāvena śūnyā,
S06psp_5u:288: sā nāpi vivardhate nāpi parihīyate. iti dvitīyā
S06psp_5u:289: subhūtir āha: saced bhagavan prajñāpāramitā svabhāvena viviktā svabhāvena sūnyā,
S06psp_5u:290: tat kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate?
S06psp_5u:292: na subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran vivardhate vā parihīyate vā,
S06psp_5u:293: na bhūtakoṭī vivardhate vā parihīyate vā,
S06psp_5u:294: na dharmadhātur vivardhate vā parihīyate vā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:295: na hi prajñāpāramitā ekā vā dve vā. sacet subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyaivaṃ bhāṣyamāṇe cittaṃ nāvalīyate na saṃlīyate nottrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsam āpadyate,
S06psp_5u:299: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:300: kiṃ punar bhagavan yā prajñāpāramitāyāḥ śūnyatā riktatā tucchatā vaśikatā asārakatā sā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati?
S06psp_5u:303: kiṃ punar bhagavann anyatra prajñāpāramitāyāḥ kaścid dharma upalabhyate yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati?
S06psp_5u:305: subhūtir āha: kiṃ punar bhagavan prajñāpāramitā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati?
S06psp_5u:307: subhūtir āha: kiṃ punar bhagavan śūnyatā prajñapāramitāyāṃ carati?
S06psp_5u:310: kiṃ punar bhagavann anyatra śūnyatāyāḥ kaścid dharma upalabhyate yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati?
S06psp_5u:312: subhūtir āha: kiṃ punar bhagavan rūpaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati,
S06psp_5u:318: kiṃ punar bhagavan skandhadhātava āyatanāni pratītyasamutpādaḥ pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni ca prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranti?
S06psp_5u:320: subhūtir āha: kiṃ punar bhagavan ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranti?
S06psp_5u:321_0: evaṃ sarvaśūnyatāḥ saptatriṃśad bodhipakṣyā dharmā āryasatyāny apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattayaḥ
S06psp_5u:321_2: catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭadaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranti?
S06psp_5u:323: subhūtir āha: kiṃ punar bhagavan yā rūpasya śūnyatā riktatā tucchatā vaśikatā asārakatā,
S06psp_5u:324: tathatā avitathatā ananyatathatā dharmatā dharmadhātur dharmasthititā dharmaniyāmatā bhūtakoṭī sā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranti?
S06psp_5u:327: kiṃ punar bhagavan yā vijñānasya śūnyatā riktatā tucchatā vaśikatā asārakatā,
S06psp_5u:328: tathatā avitathatā ananyatathatā dharmatā dharmadhātur dharmasthititā dharmaniyāmatā bhūtakoṭiḥ sā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati?
S06psp_5u:331_0: kiṃ punar bhagavan yā skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādasya pratītyasamutpādāṅgānāñ
S06psp_5u:331_1: ca śūnyatā riktatā tucchatā vaśikatā asārakatā tathatā avitathatā ananyatathatā dharmatā
S06psp_5u:331_2: dharmadhātur dharmasthititā dharmaniyāmatā bhūtakoṭī sā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati?
S06psp_5u:334_0: kiṃ punar bhagavann anyā ṣaṇṇāṃ pāramitānāṃ śūnyatā saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyāṇāṃ dharmāṇām
S06psp_5u:334_2: śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitānāṃ pañcānām abhijñānāṃ daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānāṃ caturṇāṃ
S06psp_5u:335: buddhadharmāṇāṃ ca śūnyatā riktatā tucchatā vaśikatā asārakatā,
S06psp_5u:336: tathatā avitathatā ananyatathatā dharmatā dharmadhātur dharmasthititā dharmaniyāmatā bhūtakoṭiḥ sā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati?
S06psp_5u:338: subhūtir āha: sacet punar bhagavann ete dharmā na caranti prajñāpāramitāyāṃ,
S06psp_5u:339: kathaṃ carantaḥ punar bhagavan bodhisattvā mahāsattvāś caranti prajñāpāramitāyām?
S06psp_5u:341: subhūte samanupaśyasi tvaṃ taṃ dharmaṃ yo dharmaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāñ carati.
S06psp_5u:344: subhūte samanupaśyasi tvaṃ tāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ yatra bodhisattvā mahāsattvāś caranti.
S06psp_5u:347: subhūte yat tvaṃ dharmaṃ na samanupaśyasi kaścit sa dharma upalabhyate.
S06psp_5u:349: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase? subhūte yo dharmo nopalabhyate, api nu sa utpadyate vā nirudhyate vā.
S06psp_5u:351: bhagavān āha: iyaṃ subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām anutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntir,
S06psp_5u:352: evaṃrūpayā subhūte kṣāntyā samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vyākriyate 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
S06psp_5u:353_0: iyaṃ subhūte tathāgatasya vaiśāradyapratisaṃvit yāṃ pratisaṃvidyamāno bodhisattvo
S06psp_5u:353_1: mahāsattva evaṃ caran ghaṭamāno vyāyacchamāno 'nuttaraṃ samyaksaṃbodhijñānaṃ mahājñānaṃ
S06psp_5u:353_2: sarvākārajñatājñānaṃ nānuprāpnuyād iti nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:354: tathā hi tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvenānutpattikair dharmaiḥ kṣāntiḥ pratilabdhā tathā hi tan nimno bhaviṣyati yāvad anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate. iti tṛtīyā
S06psp_5u:355: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:356: kiṃ punar bhagavan sarvadharmāṇām anutpattaye vyākariṣyate bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau?
S06psp_5u:360: kiṃ punar bhagavann utpattaye bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vyākariṣyate anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau?
S06psp_5u:363: saced bhagavan nānutpattaye naivotpattaye bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vyākariṣyate 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
S06psp_5u:364: tat kathaṃ bhagavan vyākaraṇaṃ bhavati bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau?
S06psp_5u:365: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat: tat kiṃ manyase?
S06psp_5u:366: subhūte samanupaśyasi tvaṃ taṃ dharmaṃ yo vyākṛto 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau.
S06psp_5u:368: na bhagavan. nāhaṃ bhagavaṃs taṃ dharmaṃ samanupaśyāmi yo dharmo vyākṛto 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
S06psp_5u:369: tam apy ahaṃ dharman na samanupaśyāmi yo dharmo 'bhisaṃbudhyeta yena vābhisaṃbudhyate.
S06psp_5u:370: bhagavān āha: evam etat subhūte evam etat,
S06psp_5u:371: sarvadharmān anupalabhamānasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya naivaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_5u:372: aham abhisaṃbhotsya idam abhisaṃbhotsye. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:373: tathā hi subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ sarvā ete vikalpā na bhavanti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:374: avikalpā hi subhūte prajñāpāramitā. iti caturthī
S06psp_5u:375: atha khalu śakro devānām indro bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:376: gambhīreyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā durdṛśā duranubodhātarkāvacanā yāvat sūkṣṃā nipuṇā bhagavan prajñāpāramitātyantaviviktatvād,
S06psp_5u:377: na te bhagavan sattvā avarakeṇa kuśalamūlena samanvāgatā bhaviṣyanti,
S06psp_5u:378: ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti tathatvāya ca pratipatsyante,
S06psp_5u:379: na cānyeṣāṃ cittacaitasikānāṃ dharmāṇām avakāśaṃ dāsyanti yāvad anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyante.
S06psp_5u:380: bhagavān āha: evam etat kauśikaivam etat,
S06psp_5u:381: na te kauśika sattvā avarakeṇa kuśalamūlena samanvāgatā bhaviṣyanti,
S06psp_5u:382: ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti tahatvāya ca pratipatsyante,
S06psp_5u:383: na cānyeṣāṃ cittacaitasikānāṃ dharmāṇām avakāśaṃ dāsyanti yāvad anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyante. tat kiṃ manyase?
S06psp_5u:384: kauśika yāvanto jāṃbudvīpakāḥ sattvās te sarve daśabhiḥ (PSP_5:20)
S06psp_5u:385: kuśalaiḥ karmapathaiḥ samanvāgatā bhaveyuś caturbhir dhyānaiś caturbhir apramāṇaiś catasṛbhir ārūpyasamāpattibhiḥ pañcabhir abhijñābhir,
S06psp_5u:386: yaś ca kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhṇīyād dhārayed vācayet paryavāpnuyāt tathatvāya pratipadyeta,
S06psp_5u:387_0: asya kauśika kuśalamūlasya eṣa pūrvakaḥ kuśalamūlābhisaṃskāraḥ śatatamīm api kalāṃ
S06psp_5u:387_1: nopaiti sahasratamīm api śatasahasratamīm api koṭītamīm api koṭīśatatamīm api koṭīsahasratamīm
S06psp_5u:387_2: api koṭīśatasahasratamīm api koṭīniyataśatasahasratamīm api saṃkhyām api kalām api
S06psp_5u:387_3: gaṇanām apy upamām apy aupamyam apy upaniṣām apy upaniṣadam api nopaiti.
S06psp_5u:388: atha khalv anyataro bhikṣuḥ śakraṃ devānām indraṃ etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:389_0: abhibhūtas tvaṃ kauśika tena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā te ca jāṃbūdvīpakāḥ sattvāḥ
S06psp_5u:390_0: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitām anikṣiptacittenodgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati
S06psp_5u:390_1: tathatvāya ca pratipatsyate anyeṣāñ ca cittacaitasikānāṃ dharmāṇām avakāśaṃ na dāsyati
S06psp_5u:391: evam ukte śakro devānām indras taṃ bhikṣum etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:392_0: ekacittotpādenaivāhaṃ bhikṣo tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena te ca jāmbūdvīpakāḥ
S06psp_5u:393: kaḥ punar vādo ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti tathatvāya pratipatsyante,
S06psp_5u:394_0: te sadevamānuṣāsuralokam abhibhūya niryāsyanti sadevamānuṣāsuralokam abhibhavanto
S06psp_5u:394_1: gacchanti bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ. na kevalaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuralokam abhibhavanto
S06psp_5u:395_0: ye 'pi te srotaāpannāḥ sakṛdāgāmino 'nāgāmino 'rhantaḥ pratyekabuddhās tān api sarvān
S06psp_5u:395_1: abhibhavanto gacchanti bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ. na kevalaṃ srotaāpannān sakṛdāgāmino
S06psp_5u:396: ye 'pi te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā dānapāramitāyāñ caranti upāyakauśalyavirahitāḥ prajñāpāramitāvirahitās tān apy abhibhavanto gacchanti bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ. (PSP_5:21)
S06psp_5u:398_0: ye 'pi te śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāñ caranti
S06psp_5u:398_1: upāyakauśalyavirahitāḥ prajñāpāramitāvirahitās tān apy abhibhavanto gacchanti bodhisattvā
S06psp_5u:398_2: mahāsattvāḥ. na kevalaṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ caranti,
S06psp_5u:399_0: ye 'pi te prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranty upāyakauśalyavirahitāḥ prajñāpāramitāvirahitās
S06psp_5u:399_1: tān apy abhibhavanto gacchanti bodhiasattvā mahāsattvāḥ. ye bodhisattvā mahāsattvā
S06psp_5u:399_2: yathopadiṣṭāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranti te sadevamānuṣāsureṇa lokena na śakyā abhibhavituṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ,
S06psp_5u:400: yaś carati bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yathānuśiṣṭaṃ prajñāpāramitām anuvartate,
S06psp_5u:403: ayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ pratipadyamāno na virāgayati bodhimaṇḍam,
S06psp_5u:404: ayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sattvān saṃsīdayamānān uddhartukāmo,
S06psp_5u:405: 'yaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvaśikṣāyāṃ śikṣate na śrāvakaśikṣāyāṃ śikṣate na pratyekabuddhaśikṣāyāṃ śikṣate. iti paṅcamī
S06psp_5u:406: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ catvāro mahārājās tam upasaṃkramitavyaṃ maṃsyante,
S06psp_5u:408_0: śīghraṃ śikṣasva imāni tāni catvāri pātrāṇi yāni tvayā pratigrahītavyāni bodhimaṇḍaniṣaṇṇenānuttarāṃ
S06psp_5u:408_1: samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhena yāni parigṛhītāni pūrvakais tathāgateair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaiḥ.
S06psp_5u:409: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ tam upasaṃkramitavyaṃ maṃsyante,
S06psp_5u:410: sārdhaṃ devais trayastriṃśaiḥ suyāmaś ca devaputra upasaṃkramyamitavyaṃ maṃsyate,
S06psp_5u:411: sārdhaṃ suyāmair devaputraiḥ saṃtuṣito 'pi devaputra upasaṃkramitavyaṃ maṃsyate,
S06psp_5u:412: sārdhaṃ saṃtuṣitair devaputrair nirmāṇaratiś ca devaputra upasaṃkramitavyaṃ maṃsyate,
S06psp_5u:413: sārdhaṃ nirmāṇaratibhir devaputraiḥ paranirmitavaśavarty api devaputra upasaṃkramitavyaṃ maṃsyate sārdhaṃ paranirmitavaśavartibhir devaputrair upasaṃkramitavyaṃ maṃsyate,
S06psp_5u:416: mahābrahmaiḥ ābhāsvaro 'pi devaputra upasaṃkramitavyaṃ maṃsyate sārdhaṃ ābhāsvarair devaputrair upasaṃkramitavyaṃ maṃsyate,
S06psp_5u:420: asaṃjñisattvāḥ śuddhāvāsā aspṛhā atapāḥ sudṛśāḥ sudarśanā yāvad akaniṣṭhā devaputrā upasaṃkramitavyaṃ maṃsyante.
S06psp_5u:421: yo bodhisattvo mahāsattva iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ cariṣyati,
S06psp_5u:422: tathāgatair api so 'rhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair bodhisattvo mahāsattvo nityaṃ samanvāhṛto bhaviṣyati,
S06psp_5u:424_0: evaṃ yaś carati bodhisattvo mahāsattvo iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yāni tāni
S06psp_5u:424_1: laukikāni duḥkhāni paropakramikāni kāye utpatsyante tāni tasya sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā
S06psp_5u:424_2: sarvaṃ kāye notpatsyante na nipatiṣyanti. ayaṃ subhūte dṛṣṭadhārmiko guṇo bhaviṣyati
S06psp_5u:424_3: bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato yāni vā tāni
S06psp_5u:425: tadyathāpi nāma cakṣurogaḥ śrotrarogo ghrāṇarogo jihvārogo dantarogaḥ kāyaśūlaṃ cittasūlam,
S06psp_5u:426_0: evam aśītirogaśatāni caturadhikāni sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ kāye notpatsyante
S06psp_5u:426_1: na nipatiṣyanti. ayaṃ tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dṛṣṭadhārmiko guṇaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavya
S06psp_5u:426_2: iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ. iti ṣaṣṭhī
S06psp_5u:428: kim ayaṃ śakro devānām indraḥ svakena pratibhānena prajñāpāramitām upadiśati utāho buddhānubhāveneti?
S06psp_5u:429: atha khalu śakro devānām indra āyuṣmata ānandasya cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkam ājñāyāyuṣmantam ānandam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:430: buddhānubhāva eṣa bhadantānanda veditavyo yad ahaṃ prajñāpāramitām upadiśāmi.
S06psp_5u:431: atha khalu bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ ānandam āmantrayate sma: evam etad ānandaivam etat,
S06psp_5u:432_0: tathāgatasyaiṣo 'nubhāvas tathāgatasyaitad adhiṣṭhānaṃ yac chakro devānām indraḥ
S06psp_5u:432_1: prajñāpāramitām upadiśati. yasminn ānanda samaye bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
S06psp_5u:432_2: śikṣate prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogam āpadyate prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayati,
S06psp_5u:433: tasmin samaye ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau mārāḥ pāpīyāṃsas te sarve saṃśayaprāptā bhavanti:
S06psp_5u:435: bhūtakoṭiṃ sākṣātkṛtvā srotaāpattiphalaṃ vā sākṣātkariṣyati sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ vānāgāmiphalaṃ vārhattvaṃ vā sākṣātkariṣyati pratyekāṃ bodhiṃ prāpsyati,
S06psp_5u:437: punar aparam ānanda yasmin samaye bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitayāvirahito bhavati tasmin samaye māraḥ pāpīyāñ chokaśalyaviddho bhavati.
S06psp_5u:438: punar aparam ānanda bodhisattvasya māraḥ pāpīyān ulkāpātān utprekṣyati bhayaṃ janayiṣyaty,
S06psp_5u:439_0: apy eva nāmāsya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāvalīnatā vā bhaved romaharṣo vā bhaved
S06psp_5u:439_1: avalīnacittatā vā bhaved ekacittotpādasyāpi vikṣobhanaṃ bhaviṣyati sarvākārajñatāṃ manasikurvataḥ.
S06psp_5u:440: atha khalv āyuṣmān ānando bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:441: kiṃ punar bhagavan sarveṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ māraḥ pāpīyān upasaṃkramiṣyati viheṭhanābhiprāyaḥ?
S06psp_5u:443: na khalv ānanda sarveṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ māraḥ pāpīyān upasaṃkramiṣyati viheṭhanābhiprāyaḥ,
S06psp_5u:444: keṣāṃcid ānanda bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ māraḥ pāpīyān upasaṃkramiṣyati viheṭhanābhiprāyaḥ keṣāṃcin nopasaṃkramiṣyati.
S06psp_5u:446: kiyadrūpāṇāṃ bhagavan bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ māraḥ pāpīyān upasaṃkramiṣyati viheṭhanābhiprāyaḥ kiyadrūpāṇāṃ nopasaṃkramiṣyati?
S06psp_5u:448: yair ānanda bodhisattvaiḥ pūrvāntata iyaṃ gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā bhāṣyamāṇā pratikṣiptā cittena nādhimuktā teṣāṃ māraḥ pāpīyān upasaṃkramiṣyati viheṭhanābhiprāyaḥ.
S06psp_5u:449: punar aparam ānanda ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāṃ śrutvā bodhisattvaḥ saṃśayaprāpto 'bhūt,
S06psp_5u:450: syād veyaṃ prajñāpāramitā na vā syād ity asyāpy ānanda bodhisattvasya māraḥ pāpīyān upasaṃkramiṣyati viheṭhanābhiprāyaḥ.
S06psp_5u:451_0: punar aparam ānanda yo bodhisattvaḥ kalyāṇamitravirahito bhavati so 'saṃpaśyamānaḥ
S06psp_5u:451_1: kalyāṇamitrānīmāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāraraitāṃ na śṛṇoty aśṛṇvan na jānāty ajānānas
S06psp_5u:452: kathaṃ prajñāpāramitā bhāvayitavyety asyāpy ānanda bodhisattvasya māraḥ pāpīyān upasaṃkramiṣyati viheṭhanābhiprāyaḥ.
S06psp_5u:454: punar aparam ānanda prajñāpāramitāvirahito yo bodhisattvo 'saddharmaparigrahaṃ karoty asyāpy ānanda bodhisattvasya māraḥ pāpīyān upasaṃkramiṣyati avatāraṃ ca lapsyate.
S06psp_5u:455: punar aparaṃ ānanda prajñāpāramitāvirahito yo bodhisattvo 'saddharmasya varṇaṃ bhāṣiṣyate tatra mārasya pāpīyasa evaṃ bhaviṣyati,
S06psp_5u:456: sahāya eṣo mama yo 'saddharmasya varṇaṃ bhāṣiṣyate,
S06psp_5u:457: bahūnām apy eṣa bodhisattvayānikānāṃ pudgalānāṃ sahāyo labdho yo 'saddharmasya varṇaṃ bhāṣiṣyate,
S06psp_5u:459: ayaṃ bodhisattvayānikaḥ pudgalo 'py ābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ bhūmibhyām anyatarasyāṃ bhūmau sthāsyati yad uta śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā.
S06psp_5u:460: punar aparam ānanda evaṃrūpasya bodhisattvasya māraḥ pāpīyān avatāraṃ lapsyate yo bodhisattva iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñapāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyām evaṃ vakṣyati:
S06psp_5u:462: kiṃ te etayā gambhīrayā prajñāpāramitayā śrutayā bhāṣitayā vācitayā paryavāptayā dhāritayā?
S06psp_5u:463: aham api tāvad asyām āgādhaṃ na labhe kutaḥ punas tvaṃ lapsyase,
S06psp_5u:464: asyāpy ānanda bodhisattvasya māraḥ pāpīyān avatāraṃ lapsyate.
S06psp_5u:465: punar aparam ānanda yasmin samaye bodhisattvo 'nyataraṃ bodhisattvam avamaṃsyate:
S06psp_5u:466: ahaṃ dānapāramitāyāṃ carāmi na tvaṃ dānapāramitāyāñ carasi,
S06psp_5u:467: ahaṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ carāmi na tvaṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ carasi,
S06psp_5u:468: ahaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carāmi na tvaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carasi,
S06psp_5u:469: asyāpy ānanda bodhisattvasya māraḥ pāpīyān avatāraṃ lapsyate.
S06psp_5u:470_0: punar aparam ānanda yasmin samaye bodhisattvo ātmānam utkṛṣṭaṃ manyate tasminn ānanda
S06psp_5u:470_1: samaye māraḥ pāpīyāṃs tuṣṭo bhavaty udagro bhavaty āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajāto bhavati,
S06psp_5u:471: asyāpy ānanda bodhisattvasya māraḥ pāpīyān avatāraṃ lapsyate.
S06psp_5u:472_0: punar aparam ānanda yasmin samaye bodhisattvo nāmagrahaṇato vā gotragrahaṇato vā
S06psp_5u:472_1: parikīrtito bhavati sa tena nāmagrahaṇena vā gotragrahaṇena vā tadanyān bodhisattvān
S06psp_5u:474: te cāsya guṇā na saṃvidyante ye 'vinivartanīyānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām ākārā liṅgāni nimittāni. (PSP_5:25)
S06psp_5u:475: sa tair akārair liṅgair nimittair asaṃvidyamānaiḥ kleśam utpādayati,
S06psp_5u:477_0: na tvam atra bodhisattvayāne saṃdṛśyase yathāham atra bodhisattvayāne bodhisattvagotre
S06psp_5u:477_1: saṃdṛśye. sa tenādhimānena bodhisattvayānikān pudgalān kutsayiṣyati paṃśayiṣyati.
S06psp_5u:478: aśūnyaṃ me bhavanaṃ bhaviṣyaty utsadā bhaviṣyanti mahānarakās,
S06psp_5u:479: tiryagyonir yamalokaḥ pretaviṣayaḥ. tathātathā ca māraḥ pāpīyāṃs tān bodhisattvān adhiṣṭhāsyati yathādeyavacanā bhaviṣyanti teṣāṃ tayādeyavacanatayā bahujanaḥ śrotavyaṃ maṃsyante,
S06psp_5u:481: te śrutvā dṛṣṭvānukṛtim āpadyamānās tathatāyai na śikṣiṣyante,
S06psp_5u:482: te tathatāyai na śikṣamāṇās te tathatāyai na pratipadyamānāḥ kleśaṃ vivardhayiṣyanti,
S06psp_5u:483: te viparyastayā cittasaṃtatyā yadyad eva karmārapsyante kāyena vā vācā vā manasā vā,
S06psp_5u:484: sarvaṃ tad aniṣṭatvāyākāntatvāyāmanaāpatvāya saṃvartiṣyati. evaṃ te mahānarakā utsadā bhaviṣyanti,
S06psp_5u:486: mārabhavanāny utsadāni bhaviṣyanti. imaṃ ānandārthavaśaṃ saṃpaśyamāno māraḥ pāpīyān āttamanā bhavati pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajātaḥ.
S06psp_5u:487: punar aparaṃ ānanda saced bodhisattvayānikaḥ pudgalaḥ śrāvakayānikena pudgalena sārdhaṃ vivadati,
S06psp_5u:489: dūrīkariṣyati batāyaṃ kulaputraḥ sarvākārajñatāṃ nāyam abhyāsī bhaviṣyati sarvākārajñatāyāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:490: naite kalahabhaṇḍanavigrahavivādā mārgaḥ sarvākārajñtāyā narakamārga eṣa tiryagyonimārga eṣa yamalokamārga eṣa naiṣa mārgaḥ sarvākārajñatāyāḥ.
S06psp_5u:491: punar aparaṃ ānanda saced bodhisattvayānikaḥ pudgalo 'pareṇa bodhisattvayānikena pudgalena sārdhaṃ kalahabhaṇḍanavigrahavivādān karoti,
S06psp_5u:494: sarvākārajñatāyā ubhāv apy etau nābhisaṃbhotsyete 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:495: tathā hi naiṣa mārgaḥ sarvākārajñatāyā ya etaiḥ kulaputrair ārabdho,
S06psp_5u:496: narakamārga eṣa tiryagyonimārga eṣa yamalokamārga eṣa ya etaiḥ kulaputrair ārabdhaḥ.
S06psp_5u:497: punar aparaṃ ānandāvyākṛto bodhisattvo vyākṛtasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāntike cittam āghātayiṣyati,
S06psp_5u:499: vā vigrahaṃ vā vivādaṃ vā kariṣyati,
S06psp_5u:500: tena punas tāvata eva kalpān saṃnāhaḥ saṃnaddhavyaḥ yāvanti tasya tāni cittāny utpannāni kalahaṃ vā bhaṇḍanaṃ vā vigrahaṃ vā vivādaṃ vā kurvataḥ,
S06psp_5u:502: evam ukte āyuṣmān ānando bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:503: asti bhagavann eteṣāṃ cittotpādānāṃ niḥsaraṇam utāho tāvata eva kalpān saṃnāhaḥ saṃnaddhavyaḥ.
S06psp_5u:504: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantam ānandam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:505: aniḥsaraṇo mayānanda dharmo deśitaḥ śrāvakayānikānāñ ca pudgalānāṃ pratyekabuddhayānikānāñ ca pudgalānāṃ,
S06psp_5u:506_0: tatrānanda yo 'yaṃ bodhisattvayānikaḥ pudgalo bodhisattvayānikena pudgalena sārdhaṃ
S06psp_5u:506_1: kalahaṃ vā bhaṇḍanaṃ vā vigrahaṃ vā kuryād yāvad vivaded vā ākrośed vā paribhāṣed
S06psp_5u:506_2: vā kalahayitvā vā bhaṇḍayitvā vā vigrahayitvā vā vivādayitvā vā ākrośayitvā vā paribhāṣayitvā
S06psp_5u:506_3: vā na pratideśayaty anuśayaṃ vahati anuśayabaddho viharati,
S06psp_5u:507: nāham ānanda tasya pudgalasya niḥsaraṇaṃ vadāmi,
S06psp_5u:508: avaśyaṃ tena tāvata eva kalpān saṃnāhaḥ saṃnaddhavyaḥ,
S06psp_5u:510: punar aparam ānanda bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kalahayitvā bhaṇḍitvā vigrahayitvā vivaditvā ākroṣitvā paribhāṣitvā pratideśayati:
S06psp_5u:511: mānuśayaṃ vahaty āyatyāṃ saṃvaram āpadyate durlabdhā me lābhā,
S06psp_5u:512: yan mayā sarvasattvānāṃ bhāra āhartavyas tad ahaṃ mantrite pratimantrayāmi,
S06psp_5u:513: yan mayā sarvasattvānāṃ saṃkramabhūtena bhavitavyaṃ so 'haṃ parasyāpriyaṃ mantrayāmi prativacanaṃ ca dadāmi. evam api mayā na vaktavyaṃ jaḍaiḍakamūkasadṛśena mayā bhavitavyaṃ,
S06psp_5u:514_0: adhyāśayaś ca me na vikopayitavyo yan mayaite sattvāḥ parinirvāpayitavyā anuttarāṃ
S06psp_5u:514_1: samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya tad aham atra vyāpadye tad aham atra kṣubhyāmi na mayātra
S06psp_5u:514_2: vyāpattavyaṃ na mayā kṣobhacittam utpādayitavyam. asyānanda bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya
S06psp_5u:515: punar aparam ānanda bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śrāvakayānikaiḥ pudgalaiḥ sārdhaṃ na sthātavyaṃ sacet tiṣṭhati tena na kasyacid antike vyāpattavyaṃ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:516: tathā hi naitan mama pratirūpaṃ syāt, (PSP_5:27)
S06psp_5u:517: yad aham eteṣām antike vyāpadye vā kṣubhyeyaṃ vā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:518: tathā hi te mayānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya sarvaduḥkhebhyaḥ parimocayitavyāḥ. iti saptamī
S06psp_5u:519: atha khalv āyuṣmān ānando bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:520: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena bodhisattvayānikānāṃ pudgalānām antike sthātavyam?
S06psp_5u:522: evaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena bodhisattvayānikānāṃ pudgalānām antike sthātavyam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:524_0: yathā caivaitena śikṣitavyaṃ tathā caiva mayā śikṣitavyaṃ yatra caitena śikṣitavyaṃ
S06psp_5u:524_1: tatra caiva mayā śikṣitavyaṃ yad uta dānapāramitāyāṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ
S06psp_5u:524_4: śūnyatānimittāpraṇihiteṣu pañcasv abhijñāsu daśasu tathāgatabaleṣu caturṣu vaiśāradyeṣu
S06psp_5u:524_5: catasṛṣu pratisaṃvitsv aṣṭādaśasv āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu yāvat sarvākārajñatāyām
S06psp_5u:524_6: apagatasarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair na mayātra śikṣitavyam. sacet punar
S06psp_5u:524_7: eṣa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'virahito bhavati sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair
S06psp_5u:524_8: mayāpy evam eva śikṣitavyam. evaṃ śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ samaśikṣo bhavati.
S06psp_5u:525: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:526: katamā bhagavan bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ samatā yatra samatāyāṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śikṣitavyam?
S06psp_5u:527: bhagavān āha: adhyātmaśūnyatā subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ samatā,
S06psp_5u:533: vijñānaṃ vijñānena śūnyam. evaṃ skandhadhātvāyatanāni skandhadhātvāyatanaiḥ śūnyāni,
S06psp_5u:548: bodhir yāvad bodhyā śūnyā. iyaṃ subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ samatā,
S06psp_5u:549: yatra samatāyāṃ sthitvā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyante. ity aṣṭamī
S06psp_5u:551: kiṃ punar bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo rūpasya kṣayāya śikṣate śikṣate sarvākārajñatāyai,
S06psp_5u:552: rūpasya virāgāya nirodhāya śikṣate śikṣate sarvākārajñatāyai,
S06psp_5u:556: vijñānasya virāgāya nirodhāya śikṣate śikṣate sarvākārajñatāyai,
S06psp_5u:557_0: vijñānasyānutpādāya śikṣate śikṣate sarvākārajñatāyai. evaṃ skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādasya
S06psp_5u:557_1: pratītyasamutpādāṅgānāṃ ca kṣayāya virāgāya nirodhāyānutpādāya śikṣate śikṣate sarvākārajñatāyai.
S06psp_5u:557_2: sarvapāramitānāṃ sarvaśūnyatānāṃ saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ caturṇām āryasatyānām
S06psp_5u:557_5: kṣayāya virāgāya nirodhāyānutpādāya śikṣate śikṣate sarvākārajñatāyai. kiṃ punar
S06psp_5u:557_6: bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ kṣayāya śikṣate virāgāya
S06psp_5u:557_7: śikṣate nirodhāya śikṣate 'nutpādāya śikṣate śikṣate sarvākārajñatāyai.
S06psp_5u:558: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat: yat subhūtiḥ sthavira evam āha,
S06psp_5u:559: yad rūpasya kṣayāya śikṣate śikṣate sarvākārajñatāyai,
S06psp_5u:560: yad rūpasya virāgāya nirodhāyānutpādāya śikṣate śikṣate sarvākārajñatāyai,
S06psp_5u:563: vijñānasya virāgāya nirodhāyānutpādāya śikṣate śikṣate sarvākārajñatāyai. evaṃ skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādasya pratītyasamutpādāṅgānāṃ ca kṣayāya virāgāya (PSP_5:29)
S06psp_5u:564_0: nirodhāyānutpādāya śikṣate śikṣate sarvākārajñatāyai. sarvapāramitānāṃ sarvaśūnyatānāṃ
S06psp_5u:564_3: daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānāṃ caturṇāṃ vaiśāradyānāṃ catasṛṇāṃ pratisaṃvidām aṣṭādaśānām
S06psp_5u:564_4: āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ kṣayāya virāgāya nirodhāyānutpādāya śikṣate śikṣate sarvākārajñatāyai.
S06psp_5u:564_5: anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ kṣayāya virāgāya nirodhāyānutpādāya śikṣate śikṣate sarvākārajñatāyai
S06psp_5u:565: subhūte yā rūpasya tathatā yā vedanāyās tathatā yā saṃjñāyās tathatā yā saṃskārāṇāṃ tathatā yā vijñānasya tathatā,
S06psp_5u:566_0: evaṃ yā skandhadhātvāyatanānāṃ tathatā yā pratītyasamutpādasya tathatā yā pratītyasamutpādāṅgānāṃ
S06psp_5u:566_1: tathatā yā pāramitānāṃ tathatā yā sarvaśūnyatānāṃ tathatā yā sarvavimokṣasamādhisamāpattidhāraṇīmukhānāṃ
S06psp_5u:566_2: tathatā yā saptatriṃśad bodhipakṣyāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ tathatā yāpramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattīnāṃ
S06psp_5u:566_3: tathatā yāryasatyānāṃ tathatā yā trayāṇāṃ vimokṣamukhānāṃ tathatā yā pañcānām abhijñānāṃ
S06psp_5u:566_5: tathatā yā srotaāpannasya tathatā yā sakṛdāgāminas tathatā yānāgāminas tathatā yārhatas
S06psp_5u:566_6: tathatā yā pratyekabuddhasya tathatā yā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya tathatā,
S06psp_5u:569: api nu sā tathatā kṣīyate vā virahyate vā nirudhyate vā prahīyate vā.
S06psp_5u:570: subhūtir āha: na bhagavan na sugata.
S06psp_5u:572_0: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvas tathatāyāṃ śikṣate śikṣate sarvākārajñatāyāṃ
S06psp_5u:572_1: na ca tathatā kṣīyate vā virahyate vā nirudhyate vā prahīyate vā. evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ
S06psp_5u:572_2: subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvas tathatāyāṃ śikṣate śikṣate sarvākārajñatāyām. evaṃ
S06psp_5u:572_3: śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvas tathatāyāṃ śikṣate śikṣate ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu,
S06psp_5u:583_0: śikṣate sarvākārajñatāyām. evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvaśikṣāparamapāramitām
S06psp_5u:583_1: anuprāpsyati. evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na śakyate māreṇa vā
S06psp_5u:583_2: mārakāyikābhir vā devatābhir abhimarditum. evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ
S06psp_5u:583_3: kṣipram avinivartanīyatām anuprāpsyati. evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ
S06psp_5u:583_4: svake paitṛke tathāgatagocare carati. evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo
S06psp_5u:583_5: nāthakaraṇīyair dharmaiś carati buddhakṣetrapariśodhanaiḥ. evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte
S06psp_5u:583_6: bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāmaitryāṃ śikṣate mahākaruṇāyāṃ śikṣate buddhakṣetrapariśodhanāya
S06psp_5u:583_7: śikṣate sattvaparipākāya śikṣate. evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvas
S06psp_5u:583_9: bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvasattvān parinirvāpayiṣyāmīti śikṣate. evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ
S06psp_5u:583_10: subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvas tathāgatavaṃśasyānupacchedāya śikṣate. evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ
S06psp_5u:585_0: na hi subhūte śakyaṃ hīnasattvair iha śikṣāyāṃ śikṣituṃ sarvasattvān saṃsārād uddhartukāmaḥ
S06psp_5u:585_1: sa sattvo yo 'syāṃ śikṣāyāṃ śikṣate. evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo
S06psp_5u:610: na duḥśīlaparigrāhako bhavati. evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na dīrghāyuṣkeṣu devesūveṣūpapadyate. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā (PSP_5:31 )
S06psp_5u:611: hy asti tasyopāyakauśalyaṃ yenopāyakauśalyena samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhyānāni ca samāpadyate,
S06psp_5u:614: na ca dhyānānāṃ na cāpramāṇānāṃ na cārūpyasamāpattīnāṃ vaśenopapadyate. evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ pariśuddhim adhigacchati,
S06psp_5u:616: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtiḥ sthaviro bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:618: tat katamasya dharmasya bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pariśuddhim adhigacchati?
S06psp_5u:619: bhagavān āha: evam etat subhūte evam etat,
S06psp_5u:621: evaṃ pariśuddheṣu subhūte sarvadharmeṣu bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇasya yā tatrāsaṃsīdanatā anavalīnatā,
S06psp_5u:622: iyaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitā. tatsarvabālapṛthagjanā etān dharmān na jānanti na paśyanti,
S06psp_5u:623_0: teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ kṛtena bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ carati śīlapāramitāyāṃ
S06psp_5u:623_1: carati kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ carati vīryapāramitāyāṃ carati dhyānapāramitāyāṃ carati
S06psp_5u:631_0: aṣṭādaśāveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu carati sarvākārajñatāyāṃ carati. evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ
S06psp_5u:631_1: subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadharmeṣu balavaiśāradyam anuprāpnoti. evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ
S06psp_5u:631_2: subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvasattvacittacaritānāṃ pāraṃ gacchati. iti navamī
S06psp_5u:632: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte 'lpakās te mahāpṛthivīpradeśā yatra jāṃbūnadaṃ suvarṇaṃ jātarūpam utpadyate,
S06psp_5u:633: evam eva subhūte 'lpakās te sattvā ya iha śikṣāyāṃ śikṣaṇte,
S06psp_5u:634: yad uta prajñāpāramitāśikṣāyām ito bahutarakās te sattvā ye śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmau saṃprasthitāḥ. iti daśamī
S06psp_5u:635: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte 'lpakās te sattvā ye cakravartirājyasaṃvartanīyaṃ karma samādāya vartante,
S06psp_5u:637: ye koṭṭarājyaṃ saṃvartanīyaṃ karma samadāya vartante. evam eva subhūte 'lpatarakās te sattvā ya imaṃ sarvākārajñatāmārgaṃ samāruhanti,
S06psp_5u:638_0: ataḥ prabhūtatarakās te sattvā ye śrāvakapratyekabuddhamārgaṃ samāruhanti. ye 'pi
S06psp_5u:638_1: te subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye saṃprasthitās tato
S06psp_5u:638_2: 'lpakās te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye tathatāyai pratipadyante,
S06psp_5u:639_0: ataḥ prabhūtatarakās te sattvā ye śrāvakapratyekabuddhatvāya sthāsyanti. ye 'pi te
S06psp_5u:639_1: subhūte bodhisattvayānikāḥ kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraḥ prajñāpāramitayāvirahitā ye 'vinivartanīyabhūmim avakramiṣyanti,
S06psp_5u:640: ataḥ prabhūtatarakās te ye sattvāvinivartanīyabhūmin nāvakramiṣyanti,
S06psp_5u:641_0: tasmāt tarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvenāvinivartanīyabhūmim anuprāptukāmenāvinivartanīyabhūmau
S06psp_5u:641_1: gaṇanāṃ gantukāmenehaiva gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam. ity ekādaśī
S06psp_5u:642: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato na mātsaryasahagataṃ cittam utpadyate,
S06psp_5u:651: na khilasahagataṃ cittam utpadyate. iti dvādaśī
S06psp_5u:654: na vijñānasahagataṃ cittam utpadyate na skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādapratītyasamutpādāṅgasahagataṃ cittam utpadyate,
S06psp_5u:655_0: evaṃ na sarvaśūnyatāḥ sarvapāramitāḥ saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyadharmāryasatyāpramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattiśūnyatānimittāpraṇihitābhijñāsarvavimokṣasamādhisamāpattidhāraṇīmukhadaśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidāveṇikabuddhadharmasahagataṃ cittam utpadyate,
S06psp_5u:656: na samyaksaṃbodhisaghagataṃ cittam utpadyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:657: tathā hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāñ caran na kañcid dharmam upalabhate,
S06psp_5u:658: anupalambhamāno na kañcid dharmacittam utpādayati. evaṃ khalu subhūte iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvāḥ pāramitāḥ saṃgṛhītā bhavanti,
S06psp_5u:662: tathā hi subhūte iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sarvāḥ pāramitā antargatā bhavanti. iti trayodaśī
S06psp_5u:663: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte satkāyadṛṣṭyāṃ dvāṣaṣṭidṛṣṭigatāny antargatāni bhavanti,
S06psp_5u:664_0: evam eva subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyeha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ
S06psp_5u:664_1: sarvāḥ pāramitā antargatā bhavanti. tadyathāpi nāma subhūte puruṣasya kālagatasya
S06psp_5u:664_2: jīvitendriye niruddhe sarvāṇīndriyāṇi niruddhāni bhavanti. evam eva subhūte bodhisattvasya
S06psp_5u:664_3: mahāsatvasyeha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ sarvāḥ pāramitā antargatā bhavanti,
S06psp_5u:665: tasmāt tarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvapāramitānāṃ pāraṃ gantukāmena iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam. iti caturdaśī
S06psp_5u:666: iha punaḥ subhūte gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvasattvānām agratāyai śikṣate. tat kiṃ manyase?
S06psp_5u:667: subhūte ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvā api nu te bahavaḥ.
S06psp_5u:669: bahavo bhagavan jāṃbūdvīpakā eva tāvat sattvāḥ kaḥ punar vādo ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvāḥ.
S06psp_5u:671_0: yāvantaḥ subhūte trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvās te sarve 'pūrvācaramamānuṣyakam
S06psp_5u:671_1: ātmabhāvaṃ pratilabhyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyeraṃs tāṃ sarvān ekaiko
S06psp_5u:671_2: bodhisattvo yāvajjīvaṃ tiṣṭhaṃs tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāṃś cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārair
S06psp_5u:672: subhūte 'pi nu sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvas tatonidānaṃ bahupuṇyaṃ prasavet.
S06psp_5u:673: subhūtir āha: bahu bhagavan bahu sugata.
S06psp_5u:674: bhagavān āha: ataḥ sa subhūte kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasaviṣyati,
S06psp_5u:675: ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:676_0: evaṃ maharddhikā hi subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitā anuttarāyāḥ
S06psp_5u:676_1: samyaksaṃbodher āhārikā. tasmāt tarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvasattvānām
S06psp_5u:676_2: anuttarena bhavitukāmena sarvasattvānām anāthānāṃ nāthena bhavitukāmenāśaraṇānāṃ
S06psp_5u:677: bhavitukāmenālayanānāṃ layanena bhavitukamenādvīpanāṃ dvipena bhavitukāmena buddhatvam anuprāputukāmena buddhaviṣayam anuprāptukāmena budddhavikrīḍitaṃ vikrīḍitukāmena,
S06psp_5u:678: buddhasiṃhanādaṃ naditukāmena buddhaśaṃkhaṃ prapūrayitukāmena buddhasāṃkathyaṃ kartukāmena ihaiva gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ,
S06psp_5u:679: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na sā kācit saṃpattir yāṃ na pratilabhate yā tena na pratilabdhā syāt.
S06psp_5u:680: subhūtir āha: śrāvakasaṃpad api tena pratilabdhavyā pratyekabuddhasaṃpad api tena pratilabdhavyā.
S06psp_5u:681: bhagavān āha: śrāvakasaṃpad api tena subhūte pratilabdhavyā,
S06psp_5u:683: tatra ca na sthātavyaṃ na pratiṣṭhātavyaṃ,
S06psp_5u:684_0: jñānena ca darśanena ca dṛṣṭvātikramiṣyati bodhisattvaniyāmam avakramiṣyati. evaṃ
S06psp_5u:684_1: śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatāyā abhyāsī bhavaty anuttarāṃ
S06psp_5u:684_2: samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate. evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ
S06psp_5u:684_3: sadevamānuṣāsurasya lokasya dakṣiṇīyatāṃ gacchati. evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo
S06psp_5u:684_4: mahāsattvaḥ ye tadanye dakṣiṇīyāḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddhās tān sarvān abhibhavitvā gacchati,
S06psp_5u:685: sarvākārajñatāyāś cābhyāsī bhavati. evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na riñcati prajñāpāramitāṃ carati prajñāpāramitāyām avirahitaḥ prajñāpāramitayā,
S06psp_5u:686: evaṃ caran subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām aparihāṇadharmā veditavyāḥ,
S06psp_5u:687: sarvākārajñatāyā dūrīkaroti śrāvakabhūmiṃ vā pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ vābhyāsī bhavaty anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ. iti pañcadaśī
S06psp_5u:692: saced evaṃ jānāti na carati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ saced evaṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ na jānāti,
S06psp_5u:696_0: tad api na jānāti na paśyati yasya vā prajñāpāramitā yena vā prajñāpāramitā yo vā
S06psp_5u:696_1: prajñāpāramitayā niryāty evam anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate. sacet punar asyaivaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_5u:698: nānayā prajñāpāramitayā kaścid dharmo niryāsyati sthitatvād dharmadhātos tathatāyā bhūtakoṭer,
S06psp_5u:699: evaṃ caran bodhisattvo mahāsattvaś carati prajñāpāramitāyām abhyāsī bhavaty anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ. iti ṣoḍaśī vivṛddhir ity uktā vivṛddhiḥ
S06psp_5u:700: atha khalu śakrasya devānām indrasyaitad abhavat:
S06psp_5u:701: carann apīha bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāra,
S06psp_5u:704: kaḥ punar vādo yadānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddho bhaviṣyati. sulabdhās tair lābhāḥ sujīvitaṃ teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ yeṣāṃ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ cittaṃ kramati,
S06psp_5u:705: kaḥ punar vādo yair anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittam utpāditaṃ,
S06psp_5u:706: spṛhaṇīyās te sattvā ye 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheś cittam utpādayiṣyanti,
S06psp_5u:707: spṛhaṇīyās te sattvā ye 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittam utpādayanti.
S06psp_5u:708_0: atha khalu śakro devānām indro māndāravāṇi puṣpāṇi gṛhītvā yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāmad
S06psp_5u:708_1: upasaṃkramya tair māndāravaiḥ puṣpais tathāgatam arhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddham avakirati
S06psp_5u:710: ye bodhisattvayānikāḥ pudgalā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim adhyālambante teṣām anena kuśalamūlenānuttarāṇāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ paripūrir bhavatu,
S06psp_5u:713: eṣām anāsravadharmāṇāṃ paripūrir bhavatu. iti trisarvajñatvadharmānuttarā paripūrinirūḍhiḥ
S06psp_5u:714: na me bhagavann ekaś cittotpādo 'py utpadyate yad bodhisattvayānikaḥ pudgalo 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthito vivartetānuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodher,
S06psp_5u:715: na hi me bhagavann ekaś cittotpādo 'py utpadyate yad bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vivartya śrāvako vā pratyekabuddho vā bhaved,
S06psp_5u:716: atha tarhi chandaṃ janayed anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau bhūyasyā mātrayā (PSP_5:36)
S06psp_5u:718: imāni saṃsarāvacarāṇi duḥkhāni dṛṣṭvārthakāmaḥ sukhakāmaḥ hitakāmaḥ sa sadevamānuṣāsurasya lokasya ya etaiś cittotpādaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ cintayati,
S06psp_5u:719: kim iti vayaṃ tīrṇā atīrṇān sattvāṃs tārayema,
S06psp_5u:720: kim iti vayaṃ muktā amuktān sattvān mocayema,
S06psp_5u:721: kim iti vayam āśvastā anāśvastān sattvān āśvāsayema,
S06psp_5u:722_0: kim iti vayaṃ parinirvṛtā aparinirvṛtān sattvān parinirvāpayemeti. kiyat sa bhagavan
S06psp_5u:722_1: kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā puṇyaṃ prasavati yaḥ prathamayānasaṃprasthitānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ
S06psp_5u:723: caryāpratipannānāñ ca bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ tāṃś cittotpādān anumodeta?
S06psp_5u:724: avinivartanīyānāṃ ca bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ tāṃś cittotpādān anumodeta?
S06psp_5u:725: ekajātipratibaddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ tāṃś cittotpādān anumodeta?
S06psp_5u:726: ity aparityaktasattvārthā nirūḍhir ity uktā nirūḍhiḥ
S06psp_5u:727: evam ukte bhagavān śakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:728: syāt kauśika cāturmahādvīpake lokadhātau palāgreṇa pramāṇaṃ na tv eva teṣām anumodanāsahagatānāṃś cittotpādānāṃ puṇyasya pramāṇaṃ,
S06psp_5u:729: tiṣṭhatu kauśika cāturdvīpako lokadhātur evaṃ sāhasro lokadhātur evaṃ dvisāhasro madhyamo lokadhātuḥ,
S06psp_5u:730: syāt khalu punaḥ kauśika trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau palāgreṇa pramāṇaṃ na tv eva teṣām anumodanāsahagatānāṃ cittotpādānāṃ puṇyasya pramāṇaṃ,
S06psp_5u:731_0: syāt khalu punaḥ kauśika trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau mahāsamudreṣu śatadhā bhinnayā
S06psp_5u:731_1: vālāgrakoṭyā udakabindūnām utkṣipyamānānāṃ pramāṇaṃ na tv eva teṣām anumodanāsahagatānāṃ
S06psp_5u:732: evam ukte śakro devānām indro bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:734: ya imāṃś cittotpādān nānumodiṣyante. mārapakṣikās te bhagavan sattvā bhaviṣyanti,
S06psp_5u:735: mārabhavanāt te bhagavan sattvāś cyutā bhaviṣyanti,
S06psp_5u:736: ya imāṃś cittotpādān nānumodiṣyante. mārabhavanāt te bhagavan sattvā ihāgatā bhaviṣyanti,
S06psp_5u:737: ya imāṃś cittotpādān nānumodiṣyante. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:740: ye 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayanti. anumoditavyās te bhagavaṃś cittotpādā,
S06psp_5u:741: ye 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittāny utpādayanti. yair aparityakto buddho 'parityakto dharmo 'parityaktaḥ saṃghas,
S06psp_5u:743: anumodyānuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayitavyā yathā na dvayaḥ saṃjñī nādvayaḥ saṃjñī.
S06psp_5u:744: bhagavān āha: evam etat kauśikaivam etat,
S06psp_5u:746_0: ya imān kauśika cittotpādān anumodiṣyante te kṣipraṃ tathāgatam arhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddham
S06psp_5u:746_1: ārāgayiṣyanti ārāgayitvā na virāgayiṣyanti. evaṃ te ebhir anumodanāsahagataiś cittotpādakuśalamūlaiḥ
S06psp_5u:746_2: samanvāgatā yatra yatropapatsyante tatra tatra satkṛtā bhaviṣyanti,
S06psp_5u:747: gurukṛtā mānitāḥ pūjitā arcitā apacāyitā bhaviṣyanti. tatra te na jātv amanaāpāni rūpāṇi drakṣyanti,
S06psp_5u:752: nāmanaāpān dharmān vijñāsyanti. na ca te jātu buddhair bhagavadbhir virahitā bhaviṣyanti,
S06psp_5u:756_0: tathā hi taiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhiś cāsaṃkhyeyānām aprameyāṇām aparimāṇānāṃ
S06psp_5u:756_1: bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ navayānasaṃprasthitānāṃ kuśalamūlāny anumoditāny anumodyānuttarāyāṃ
S06psp_5u:758: dvitīyabhūmisthitānāṃ yāvad daśabhūmisthitānāṃ yāvad ekajātipratibaddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ tāni kuśalamūlāny anumoditāni,
S06psp_5u:759_0: taiś ca kuśalamūlair vibaddhamānair anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodher abhyāsī bhavanti.
S06psp_5u:759_1: te 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyāprameyān asaṃkhyeyān aparimāṇasattvān parinirvāpayiṣyanti.
S06psp_5u:759_2: tad anena kauśika paryāyeṇa tena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā prathamacittotpādikānāṃ
S06psp_5u:759_3: bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ tāni kuśalamūlāny anumodyānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayitavyāni,
S06psp_5u:760: tathā ca pariṇāmayitavyāni yathā tac cittam anyatra cittena caren nānyatra cittena. ity uktā cittasaṃsthitiḥ
S06psp_5u:761: avinivartanīyānām ekajātipratibaddhānāṃ tāni kuśalamūlāny anumodyānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayitavyāni,
S06psp_5u:762: tathā ca pariṇāmayitavyāni yathā na dvayasaṃjñā nādvayasaṃjñā. iti sakalapravṛttipakṣādhiṣṭhānaḥ prathamo grāhyavikalpaḥ
S06psp_5u:764: atha khalv āyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtiṃ sthaviram etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:771: subhūtir āha: avikalpā āyuṣman śāriputra prajñāpāramitā,
S06psp_5u:777: śāriputra āha: kiṃ punar āyuṣman subhūte rūpam avikalpaṃ,
S06psp_5u:780: cakṣuś cakṣurvijñānaṃ cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaś cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayā vedanā avikalpā. evaṃ śrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ jihvā kāyā,
S06psp_5u:781: mano manovijñānaṃ manaḥsaṃsparśo manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayā vedanā avikalpā. kiṃ punar āyuṣman subhūte rūpam avikalpaṃ,
S06psp_5u:783_0: dharmā apy avikalpāḥ. kiṃ punar āyuṣman subhūte dhyānāni vā apramāṇāni vā ārūpyasamāpattayo
S06psp_5u:784_1: vā sarvaśūnyatā vā sarvasamādhayo vā daśatathāgatabalāni vā catvāri vaiśāradyāni
S06psp_5u:784_2: vā catasraḥ pratisaṃvido vā mahāmaitrī vā mahākaruṇā vāvikalpā yāvad aṣṭādaśāveṇikā
S06psp_5u:785: buddho 'py avikalpaḥ bodhir apy avikalpā saṃskṛto dhātur apy avikalpo 'saṃskṛto dhātur apy avikalpaḥ.
S06psp_5u:786: subhūtir āha: sarvadharmā apy āyuṣmañ chāriputrāvikalpāḥ.
S06psp_5u:787: śāriputra āha: yady āyuṣman subhūte sarvadharmā avikalpāḥ,
S06psp_5u:790: kuto vā prabhāvanā srotaāpannānāṃ sakṛdāgāminām anāgāminām arhatāṃ pratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatām?
S06psp_5u:791: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:792: yad ete āyuṣman śāriputra sattvā viparyāsa samutthitāḥ karmābhisaṃskurvanti kāyena vācā manasā vā,
S06psp_5u:795: yat punar āyuṣmān śāriputra evam āha,
S06psp_5u:800: prabhāvyante, kato yāvad buddhā bhagavantaḥ prabhāvyante?
S06psp_5u:801: subhūtir āha: avikalpatayā āyuṣman śāriputra srotaāpanno 'vikalpaḥ,
S06psp_5u:806_0: ato 'vikalpaḥ pratyekabuddhaḥ. ye 'pi te āyuṣman śāriputrābhūvann atīte 'dhvani tathāgatā
S06psp_5u:806_1: arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās te 'py āyuṣman śāriputra buddhā bhagavanto 'vikalpo vikalpaprahīṇās,
S06psp_5u:807: tad anenāpi te āyuṣman śāriputra paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyaṃ,
S06psp_5u:808: sarvadharmā avikalpā avikalpatathatāṃ pramāṇīkṛtya bhūtakoṭiṃ dharmadhātum. evaṃ khalv āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvenāvikalpāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyam,
S06psp_5u:809: avikalpāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann avikalpaṃ dharmam abhisaṃbudhyate. iti samastanivṛttipakṣādhiṣṭhāno dvitīyo grāhyavikalpaḥ
S06psp_5u:810: atha khalv āyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:811: sāre batāyam āyuṣman subhūte carati bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati.
S06psp_5u:812: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:813: asāre batāyaṃ caraty āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:820: evaṃ yāvad asārā sarvākārajñatā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:821: tathā hi bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann asāram eva nopalabhate na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_5u:825: atha khalu saṃbahulānāṃ kāmāvacarāṇāṃ rūpāvacarāṇāñ ca devaputrāṇām etad abhavat:
S06psp_5u:826: namaskartavyās te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca yair anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittam utpāditaṃ,
S06psp_5u:827: ye ceha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yathopadiṣṭāyāṃ caranti,
S06psp_5u:828: atra cārthe caranto na ca bhūtakoṭiṃ sākṣātkurvanti,
S06psp_5u:829: asākṣātkurvataḥ śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā na tiṣṭheyur,
S06psp_5u:830: anena bhagavan paryāyeṇa namaskartavyās te bhagavan bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ya imāṃ dharmasamatāṃ na sākṣātkurvanti.
S06psp_5u:831: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtis tān devaputrān etad avocat: nedaṃ (PSP_5:40)
S06psp_5u:832: devaputrā duṣkaraṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ ya imaṃ dharmasamatāṃ na sākṣātkurvanti,
S06psp_5u:833_0: yasyāḥ sākṣātkṛtāyāḥ śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā tiṣṭheyuḥ. idaṃ teṣāṃ
S06psp_5u:833_1: devaputrā duṣkaraṃ yad asaṃkhyeyān aprameyān aparimāṇān sattvān parinirvāpayiṣyāma
S06psp_5u:834: te ca sattvā atyantatayā nopalabhyante ye vinayitavyā iti. evañ caranto bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ saṃprasthitā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau sarvasattvān vinayiṣyāma iti,
S06psp_5u:835: ākāśaṃ sa vinayitavyaṃ manyeta yaḥ sattvān vinayitavyān manyeta. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:839_0: ākāśatucchatayā sattvatucchatā draṣṭavyā iti. anenāpi devaputrāḥ paryāyeṇa duṣkarakārako
S06psp_5u:839_1: bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yo 'saṃvidyamānānāṃ sattvānāṃ kṛtaśaḥ saṃnāhaṃ saṃnahyate
S06psp_5u:839_2: ākāśena sārdhaṃ sa vivaditavyaṃ manyeta yaḥ sattvānāṃ kṛtaśaḥ saṃnāhaṃ saṃnaddhavyaṃ manyeta,
S06psp_5u:840: sa ca saṃnāhaḥ saṃnaddho bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sattvāś ca nopalabhyante yeṣām arthāya saṃnāhaḥ saṃnaddhaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:841: sattvaviviktatayā saṃnāhaviviktatā draṣṭavyā. saced evaṃ bhāṣyamāṇe bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na saṃsīdati carati prajñāpāramitāyām. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:844_1: sacet punar bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sarvadharmaviviktatāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ cittaṃ
S06psp_5u:844_2: nāvalīyate na saṃlīyate na saṃtrāsam āpadyate,
S06psp_5u:845: carati bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām. iti dravyasatpṛthagjanapuruṣādhiṣṭhānaḥ prathamo grāhakavikalpaḥ
S06psp_5u:846: bhagavān āha: kena kāraṇena subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na saṃsīdati prajñāpāramitāyā?
S06psp_5u:847: subhūtir āha: asattvād bhagavan na saṃsīdati bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ,
S06psp_5u:848: viviktatvāc chāntatvād anutpādatvād bhagavan na saṃsīdati bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām,
S06psp_5u:849: anena bhagavan kāraṇena bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na saṃsīdati prajñāpāramitāyām. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:850: tathā hi bhagavan sa nopalabhyate yaḥ saṃsīdate, yena (PSP_5:41)
S06psp_5u:851_0: vā saṃsīdate yatra vā saṃsīdate sarva ete dharmā nopalabhyante. saced bhagavann evaṃ
S06psp_5u:851_1: bhāṣyamāṇe bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na saṃsīdati na viṣīdati nāvalīyate na saṃlīyate
S06psp_5u:851_2: nottrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsam āpadyate carati prajñāpāramitāyām. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:852: tathā hi bhagavan sarva ete dharmā nopalabhyante yo vā saṃsīdet yena vā saṃsīdet yatra vā saṃsīdet,
S06psp_5u:853: evaṃ carantaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ sendrakā devāḥ sabrahmakāḥ saprajāpatayo devā namasyanti yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati.
S06psp_5u:854: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:855: na kevalaṃ subhūte sendrakair devaiḥ sabrahmakaiḥ saprajāpatikair devair namasyanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo ya evaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati,
S06psp_5u:856: ye 'pi te 'tikrāntavarṇā devaputrāḥ śubhakṛtsnā vṛhatphalā yāvac chuddhāvāsakā devaputrās te 'pi subhūte namasyanti bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ ya evaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati.
S06psp_5u:857_0: ye 'pi te subhūte tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā asaṃkhyeyeṣv aprameyeṣu lokadhātuṣu
S06psp_5u:857_1: tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti te 'pi subhūte tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās
S06psp_5u:857_2: taṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran taṃ samanvāharanti. ayaṃ bodhisattvo
S06psp_5u:865: yāvat punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvān mahāsattvān buddhā bhagavantaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ samanvāharanti,
S06psp_5u:867: yāvantaḥ subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvās te sarve mārāḥ pāpīyāṃso bhaveyur ekaikaś ca māraḥ pāpīyāṃs tāvata eva mārān pāpīyāso 'bhinirmimīte,
S06psp_5u:868: te sarve 'pratibalās tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato 'ntarāyaṃ kartum.
S06psp_5u:869: dvābhyāṃ subhūte dharmābhyāṃ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo (PSP_5:42)
S06psp_5u:870: durdharṣo bhavati māraiḥ pāpīyobhiḥ. katamābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ?
S06psp_5u:872_0: sarvasattvāś cāparityaktā bhavanti. ābhyāṃ subhūte dvābhyāṃ dharmābhyāṃ samanvāgato
S06psp_5u:872_1: bodhisattvo mahāsattvo durdharṣo bhavati māraiḥ pāpīyābhiḥ. aparābhyāṃ subhūte dvābhyāṃ
S06psp_5u:872_2: dharmābhyāṃ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran durdharṣo
S06psp_5u:873_0: yathāvādī tathākārī ca bhavati buddhāṃś ca bhagavataḥ samanvāharati. ābhyāṃ subhūte
S06psp_5u:873_1: dvābhyāṃ dharmābhyāṃ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran
S06psp_5u:873_2: durdharṣo bhavati māraiḥ pāpīyobhiḥ. evañ carataḥ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya
S06psp_5u:873_3: te devaputrā upasaṃkramitavyaṃ maṃsyante paryupāsyante paripraśnayanti,
