S06psp_5u:875: kṣipraṃ tvaṃ kulaputra buddhabodhiṃ samanuprāpsyasi tasmāt tarhi tvaṃ kulaputra etenaiva vihāreṇa vihara yad uta śūnyatāvihāreṇānimittavihāreṇāpraṇihitavihāreṇa. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:876: etena tvaṃ kulaputra vihāreṇa viharann anāthānāṃ sattvānāṃ nātho bhaviṣyasi,
S06psp_5u:882: andhabhūtānāṃ sattvānām āloko bhaviṣyasi. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:883: etena hi prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇāvirahitasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāmī guṇā bhavanti.
S06psp_5u:884: ye 'pi te 'saṃkhyeyeṣv aprameyeṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantas tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti te 'pi bhikṣusaṃghaparivṛtā buddhā bhagavanto bodhisattvagaṇapuraskṛtā,
S06psp_5u:885_0: yo 'sau prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caraty etair eva guṇaiḥ samanvāgato yad uta prajñāpāramitāguṇais
S06psp_5u:885_1: tasya te buddhā bhagavanto nāmaṃ ca gotraṃ ca parikīrtayamānarūpā dharmaṃ deśayanty udānaṃ codānayanti.
S06psp_5u:886: tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya tadyathāpi nāmāham etarhi ratnaketor bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayamānarūpo dharmaṃ deśayāmy udānaṃ codānayāmi,
S06psp_5u:887: śikhinaś ca bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayamānarūpo dharmaṃ deśayāmy udānaṃ codānayāmi.
S06psp_5u:889: ye 'pi te bodhisattvā mahāsatttvā akṣobhyasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntike brahmacaryaṃ caranti,
S06psp_5u:890: anayā ca prajñāpāramitayāvirahitās teṣām ahaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayamānarūpo dharmaṃ deśayāmy udānaṃ codānayāmi.
S06psp_5u:891: ye 'pi te pūrvasyāṃ diśi buddhā bhagavantas tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti dharmaṃ ca deśayanti,
S06psp_5u:892: tatra ye bodhisattvā mahāsattvā brahmacaryaṃ caranti,
S06psp_5u:893_0: anayā prajñāpāramitayāvirahitās teṣāṃ te buddhā bhagavanto nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayamānarūpā
S06psp_5u:893_1: dharmaṃ deśayaty udānaṃ codānayanti. evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyām adha
S06psp_5u:894: ye buddhā bhagavantas tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti dharmaṃ ca deśayanti,
S06psp_5u:895: tatra ye bodhisattvā mahāsattvā brahmacaryaṃ caranti,
S06psp_5u:896: anayā prajñāpāramitayāvirahitās teṣāṃ te buddhā bhagavanto nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayamānarūpā dharmaṃ deśayanty udānaṃ codānayanti.
S06psp_5u:897: ye 'pi te bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prathamacittotpādam upādāya bodhisattvamārgaṃ paripūrayamāṇā yāvat sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyanti,
S06psp_5u:898: teṣām api te buddhā bhagavanto nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayamānarūpā dharmaṃ deśayanty udānaṃ codānayanti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:899: evaṃ duṣkarakārakā hi subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bhavanti,
S06psp_5u:901: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:902: katameṣāṃ bhagavan bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayamānarūpās te buddhā bhagavanto dharmaṃ deśayanty udānaṃ codānayanti vinivartanīyānāṃ vā avinivartanīyānāṃ vā?
S06psp_5u:903: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:904: santi subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā avinivartanīyā ye prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranti,
S06psp_5u:905: santi vinivartanīyā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranti,
S06psp_5u:906_0: yeṣāṃ te buddhā bhagavanto nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayamānarūpā dharmaṃ deśayanty udānaṃ
S06psp_5u:906_1: codānayanti. ye 'pi te ratnaketor bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyānuśikṣamāṇarūpā bodhisattvacārikāṃ
S06psp_5u:906_2: caranti teṣāṃ te buddhā bhagavanto nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayamānarūpā dharmaṃ deśayanty udānaṃ codānayanti.
S06psp_5u:907: punar aparaṃ subhūte ye 'pi te bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranti,
S06psp_5u:908: sarvadharmā anutpattikā ity adhimuktā na cānutpattikair (PSP_5:44)
S06psp_5u:910: sarvadharmāḥ śūnyā ity adhimuktā na cānutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntiḥ pratilabdhā,
S06psp_5u:911: sarvadharmāḥ śāntā ity adhimuktāḥ sarvadharmā vigatā iti tucchakā iti vaśikā ity asārakā ity adhimuktā na cānutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntiḥ pratilabdhā,
S06psp_5u:912: eṣāṃ subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ te buddhā bhagavanto nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayamānarūpā dharmaṃ deśayanty udānaṃ codānayanti.
S06psp_5u:913: yeṣāṃ te subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ buddhā bhagavanto nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayamānarūupā dharmaṃ deśayanty udānaṃ codānayanti,
S06psp_5u:914: teṣām api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prahīṇā śrāvakabhūmiś ca pratyekabuddhabhūmiś ca pratikāṅkṣitavyā,
S06psp_5u:916: yasya subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato buddhā bhagavanto nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayamānarūpā dharmaṃ deśayanty udānaṃ codānayanti,
S06psp_5u:917: sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīyatāyāṃ sthāsyati yatra sthitvā sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyati.
S06psp_5u:918_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ
S06psp_5u:918_1: śrutvā na kāṅkṣiṣyanti na vicikitsiṣyanti na dhandhāyiṣyanti. evam etad yathā tathāgatenārhatā
S06psp_5u:921: atha khalu śakro devānām indro bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:922: gambhīreyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā duṣkarakārakā bhagavan bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhukāmāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:923_0: na ca nāma bhagavan kaścit tathatāyāṃ tiṣṭhati nāpi kaścid anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim
S06psp_5u:923_1: abhisaṃbudhyate nāpi kaścid dharmaṃ deśayati. atha ca nāvalīyate na cāsya kāṅkṣāyitatvaṃ
S06psp_5u:923_2: vā dhandhāyitatvaṃ vā bhavati. iti prajñaptisahāryapudgalādhiṣṭhāno dvitiyo grāhakavikalpaḥ
S06psp_5u:924: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:925: kathaṃ bhagavan māyopamaṃ cittam anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate?
S06psp_5u:926: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat: tat kiṃ manyase?
S06psp_5u:927: subhūte samanupaśyasi tvaṃ taṃ māyopamaṃ cittam.
S06psp_5u:928: subhūtir āha: na bhagavan, nāhaṃ bhagavan māyopamaṃ cittaṃ samanupaśyāmi.
S06psp_5u:931: subhūte yatra na māyā, na māyopamaṃ cittaṃ tatra samanupaśyasi tvaṃ cittam.
S06psp_5u:934: subhūte 'nyatra māyāyā māyopamād vā cittāt taṃ dharmaṃ samanupaśyasi yo dharmo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate.
S06psp_5u:936_0: nāhaṃ bhagavan anyatra māyāyā māyopamād vā cittāt taṃ dharmaṃ samanupaśyāmi yo dharmo
S06psp_5u:936_1: 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate. so 'haṃ bhagavann anyaṃ dharmaṃ na samanupaśyan
S06psp_5u:936_2: tatkatamaṃ dharmam upadekṣyāmy asti vā nāsti veti?
S06psp_5u:937: yo dharmo 'tyantatayā vivikto na so 'stitāṃ vā nāstitāṃ vopaiti,
S06psp_5u:938: yo dharmo 'tyantatayā vivikto na so 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate,
S06psp_5u:939: na cāsaṃvidyamāno dharmo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbohotsyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:940: tathā hi bhagavaṃs te dharmā na saṃvidyante ye saṃkliśyeyur vyavadāyeyur vā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:953: yaś cātyantavivikto dharmo na sa bhāvayitavyo vā vibhāvayitavyo vā,
S06psp_5u:955: yady atyantaviviktā prajñāpāramitā tat kathaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitam āgamya bodhisattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate?
S06psp_5u:956: anuttarāpi samyaksaṃbodhir atyantaviviktā, kathaṃ viviktena viviktasyānubodhau bhavati?
S06psp_5u:957: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat: sādhu sādhu (PSP_5:46)
S06psp_5u:967_0: anuttarā samayaksaṃbodhir atyantaviviktā yāvat sarvākārajñatā atyantaviviktā. yathā
S06psp_5u:967_1: subhūte 'tyantaviviktā prajñāpāramitā yāvat sarvākārajñatā tathātyantaviviktām anuttarāṃ
S06psp_5u:968_0: sacet subhūte na prajñāpāramitātyantaviviktābhaviṣyad yāvat sarvākārajñatātyantaviviktā
S06psp_5u:968_1: bhaviṣyan na prajñāpāramitābhaviṣyad yāvan na sarvākārajñatābhaviṣyad evaṃ na prajñapāramitā.
S06psp_5u:968_2: ye ca punar evaṃ śroṣyanti akṣobhyasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntike
S06psp_5u:968_3: gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ teṣāṃ ca bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ cāntikād,
S06psp_5u:969: ayam api bodhisattvayānikaḥ pudgala imāṃ prajñāpāramitām adhimokṣyate,
S06psp_5u:970: imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ yathā tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena bhāṣitā tathādhimucyamāno 'vinivartanīyatāyāṃ sthāsyati,
S06psp_5u:971: evaṃ bahukaraṃ subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ śravaṇaṃ vadāmi,
S06psp_5u:972: kaḥ punar vādo ye 'dhimokṣyante 'dhimucya tathatvāya sthāsyanti tathatvāya pratipatsyante tathatvāya sthitvā tathatvāya pratipadyamānās tiṣṭhanti sarvākārajñatāyām.
S06psp_5u:974: yat punar bhagavaṃs tathatāyāṃ sthitvā tathatāyāṃ pratipadyamāno na kaścid dharmam upalabhate tadā kathaṃ tiṣṭhati sarvākārajñatāyām?
S06psp_5u:975: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:976: yathā subhūte tathāgatanirmitas tiṣṭhati tathā tiṣṭhati sarvākārajñatāyām.
S06psp_5u:977: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:978: yat punar bhagavaṃs tathāgatanirmito na kaścid dharmam upalabhate,
S06psp_5u:980: ko vā tathatāyāṃ sthitvānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate?
S06psp_5u:981: ko vā tathatāyāṃ sthitvā dharmaṃ deśayiṣyati?
S06psp_5u:982: tathataiva tāvan nopalabhyate, kaḥ punar vādo yas tathatāyāṃ sthāsyati (PSP_5:47)
S06psp_5u:983: tathatāyāṃ sthitvānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate tathatāyāṃ sthitvā dharmaṃ deśayiṣyati.
S06psp_5u:984: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat: yadāyuṣmān subhūtir evam āha,
S06psp_5u:985: tathāgatanirmito na kaścid dharmam upalabhate ko 'yaṃ tathatāyāṃ tiṣṭhati,
S06psp_5u:986: ko vā tathatāyāṃ sthitvānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate,
S06psp_5u:987: ko yā tathatāyāṃ sthitvā dharman deśayiṣyati,
S06psp_5u:989: kaḥ punar vādo yas tathatāyāṃ sthāsyati tathatāyāṃ sthitvānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate tathatāyāṃ sthitvā dharmaṃ deśayiṣyati. evam etat subhūte evam etat,
S06psp_5u:991: na subhūte tathāgatanirmitaḥ kaścid dharmam upalabhate yas tathatāyāṃ sthāsyati yas tathatāyāṃ sthitvānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate,
S06psp_5u:992: yas tathatāyāṃ sthitvā dharmaṃ deśayiṣyati tathataiva tāvan nopalabhyate,
S06psp_5u:993: kaḥ punar vādo yas tathatāyāṃ sthāsyati tathatāyāṃ sthitvānuttarāṃ samysaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate tathatāyāṃ sthitvā dharmaṃ deśayiṣyantiti,
S06psp_5u:994: nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:995: utpādād vā subhūte tathāgatānām anutpādād vā tathāgatānāṃ sthitaivaiṣā tathatā avitathatā ananyatathatā dharmatā dharmadhātur dharmasthititā dharmaniyāmatā bhūtakoṭir,
S06psp_5u:996: neha subhūte tathatāyāṃ kaścit tiṣṭhati na tathatāyāṃ kaścid anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate na tathatāyāṃ kaścid dharmaṃ deśayati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:997: na hy atra tathatāyāṃ dharma upalabhyate,
S06psp_5u:999: yo vā tathatāyāṃ sthitvānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate,
S06psp_5u:1000: yo vā tathatāyā sthitvā dharmaṃ deśayiṣyati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:1002: naivāsyotpāda upalabhyate na vyayo na sthitir nānyathātvam. yatrāsya dharmasya notpāda upalabhyate na vyayo na sthitir nānyathātvaṃ,
S06psp_5u:1004: ko vā tatra sthitvā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate?
S06psp_5u:1005: tasmāt tarhi subhūte prajñāpāramitātyantaviviktā yāvat sarvākārajñatātyantaviviktā,
S06psp_5u:1006: tasmāt subhūte prajñapāramitām āgamya bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate,
S06psp_5u:1009: na ca tām anāgamya prajñāpāramitām abhisaṃbhotsyate.
S06psp_5u:1011: subhūtir āha: gambhīre bhagavann arthe carati bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ.
S06psp_5u:1012: bhagavān āha: evam etat subhūte evam etat,
S06psp_5u:1016: tañ cārthaṃ na sākṣātkaroti yad uta śrāvakabhūmiṃ vā pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ vā.
S06psp_5u:1018: yathāhaṃ bhagavato bhāṣitasyārtham ājānāmi tathā na kaścid duṣkarakārako bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:1019: tathā hi bhagavan so 'rtho nopalabhyate yaṃ sākṣātkuryāt. sāpi prajñāpāramitā nopalabhyate yayā sākṣātkuryāt,
S06psp_5u:1021: anupalabhamāno bhagavan sarvadharmāṃs tat katamam arthaṃ sākṣātkariṣyati?
S06psp_5u:1023: katamaṃ dharmaṃ sākṣātkariṣyati yaṃ sākṣātkṛtvānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate?
S06psp_5u:1024: iyaṃ bhagavann anupalambhacarir bodhisattvacarir yatra caran bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadharmair anandhakāratām anuprāpnoti.
S06psp_5u:1025: saced bhagavann evaṃ bhāṣyamāṇe bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya cittaṃ nāvalīyate na saṃlīyate na vipratisārī bhavati mānasaṃ nottrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsam āpadyate,
S06psp_5u:1026: evañ caraṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaś carati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ,
S06psp_5u:1027: sa caran nimittam api na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_5u:1029: anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyata iti na samanupaśyati.
S06psp_5u:1030: tasya khalu punar bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato naivaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_5u:1031: dūrīkariṣyāmi śrāvakabhūmiṃ vā pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ vāsanno 'smi sarvākārajñatāyāḥ. iti svabhāvavikalpaḥ
S06psp_5u:1032: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan nākāśasyaivaṃ bhavati kasyacid, ahaṃ dūre vābhyāse vā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:1033: abhedatvād bhagavann ākāśasya. evam eva bhagavan na prajñāpāramitāyā evaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_5u:1034: śrāvakabhūmir vā pratyekabuddhabhūmir vā mama dūre,
S06psp_5u:1035: anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhyāse vā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:1038: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan māyāpuruṣasya naivaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_5u:1039: māyākāro vā na mama dūre māyākāro mamābhyāse,
S06psp_5u:1040: yaḥ punar evaṃ janakāyaḥ saṃnipatitaḥ sa mama dūre nābhyāse. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:1041: avikalpatvād bhagavan māyāpuruṣasya. evam eva bhagavan na prajñāpāramitāyā evaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_5u:1042: śrāvakabhūmir vā pratyekabuddhabhūmir vā mama dūre 'nuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir mamābhyāse. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:1044: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan pratibhāsasya naivaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_5u:1046: ye punar atra nopasaṃkrāntā ādarśe vā udakapātre vā te mama dūre. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:1048: evam eva bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato naivaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_5u:1049: śrāvakabhūmir vā pratyekabuddhabhūmir vā mama dūre 'nuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhyāse. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:1051: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavaṃs tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya na kaścit priyo vāpriyo vā saṃvidyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:1053: evam eva bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyā na kaścit priyo vāpriyo vā saṃvidyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:1054: tathā hy asyāḥ svabhāvo nopalabhyate. iti pratipakṣavikalpaḥ
S06psp_5u:1055: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavaṃs tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sarvavikalpaprahīṇa evam eva bhagavan prajñāpāramitā sarvavikalpaprahīṇā avikalpatām upādāya. iti svādhigamavikalpaḥ
S06psp_5u:1056: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavaṃs tathāgatanirmitasya naivaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_5u:1057: śrāvakabhūmir vā pratyekabuddhabhūmir vā mama dūre 'nuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir mamābhyāse. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:1059: evam eva bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato naivaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_5u:1060: srāvakabhūmir vā pratyekabuddhabhūmir vā mama dūre 'nuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhyāse. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:1062: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavaṃs tathāgatena yo nirmitaḥ sa yasya kṛtyasya kṛtena kṛtas tac ca kṛtyaṃ karoti sa ca nirmino 'vikalpo (PSP_5:50)
S06psp_5u:1063_0: nirvikalpaḥ. evam eva bhagavan yasya kṛtyasya kṛtena bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ
S06psp_5u:1063_1: bhāvayati tac ca kṛtyaṃ karoti sā ca prajñāpāramitāvikalpā nirvikalpā. iti kāritravikalpaḥ
S06psp_5u:1064: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan dakṣeṇa palagaṇḍena palagaṇḍāntevāsinā vā yantrayuktaḥ kṛtaḥ syāt strīvigraho vā puruṣavigraho vā hastivigraho vā balīvardavigraho vā,
S06psp_5u:1065_0: sa ca yantrayukto yasya kṛtyasya kṛtena kṛtas tac ca kṛtyaṃ karoti sa ca yantrayukto
S06psp_5u:1065_1: 'vikalpo nirvikalpaḥ. evam eva bhagavan yasya kṛtyasya kṛtena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena
S06psp_5u:1065_2: prajñāpāramitā bhāvyate tac ca kṛtyaṃ karoti sā prajñāpāramitā avikalpā nirvikalpā.
S06psp_5u:1065_3: iti kriyāsāphalyavikalpaḥ ity ukto navavidhaḥ prathamo grāhyavikalpaḥ
S06psp_5u:1066: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:1067: kiyacciraṃ saṃprasthitā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye 'nenopāyakauśalyena samanvāgatāḥ?
S06psp_5u:1068: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etd avocat:
S06psp_5u:1071: kiyanto buddhā bhagavataḥ paryupāsitā bhagavaṃs tair bodhisattvair mahāsattvair ye 'nenopāyakauśalyena samanvāgatāḥ?
S06psp_5u:1073: gaṅgānadīvālukopamā buddhā bhagavantaḥ paryupāsitās taiḥ kulaputrair vā kuladuhitṛbhir vā bhavitavyā ye 'nenopāyakauśalyena samanvāgatāḥ.
S06psp_5u:1075: kiyat tair bhagavan kuśalamūlaṃ kṛtaṃ bodhisattvair mahāsattvair ye 'nenopāyakauśalyena samanvāgatāḥ?
S06psp_5u:1077: prathamacittotpādam upādāya subhūte na sā kācid dānapāramitā yā tair bodhisattvair mahāsattvair na paripūritā,
S06psp_5u:1081: na sā kācid dhyānapāramitā yā tair bodhisattvair mahāsattvair na paripūritā,
S06psp_5u:1082: na sā kācit prajñāpāramitā yā tair bodhisattvair mahāsattvair na paripūritā ye 'nenopāyakauśalyena samanvāgatāḥ.
S06psp_5u:1084: āścaryam etad bhagavan bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ ye 'nenopāyakauśalyena samanvāgatāḥ.
S06psp_5u:1086: bhagavān āha: evam etat subhūte evam etat,
S06psp_5u:1087_0: āścaryam etat subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ ye 'nenopāyakauśalyena samanvāgatāḥ.
S06psp_5u:1087_1: tadyathāpi nāma sūryācandramasau maṇḍale caturṣu dvīpeṣu kāryaṃ kurvāte caturo dvīpān anugacchataḥ,
S06psp_5u:1088: evam eva subhūte prajñāpāramitā pañcasu pāramitāsu karma karoti pañca pāramitā anugacchanti,
S06psp_5u:1090: prajñāpāramitāvirahitatvād na pāramitānāmadheyaṃ labhante. tadyathāpi nāma subhūte yathā rājā cakravartī virahitaḥ saptabhī ratnair na rājā cakravartīti nāmadheyaṃ labhate,
S06psp_5u:1091: evam eva subhūte pañca pāramitā virahitatvāt prajñāpāramitayā na pāramitānāmadheyaṃ labhante.
S06psp_5u:1093: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte apuruṣā strī sudharṣaṇā bhavati dhūrtakānām,
S06psp_5u:1094: evam eva subhūte pañca pāramitāḥ prajñāpāramitāvirahitatvāt sudharṣaṇā bhavanti māreṇa pāpīyasā mārakāyikābhir vā devatābhiḥ.
S06psp_5u:1096: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte saṃgrāmāvacaraḥ puruṣaḥ saṃnāhasaṃnaddhaḥ saṃgrāme vartamāne durdharṣo bhavati rājanyair vā pratyarthikair vā pratyamitrair vā,
S06psp_5u:1097_0: evam eva subhūte pañca pāramitāḥ prajñāpāramitāvirahitatvād durdharṣā bhavanti māreṇa
S06psp_5u:1097_1: vā mārakāyikābhir vā devatābhir ādhimānikair vā pudgalair yāvad evaṃ bodhisattvacaṇḍālair
S06psp_5u:1097_2: vā pañca pāramitā durdharṣā bhavanti. iti pratipattivaikalyavikalpaḥ
S06psp_5u:1098: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte koṭṭarājāno rājñaś cakravartino 'nuvidheyā bhavanti so 'yaṃ prātarupasthāno yo gacchanti,
S06psp_5u:1099: evam eva subhūte pañca pāramitāḥ prajñāpāramitāparigṛhītā yena sarvākārajñatā tenānugacchanti. iti parapratyayamāyitvavikalpaḥ
S06psp_5u:1100: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte yāḥ kācit kunadyaḥ sarvās tā yena gaṅgānadī tenānugacchanti tā gaṅgānadyā sārdhaṃ mahāsamudram upayānti,
S06psp_5u:1101: evam eva pañca pāramitāḥ prajñāpāramitāparigṛhītā yena sarvākārajñatā tenānugacchanti. ity uddeśanivṛttivikalpaḥ
S06psp_5u:1102: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte puruṣasya dakṣiṇo hastaḥ sarvakṛtyāni karoty,
S06psp_5u:1105: evaṃ pañca pāramitā draṣṭavyāḥ. iti prādeśikakāritravikalpaḥ
S06psp_5u:1106: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte yac ca kunadīnāṃ yac ca mahānadīnām udakaṃ sarvaṃ taṃ mahāsamudrapraviṣṭam ekarasaṃ bhavaty,
S06psp_5u:1107: evam eva subhūte pañca pāramitāḥ prajñāpāramitāparigṛhītā anupraviṣṭāḥ pāramitā nāmadheyaṃ labhante. ity adhigamanānātvavikalpaḥ
S06psp_5u:1108: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte rājñaś cakravartinaś caturaṅgasya balakāyasya cakraratnam agrato gacchati,
S06psp_5u:1109: tiṣṭhati ca yatra rājñaś cakravartinaś cakraratnaṃ tiṣṭhati tatra rājā cakravartī balakāyam arpayati na ca cakraratnaṃ sthānataś calati,
S06psp_5u:1110: evam eva subhūte āsāṃ pañcānāṃ pāramitānāṃ prajñāpāramitā pariṇāyikā yena sarvākārajñatā tenānugacchanti,
S06psp_5u:1111: tatra sthāsyanti tatra sthitvā sthānato nātikrāmanti. iti sthānaprasthānāsthānavikalpaḥ.
S06psp_5u:1112: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte rājñaś cakravartinaś cakraratnaṃ sapariṇāyakaratnaṃ sagṛhapatiratnaṃ caturaṅgasya balakāyasyāgrato gacchaty,
S06psp_5u:1113: evam eva subhūte āsāṃ pañcānāṃ pāramitānāṃ prajñāpāramitāgrato gacchaty agrato gatvā yena sarvākārajñatā tena tiṣṭhati. na ca prajñāpāramitāyā evaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_5u:1120: na śīlapāramitāyā na kṣāntipāramitāyā na vīryapāramitāyā na dhyānapāramitāyā evaṃ bhavaty,
S06psp_5u:1121: ahaṃ prajñāpāramitām anugaccheyam iti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:1122: svabhāva āsām akiṃcitsamarthaḥ svabhāvaḥ śūnyas tuccho marīcisamaḥ.
S06psp_5u:1123: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:1124_0: yadā bhagavan sarvadharmāḥ svabhāvaśūnyās tat kathaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ dānapāramitāyāṃ
S06psp_5u:1124_1: caran śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ prajñapāramitāyāṃ
S06psp_5u:1125: bhagavān āha: iha subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu carata evaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_5u:1129: śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ cariṣyāmīti,
S06psp_5u:1131: arthāyādhyātmabahirdhāvastu parityajati tasya ca parityajata evaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_5u:1132: na kiṃcit parityaktam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:1134: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vyupaparīkṣamāṇo dānapāramitāṃ paripūrayati. teṣāñ ca sattvānām arthāya dauḥśīlyasyāvakāśaṃ na dadāti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:1135: na hy etan mama pratirūpaṃ syād yo 'ham anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhuṃ saṃprasthitaḥ prāṇātipātaṃ kuryām,
S06psp_5u:1136: evam adattādānaṃ kāmamithyācāraṃ mṛṣāvādaṃ piśunavacanaṃ paruṣavacanam abaddhapralāpam abhidhyāṃ vyāpādaṃ mithyādṛṣṭiṃ kuryāṃ,
S06psp_5u:1138: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vyupaparīkṣamāṇaḥ śīlapāramitāyāṃ carati. teṣām eva sattvānām arthāyaikacittotpādam api na kṣobhayati,
S06psp_5u:1139: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisatttvo mahāsattvo vyupaparīkṣamāṇaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyāñ carati. teṣām eva sattvānām arthāya kauśīdyacittaṃ notpādayati,
S06psp_5u:1141: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vyupaparīkṣamāṇo vīryapāramitāyāṃ carati. sa teṣām eva sattvānām arthāya vikṣiptacitto na bhavati,
S06psp_5u:1143: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vyupaparīkṣamāṇo dhyānapāramitāyāṃ carati. sa teṣām eva sattvānām arthāya na jātu prajñāpāramitāvirahito bhavati,
S06psp_5u:1144: yāvan nānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddho bhavati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:1145: na hy anyathā śakyāḥ sattvāḥ paripācayitum anyatra prajñayety arthavaśenaivam arthaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati.
S06psp_5u:1146: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat: yadā bhagavan pāramitānāṃ nāsti nānātvaṃ,
S06psp_5u:1147: katham iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā pañcānāṃ pāramitānām agrākhyāyate jyeṣṭhākhyāyate śreṣṭhākhyāyate varākhyāyate pravarākhyāyate praṇītākhyāyate uttamākhyāyate 'nuttarākhyāyate?
S06psp_5u:1148: bhagavān āha: evam etat subhūte evam etat,
S06psp_5u:1151_0: nemāḥ pañca pāramitānāmadheyaṃ labheran prajñāpāramitāṃ punaḥ subhūte āgamya imāḥ
S06psp_5u:1151_1: pañca pāramitāḥ pāramitānāmadheyaṃ labhante tadyathāpi nāma subhūte nānāprakārā ātmabhāvāḥ
S06psp_5u:1153: evam eva subhūte prajñāpāramitām āgamya pañca pāramitāḥ pāramitānāmadheyaṃ labhante,
S06psp_5u:1162: tathā hy āsāṃ svabhāvo nāsty anena kāraṇena svabhāvo na prajñāyate.
S06psp_5u:1164: yadi bhagavann arthānupratipannasya kasyacid dharmasya viśeṣo vā nānākaraṇaṃ vā na prajñāyate,
S06psp_5u:1165_0: katham iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā āsāṃ pañcānāṃ pāramitānām agrākhyāyate jyeṣṭhākhyāyate
S06psp_5u:1165_1: śreṣṭhākhyāyate varākhyāyate pravarākhyāyate praṇītākhyāyate uttāmākhyāyate anuttarākhyāyate
S06psp_5u:1166: bhagavān āha: evam etat subhūte evam etat,
S06psp_5u:1167: arthānupratipannasya kasyacid dharmasya viśeṣo vā nānākaraṇaṃ vā na prajñāyate. api tu khalu punar lokavyavahārasaṃketam upādāya dānapāramitā prajñaptā,
S06psp_5u:1171: dhyānapāramitā prajñaptā sattvānāṃ saṃsārataḥ parimocanāya. te ca sattvā na jāyante na mriyante na cyavante nopapadyante,
S06psp_5u:1172_0: sattvāsattayā sarvadharmāsattā veditavyā. anena subhūte kāraṇenāsāṃ pañcānāṃ pāramitānāṃ
S06psp_5u:1172_2: praṇītākhyāyate uttamākhyāyate anuttamākhyāyate niruttamākhyāyate asamākhyāyate asamasamākhyāyate,
S06psp_5u:1173_0: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte yāḥ kāścana striyas tāsāṃ strīratnam agram ākhyāyate jyeṣṭham
S06psp_5u:1173_1: ākhyāyate śreṣṭham ākhyāyate varam ākhyāyate pravaram ākhyāyate praṇītam ākhyāyate
S06psp_5u:1173_2: uttamam ākhyāyate anuttamam ākhyāyate niruttamam ākhyāyate asamam ākhyāyate asamasamam
S06psp_5u:1173_3: ākhyāyate. evam eva subhūte prajñāpāramitā āsāṃ pañcānāṃ pāramitānām agrākhyāyate
S06psp_5u:1173_4: jyeṣṭhākhyāyate śreṣṭhākhyāyate varākhyāyate pravarākhyāyate praṇītākhyāyate uttamākhyāyate
S06psp_5u:1175: ka eṣa bhagavann abhiprāyo yat prajñāpāramitā agrākhyāyate jyeṣṭhākhyāyate śreṣṭhākhyāyate varākhyāyate pravarākhyāyate (PSP_5:55)
S06psp_5u:1176: praṇītākhyāyate' uttamākhyāyate anuttamākhyāyate niruttamākhyāyate asamākhyāyate asamasamākhyāyate?
S06psp_5u:1178_0: tathā hi subhūte prajñāpāramitā sarvān kuśalān dharmān gṛhītvā yena sarvākārajñatā
S06psp_5u:1178_1: tena sthāsyaty asthānayogena. iti pṛṣṭato niryāṇavikalpaḥ ity ukto navavidho dvitīyo grāhyavikalpaḥ
S06psp_5u:1179: subhūtir āha: kiṃ punar bhagavan prajñāpāramitā kañcid dharmaṃ gṛhṇāti vā muñcati vā?
S06psp_5u:1180: bhagavān āha: na subhūte prajñāpāramitā kañcid dharmaṃ gṛhṇāti vā muñcati vā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:1181: tathā hi subhūte sarvadharmā agṛhītā amuktāḥ.
S06psp_5u:1182: subhūtir āha: tat katamān bhagavan sarvadharmān prajñāpāramitā na gṛhṇāti na muñcati?
S06psp_5u:1183: bhagavān āha: rūpaṃ subhūte prajñāpāramitā na gṛhṇāti na muñcati,
S06psp_5u:1184: na vedanāṃ na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān,
S06psp_5u:1185_0: vijñānaṃ subhūte prajñāpāramitā na gṛhṇāti na muñcati. evaṃ skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādaṃ
S06psp_5u:1185_1: pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni subhūte prajñāpāramitā na gṛhṇāti na muñcati. evaṃ sarvapāramitāḥ
S06psp_5u:1185_4: buddhadharmān anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ subhūte prajñapāramitā na gṛhṇāti na muñcati.
S06psp_5u:1186: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ bhagavan rūpam aparigṛhītaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_5u:1190: yaḥ subhūte rūpasyāmanasikāro vedanāyā amanasikāraḥ saṃjñāyā amanasikāraḥ saṃskārāṇām amanasikāro vijñānasyāmanasikāraḥ,
S06psp_5u:1199: yāvad yo 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodher amanasikāraḥ. evaṃ hy etat subhūte rūpam aparigṛhītaṃ bhavati yāvat sarvākārajñatā parigṛhītā bhavati.
S06psp_5u:1200: subhūtir āha: yadi bhagavan rūpaṃ na manasikartavyaṃ,
S06psp_5u:1203: evaṃ skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādāḥ pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni vā na manasikartavyāni,
S06psp_5u:1204_2: buddhadharmā na manasikartavyāḥ sarvākārajñatā na manasikartavyā tat kathaṃ bhagavan rūpam amanasikṛtvā,
S06psp_5u:1208_0: sarvapāramitāḥ sarvaśūnyatāḥ saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyān dharmān āryasatyāny apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattīḥ
S06psp_5u:1211: bhagavān āha: yadā subhūte rūpaṃ na manasikariṣyati,
S06psp_5u:1212: na vedanāṃ na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān,
S06psp_5u:1215: sarvapāramitāḥ sarvaśūnyatāḥ saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyān dharmān āryasatyāparamāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattīr na manasikariṣyati,
S06psp_5u:1219: tadā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kuśalamūlāni vivardhiṣyante yāvat sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:1221_0: vedanāṃ saṃjñāṃ saṃskārāṃ vijñanam amanasikṛtvā skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādān
S06psp_5u:1223: subhūtir āha: kim atra bhagavan kāraṇaṃ yena rūpam amanasikāraṃ,
S06psp_5u:1230: amanasikāreṇa hi na śliṣyate kāmadhātau na śliṣyate rūpadhātau na śliṣyate ārūpyadhātāv amanasikāreṇa na kvacic chliṣyate,
S06psp_5u:1231: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā na kvacid dharme śliṣyate. iti traidhātukāśleṣavikalpaḥ
S06psp_5u:1232: subhūtir āha: evaṃ caran bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ na kvacit sthāsyati.
S06psp_5u:1233: bhagavān āha: evaṃ caran subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo rūpe na tiṣṭhati,
S06psp_5u:1236: evaṃ caran skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādeṣu pratītyasamutpādāṅgeṣu na tiṣṭhati,
S06psp_5u:1237_0: sarvapāramitāsu sarvaśūnyatāsu saptatriṃśatsu bodhipakṣyeṣu dharmeṣv āryasatyāpramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattiṣu
S06psp_5u:1238: evaṃ caran subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatāyām api na tiṣṭhati. iti sthānavikalpaḥ
S06psp_5u:1239: subhūtir āha: kim atra bhagavan kāraṇaṃ yena bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ tatrāpi na tiṣṭhati?
S06psp_5u:1240: bhagavān āha: anabhiniveśena bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na kvacit (PSP_5:58)
S06psp_5u:1242: tathā hi sarvadharmān na samanupaśyati yatrābhiniviśeta vā tiṣṭhed vā,
S06psp_5u:1243: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caraty anabhiniveśyāsthānayogena. iti bhāvābhāvavikalpābhiniveśavikalpaḥ
S06psp_5u:1245: ya evaṃ bhāvayaty evaṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayati,
S06psp_5u:1246: ahaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carāmy ahaṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayāmi. saced evaṃ saṃjānīte dūrīkaroti prajñāpāramitāṃ,
S06psp_5u:1248: dhyānapāramitāyā vīryapāramitāyāḥ kṣāntipāramitāyāḥ śīlapāramitāyā dānapāramitāyā dūrībhavati,
S06psp_5u:1253: na ca prajñāpāramitāyāḥ kaścid abhiniveśo 'sti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:1254: tathā hy asyāḥ svabhāvo nāsti yatrābhiniviśateḥ.
S06psp_5u:1255_0: sacet punar bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitām api saṃjānīte cyuto bodhisattvo
S06psp_5u:1255_1: mahāsattvaḥ prajñapāramitāyā yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāñ carati sarvadharmeṣu carati. saced asyaivaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_5u:1263: na khalu punaḥ prajñāpāramitāvirahitena śakyānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃboddhum.
S06psp_5u:1264: sacet punar asyaivaṃ bhavatīha prajñāpāramitāyāṃ vyākariṣyaty anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cyuto bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ. sacet punar asyaivaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_5u:1265: ya iha prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā dānapāramitām abhinirhariṣyati,
S06psp_5u:1275: cyuto bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:1279: na hy ādhyātmaśūnyatā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatācyutasya śakyam abhinirharaṇāya,
S06psp_5u:1283: na hi sarvākārajñatā cyutasya śakyam abhinirharaṇāya,
S06psp_5u:1286: aparigṛhītās tathāgatena sarvadharmāḥ svayam abhisaṃbuddhā abhisaṃbudhyākhyātā deśitāḥ prakāśitāś,
S06psp_5u:1287: cyuto bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:1288: na hi tathāgatena kaścid dharmo 'bhisaṃbuddhaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:1292: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:1293: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carata ime doṣā na bhavanti?
S06psp_5u:1294: bhagavān āha: yadā subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann evañ jānāti,
S06psp_5u:1298: saced aparigrahadharmam abhinivaśate virahitaḥ prajñāpāramitayā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:1299: na hi prajñāpāramitābhiniveśena vartitavyā. iti śaktivikalpaḥ
S06psp_5u:1301: subhūtir āha: kiṃ punar bhagavan prajñāpāramita prajñāpāramitayāvirahitā?
S06psp_5u:1321: evaṃ dhyānaṃ vīryaṃ kṣāntiḥ śīlaṃ, tat kathaṃ dānapāramitābhinirhartavyā?
S06psp_5u:1323: bhagavān āha: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran rūpam iti nābhiniviśate,
S06psp_5u:1327: idaṃ vijñānam asya vijñānam. evaṃ skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādāḥ pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni vā nābhiniviśate,
S06psp_5u:1328: ime skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādāḥ pratītyasamutpādāṅgāny asya skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādāḥ pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni ceti,
S06psp_5u:1330: ime sarvadharmā asya sarvadharmāḥ. rūpaṃ nityato vānityato vā duḥkhato vā sukhato vātmato vānātmato vā śūnyato vāśūnyato vā viviktato vāviviktato vā na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_5u:1332: vijñānaṃ nityato vānityato vā duṣkhato vā sukhato vātmato vānātmato vā śūnyato vāśūnyato vā viviktato vāviviktato vā na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_5u:1334: pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni vā nityato vānityato vā duḥkhato vā sukhato vātmato vānātmato vā śūnyato vāśūnyato vā viviktato vāviviktato vā na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_5u:1335: yāvat sarvākārajñatāṃ nityato vānityato vā duṣkhato vā sukhato vātmato vānātmato vā śūnyato vāśūnyato vā viviktato vāviviktato vā na samanupaśyati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:1336: na hi dharmo nityato vānityato vā duṣkhato vā sukhato vātmato vānātmato vā śūnyato vāśūnyato vā viviktato vāviviktato vā saṃvidyate,
S06psp_5u:1338_0: sa khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthito dhyānapāramitāyāṃ
S06psp_5u:1338_1: vīryapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ dānapāramitāyāṃ yāvat sarvākārajñatāyāṃ
S06psp_5u:1338_2: sthāsyati. tadyathāpi nāma subhūte rājñaś cakravartinaś caturaṅgabalakāyo yena yena
S06psp_5u:1339: evam eva subhūte yena yena prajñāpāramitā gacchati tena tenemāḥ pañca pāramitā anuvartante,
S06psp_5u:1340: yena sarvākārajñatā tena sthāsyanti. iti yathecchagamanavyāghātavikalpaḥ
S06psp_5u:1342: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte sārathiś caturaṅgam abhiruhya satmārgeṇa gacchati,
S06psp_5u:1343: evam eva subhūte āsāṃ pañcānāṃ pāramitānāṃ prajñāpāramitā sārathyaṃ karoti samyagmārgeṇa yena sarvākārajñatā tenānugacchati. ity uktā uddeśaniryāṇavikalpāḥ
S06psp_5u:1344: subhūtir āha: katamo bhagavan bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārgaḥ? katamo 'mārgaḥ?
S06psp_5u:1345: bhagavān āha: śrāvakamārgo bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām amārgaḥ,
S06psp_5u:1347: sarvākārajñatāmārgo bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārgaḥ. imau subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārgāmārgau. iti mārgāmārgajñānavikalpaḥ
S06psp_5u:1349: mahākṛtyena bhagavan bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitā pratyupasthitā. evaṃ nayati praṇayati,
S06psp_5u:1351: bhagavān āha: evam etat subhūte evam etat,
S06psp_5u:1352: mahākṛtyeneyaṃ subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitā pratyupasthitā,
S06psp_5u:1355: ayaṃ mārgo 'yam amārga iti. aprameyāṇam asaṃkhyeyānām aparimāṇānāṃ sattvānāṃ kṛtyena pratyupasthitā prajñāpāramitā,
S06psp_5u:1356: na kaścit subhūte praṇayati na rūpaṃ parigṛhṇāti,
S06psp_5u:1357: na vedanāṃ na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān,
S06psp_5u:1359: na śrāvakabhūmer vā na pratyekabudddhabhūmer vā pratyupasthitā,
S06psp_5u:1360: sā khalu punar iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pariṇāyikānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
S06psp_5u:1362: sarvākārajñatāyāś copanāyikā. evam iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā na kasyacid dharmasyotpādikā na nirodhikā dharmasthititāṃ pramāṇīkṛtya.
S06psp_5u:1363: subhūtir āha: yadi bhagavan prajñāpāramitā na kasyacid dharmasyotpādikā na nirodhikā,
S06psp_5u:1364: tat kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā dānaṃ dātavyaṃ?
S06psp_5u:1370: bhagavān āha: sarvākārajñatām ārambaṇīkṛtya dānaṃ dātavyaṃ,
S06psp_5u:1375_0: sarvākārajñatām ārambaṇīkṛtya prajñā bhāvayitavyā. tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena
S06psp_5u:1375_1: tāni kuśalamūlāni sarvasattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau
S06psp_5u:1375_2: pariṇāmayitavyāni. tathā ca pariṇāmayitavyāni yathāsya trividhā buddhir na bhavati,
S06psp_5u:1378_0: kutra vā pariṇāmayati. evaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya imān kuśalān dharmān anuttarāyai
S06psp_5u:1378_1: samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayataḥ ṣaṭpāramitābhāvanā paripūriṅ gacchati yāvad bodhisattvasya
S06psp_5u:1378_2: mahāsattvasya maitrībhāvanā paripūriṅ gacchati yāvat sarvākārajñatābhāvanā paripūriṅ
S06psp_5u:1378_3: gacchati. yaḥ kaścid bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ pāramitābhir avirahitaḥ sarvākārajñatayāvirahito bhavati,
S06psp_5u:1379_0: tasmād bodhisattvena mahāsattvenānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhukāmena ṣaṭsu
S06psp_5u:1379_1: pāramitāsu śikṣitavyaṃ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caritavyam. ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caran bodhisattvo
S06psp_5u:1379_2: mahāsattvaḥ sarvān kuśalān dharmān paripūrya sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyati, tasmād (PSP_5:63)
S06psp_5u:1380: bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ.
S06psp_5u:1382: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ?
S06psp_5u:1383: bhagavān āha: iha subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvenaivaṃ pratyavekṣitavyaṃ,
S06psp_5u:1387: evaṃ skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādāḥ pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni ca na saṃyuktāni na visaṃyuktāni,
S06psp_5u:1390: sarvākārajñatā na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktā evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ.
S06psp_5u:1392: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena na rūpe sthāsyāmīti yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ,
S06psp_5u:1393: na vedanāyāṃ na saṃjñāyāṃ na saṃskāreṣu,
S06psp_5u:1395: evaṃ skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādeṣu na sthāsyāmīti yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ,
S06psp_5u:1396: na pratītyasamutpādāṅgeṣu na sthāsyāmīti yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ,
S06psp_5u:1397: evaṃ na sarvapāramitāsu sthāsyāmīti yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ,
S06psp_5u:1398_0: na sarvaśūnyatāsu na saptatriṃśatsu bodhipakṣyeṣu dharmeṣu nāryasatyāpramāṇadhyānārūpyasamādhisamāpattidhāraṇīmukheṣu
S06psp_5u:1399: na sarvākārajñatāyāṃ sthāsyāmīti yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:1400: na hi rūpaṃ vā kvacit sthitaṃ,
S06psp_5u:1401: na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārā,
S06psp_5u:1403: na skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādāḥ pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni vā kvacit sthitāni,
S06psp_5u:1404_0: evaṃ na pāramitā na śūnyatā na bodhipakṣyā dharmā nāryasatyāpramāṇadhyānārūpyavimokṣasamādhisamāpattidhāraṇīmukhāni
S06psp_5u:1405: na sarvākārajñatā kvacit sthitā. evam asthānayogena bodhisattvena mahāsattvenānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir (PSP_5:64)
S06psp_5u:1407: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte puruṣa āmraphalāni vā panasaphalaṃ vā bhakṣayitukāmaḥ syāt tenāmraphalaṃ panasaphalaṃ vāvaropayitavyam,
S06psp_5u:1409: tasyānupūrveṇa saṃbaddhyamānasya stambasya sāmagrī labhamānasy āmraphalair vā panasaphalair vā sāmagrī bhaviṣyati,
S06psp_5u:1410_0: sa tāny āmraphalāni vā parasaphalāni vā bhakṣiṣyati. evam eva subhūte bodhisattvo
S06psp_5u:1410_1: mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbodhukāmaḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu śikṣitvā
S06psp_5u:1410_2: sattvān dānenānugrahīṣyati śīlena kṣāntyā vīryeṇa dhyānena prajñayānugrahīṣyati sattvān
S06psp_5u:1412: tasmāt tarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvenāparapraṇeyatāṃ gantukāmena,
S06psp_5u:1416: subhūtir āha: prajñāpāramitayā bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam iti vadasi.
S06psp_5u:1417: bhagavān āha: prajñāpāramitayā subhūte prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam iti vadāmi,
S06psp_5u:1418: sarvadharmavaśitām anuprāptukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam iti vadāmi. iti prārthanābhāvavikalpaḥ
S06psp_5u:1422: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte mahāsamudraḥ sarvaratnānāṃ sarvasaritāṃ mukhaṃ,
S06psp_5u:1425: sarvadharmā hi prajñāpāramitā bhāvitāḥ prajñāpāramitā bhavanti,
S06psp_5u:1426: tasmāt tarhi śrāvakayānikair vā pratyekabuddhayānikair vā bodhisattvayānikair vā pudgalair ihaiva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ,
S06psp_5u:1427_0: tasmād bodhisattvena mahāsattvena dānapāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ
S06psp_5u:1427_1: kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ
S06psp_5u:1428: adhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ bahirdhāśūnyatāyāṃ śikṣitavyam adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ,
S06psp_5u:1431_1: śikṣitavyam aṣṭādaśasv āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu śikṣitavyaṃ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_5u:1432: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte iṣvastrācāryo yathānurūpaṃ dhanur gṛhītvā durādharṣo bhavati pratyarthikānāṃ vā pratyamitrāṇāṃ vā,
S06psp_5u:1433_0: evam eva subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāñ caran durādharṣo bhavati
S06psp_5u:1433_1: mārair vā mārakāyikābhir vā devatābhis tasmāt tarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvenānuttarāṃ
S06psp_5u:1434: taṃ ca prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran tam atītānāgatapratyutpannā buddhā bhagavantaḥ samanvāharanti.
S06psp_5u:1435: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:1436: kathaṃ bhagavan buddhā bhagavanto dānapāramitāyāṃ caran taṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ samanvāharanti?
S06psp_5u:1437: śīlapāramitāyāṃ caran taṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ samanvāharanti,
S06psp_5u:1438: kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ caran taṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ samanvāharanti,
S06psp_5u:1439: vīryapāramitāyāṃ caran taṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ samanvāharanti,
S06psp_5u:1440: dhyānapāramitāyāṃ caran taṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ samanvāharanti,
S06psp_5u:1441: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran taṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ samanvāharanti,
S06psp_5u:1442: adhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ caran taṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ samanvāharanti,
S06psp_5u:1443: yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ caran taṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ samanvāharanti,
S06psp_5u:1444_1: caran tam abhijñāsu śūnyatānimittāpraṇihiteṣu caran taṃ daśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvitsv
S06psp_5u:1445: kathaṃ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ caran taṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ samanvāharanti?
S06psp_5u:1446: evam utkte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:1447: iha subhūte atītānāgatapratyutpannā buddhā bhagavanto bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran taṃ samanvāharanti,
S06psp_5u:1448: tathā ca samanvāharanti yatra naiva dānaṃ na śīlan na kṣāntir na vīryan na dhyānaṃ na prajñopalabhyate. evam anupalambhena bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ samanvāharanti,
S06psp_5u:1449: yatra nādhyātmaśūnyatā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā smṛtyupasthānasamyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgā nopalabhyante, yatra (PSP_5:66)
S06psp_5u:1451: yatra sarvākārajñatā nopalabhyate. evam anupalambhayogena bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ samanvāharanti.
S06psp_5u:1452: punar aparaṃ subhūte buddhā bhagavanto bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ na rūpataḥ samanvāharanti,
S06psp_5u:1453: na vedanāto na saṃjñāto na saṃskārato,
S06psp_5u:1455: na skandhato na dhātuto nāyatanato na pratītyasamutpādato na pratītyasamutpādāṅgataḥ samanvāharanti,
S06psp_5u:1456: na dānapāramitāto na śīlapāramitāto na kṣāntipāramitāto na vīryapāramitāto na dhyānapāramitāto na prajñāpāramitātaḥ samanvāharanti,
S06psp_5u:1461: na sarvākārajñatātaḥ samanvāharanti. iti pratyarthikadharmopalambhavikalpaḥ ity ukto navavidho dvitīyo grāhakavikalpaḥ
S06psp_5u:1462: atha khalu subhūtiḥ sthaviraḥ śakran devānām indram etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:1463: yat tvaṃ kauśikaivaṃ vadasi gambhīreyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā,
S06psp_5u:1464: duṣkarakārakā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā yeṣāṃ gambhīreṣu dharmeṣu na bhavati kāṅkṣāyitatvaṃ vā dhanvāyitatvaṃ vā,
S06psp_5u:1465: śūnyeṣu kauśika sarvadharmeṣu kasyātra kāṅkṣāyitatvaṃ vā dhanvāyitvaṃ vā bhaviṣyati?
S06psp_5u:1466: evam ukte śakro devānām indraḥ subhūtisthaviram etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:1467: yadyad eva subhūtiḥ sthaviro nirdiśati sarvan tac chūnyatām evārabhya nirdiśati na kvacit sajjati,
S06psp_5u:1468: tadyathāpi nāmeṣur antarīkṣe kṣipto na kvacit sajjati,
S06psp_5u:1469: evam eva subhūteḥ sthavirasya dharmadeśanā na kvacit sajjati.
S06psp_5u:1470: atha khalu sakro devānām indro bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:1471: kaccid ahaṃ bhagavann evaṃ bhāṣamāṇa evam upadiśann uktavādī ca bhagavato dharmavādī ca dharmasya cānudharmaṃ samyag vyākurvan vyākaromi?
S06psp_5u:1473: samyak khalu tvaṃ kauśika evaṃ bhāṣamāṇa evam upadiśaṃs tathāgatasyoktavādī ca dharmavādī ca dharmasya cānudharmaṃ (PSP_5:67)
S06psp_5u:1476: āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvad eva subhūteḥ sthavirasya pratibhāti sarvan tac chūnyatāṃ caivārabhya pratibhāti,
S06psp_5u:1482: evam ukte bhagavān śakran devānām indram etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:1483: subhūtiḥ kauśika sthaviraḥ śūnyatāyāṃ viharan dānapāramitāñ caiva nopalabhate,

S06psp_5u:1485: kaḥ punar vādo ye prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranti. smṛtyupasthānāny eva nopalabhate,
S06psp_5u:1486: kaḥ punar vādo ye smṛtyupasthānāni bhāvayanti,

S06psp_5u:1521_0: anupalambhavihārī śūnyatāvihāry ānimittavihāry apraṇihitavihārī kauśika ya eṣa subhūteḥ
S06psp_5u:1521_1: sthavirasya vihāraḥ sa bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato vihārasya
S06psp_5u:1521_2: śatatamīm api kalān nopaiti sahasratamīm api śatasahasratamīm api kotītamīm api koṭīśatatamīm
S06psp_5u:1521_3: api koṭīsahasratamīm api koṭīśatasahasratamīm api saṃkhyām api kalām api gaṇanām
S06psp_5u:1521_4: apy upamām apy aupamyam apy upaniśām apy upaniṣadam api nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:1522_0: tathā hi tathāgatavihāraṃ sthāpayitvā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāñ
S06psp_5u:1522_1: carato yo vihāraḥ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ ca ye vihārās teṣāṃ vihārāṇām ayaṃ
S06psp_5u:1522_2: bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāñ carato yo vihāraḥ so 'gra ākhyāyate,
S06psp_5u:1530: niruttama ākhyāyate. tasmāt tarhi kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvenāgratāṃ gantukāmenānena vihāreṇa vihartavyaṃ yad uta prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇa. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:1531: atra hi kauśika prajñāpāramitāyāñ caran bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmim atikrāmati,
S06psp_5u:1535: sarvākārajñatām anuprāpya tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sarvavāsanānusaṃdhikleśaprahāno bhaviṣyati.
S06psp_5u:1536_0: atha khalu tasyāṃ parṣadi devās trayastriṃśā māndāravāṇi puṣpāṇi gṛhītvā bhagavantam
S06psp_5u:1536_1: avakiranti smābhyavakiranti smābhiprakiranti sma. ṣaṣṭiñ ca bhikṣūṇāṃ śatam utsthāyāsanebhya
S06psp_5u:1536_2: ekāṃśañ cīvaraṃ prāvṛtya dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃs
S06psp_5u:1537_0: teṣāṃ ca bhikṣūṇām añjalayaḥ praṇāmitā buddhānubhāvena māndāravaiḥ puṣpaiḥ paripūrṇā
S06psp_5u:1537_1: abhūvaṃs te ca māndāravaiḥ puṣpais tathāgatam arhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddham avakiranti
S06psp_5u:1538: smāvakiranto 'bhyavakiranto 'bhiprakiranta evaṃ ca vācam udīrayanti sma:
S06psp_5u:1539: vayaṃ bhagavann etena kuśalamūlenaitenottamena vihāreṇa vihariṣyāmo yatra nāgatiḥ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānām iti.
S06psp_5u:1540_0: atha khalu bhagavāṃs tasyā velāyāṃ teṣāṃ bhikṣūṇām adhyāśayaṃ viditvā smitaṃ praduṣkaroti
S06psp_5u:1540_1: sma. dharmatā khalu punar eṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ yadā smitaṃ prāduṣkurvanti tadā
S06psp_5u:1540_2: khalv anekavarṇā nānāvarṇā arciṣo bhagavato mukhadvārān niścaranti sma,
S06psp_5u:1541_0: tadyathā nīlāḥ pītā lohitā avadātā māñjiṣṭhā rajatavarṇās trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ
S06psp_5u:1541_1: lokadhātum avabhāsya punar evāgatya buddhān bhagavatas triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavato
S06psp_5u:1542_0: atha khalv āyuṣmān ānanda utthāyāsanād ekāṃśaṃ cīvaraṃ prāvṛtya dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ
S06psp_5u:1542_1: pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantam etad avocat: ko bhagavan hetuḥ?
S06psp_5u:1544: smitasya prāduṣkaraṇāya nāhetukan nāpratyayan tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ smitaṃ prāduṣkurvanti.
S06psp_5u:1545: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ ānanadam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:1546: imāny ānanda ṣaṣṭir bhikṣuśatāny anāgate 'dhvani tārakopame kalpe 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyante,
S06psp_5u:1548: teṣāṃ khalu punar ānandāvakīrṇakusumanāmnāṃ tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ samasamo bhikṣusaṃgho bhaviṣyati,
S06psp_5u:1551_0: viṃśativarṣasahasraṃ yato yato 'bhiniṣkramiṣyanti abhiniṣkramya pravrajiṣyanti pravrajitvā
S06psp_5u:1551_1: yatra yatra vihariṣyanti tatra tatra pañcavarṇikānāṃ kusumānāṃ kusumavarṣāṇi pravarṣiṣyanti.
S06psp_5u:1551_2: tasmāt tarhy ānanda uttamena vihāreṇa vihartukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
S06psp_5u:1551_3: caritavyaṃ tathāgatavihāreṇa vihartukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyam.
S06psp_5u:1553_0: yo hi kaścit kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ cariṣyati
S06psp_5u:1553_1: niṣṭhā tenānanda kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā evaṃ gantavyā manuṣyebhyo vāhaṃ cyutvehopapannas
S06psp_5u:1556: tuṣiteṣu deveṣv iyaṃ gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā vistareṇa śrutā bhaviṣyati,
S06psp_5u:1557: tathāgatavyavalokayitās te ānanda bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bhaviṣyanti ya iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ cariṣyanti.
S06psp_5u:1558: yaḥ kaścid ānandan kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śroṣyaty udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati,
S06psp_5u:1559_0: bodhisattvayānikānāṃ vā pudgalānām imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitām upadekṣyaty anuśāsiṣyati
S06psp_5u:1559_1: niṣṭhā tenānanda kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vānugantavyā saṃmukhaṃ mayā teṣāṃ tathāgatānām
S06psp_5u:1559_2: arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānām antikād iyaṃ gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā śrutābhūt,
S06psp_5u:1560: udgrahītā ca dhāritā ca vācitā ca paryavāptā cābhūt,
S06psp_5u:1561: teṣu ca tathāgateṣv arhatsu samyaksaṃbuddheṣu kuśalamūlam avaropitam abhūt,
S06psp_5u:1562: na śrāvakāṇām antike kuśalamūlam avaropitaṃ nāpi śrāvakāṇām antikād iyaṃ gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā śrutveti.
S06psp_5u:1563: yaḥ kaścid ānanda kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati,
S06psp_5u:1564: arthataś ca dharmataś ca vinayataś cānugamiṣyati niṣṭhānanda tena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vānugantavyā saṃmukhībhūto 'haṃ tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānām iti,
S06psp_5u:1565: yaḥ kaścid ānanda kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāṃ śrutvā na pratikrokṣyati na prativahiṣyati prasādaṃ pratilapsyate,
S06psp_5u:1566: pūrvajinakṛtādhikāraḥ sa ānanda kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā veditavyaḥ,
S06psp_5u:1569_0: kiṃ cāpy ānanda yena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntike
S06psp_5u:1569_1: kuśalamūlam avaropitaṃ sa na tad visaṃvādayiṣyati śrāvakatvāya vā pratyekabuddhatvāya
S06psp_5u:1569_2: vā. api tu khalu punar ānanda supratisaṃviditena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena bhavitavyaṃ,
S06psp_5u:1570: dānapāramitāyāṃ caratā śīlapāramitāyāṃ caratā kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ caratā vīryapāramitāyāṃ caratā dhyānapāramitāyāṃ caratā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā,
S06psp_5u:1573_0: ānanda bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāñ caran śīlapāramitāyāṃ caran kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ
S06psp_5u:1573_1: caran vīryapāramitāyāṃ caran dhyānapāramitāyāṃ caran prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na śrāvakatvāya
S06psp_5u:1573_2: vā na pratyekabuddhatvāya vā sthāsyati. tasmāt tarhy ānandānuparīndāmi ta imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ,
S06psp_5u:1574_0: sacet punas tvaṃ ānanda yo mayā dharmo deśitaḥ sthāpitvā prajñāpāramitāṃ sarvāntāṃ
S06psp_5u:1574_1: dharmadeśanām udgṛhya paryavāpya punar eva nāśayeḥ punar evotsṛjer na me tvam ānanda
S06psp_5u:1575: sacet tvam ānandemāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhya paryavāpya ekapadam api nāśayer utsṛjes tāvatā me tvaṃ ānandāparāddhaḥ syāḥ,
S06psp_5u:1576_0: sacet tvaṃ ānandemāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhya paryavāpya dve padam api punar
S06psp_5u:1576_1: eva nāśayeḥ punar evotsṛjes tāvatā me tvaṃ ānandāparāddhaḥ syāḥ. tasmāt tarhy ānandānuparīndāmi
S06psp_5u:1576_2: te tathemāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ paṭheyam udgrahītavyā dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā
S06psp_5u:1576_3: paryavāptavyā pravartayitavyā yoniśaś ca manasikartavyā bhavet,
S06psp_5u:1577: tvayā ca suvyaktena suparigṛhītenākṣarapadavyañjanena suniruktā ca suparigṛhītā ca kartavyā.
S06psp_5u:1578_0: yaḥ kaścid ānanda kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhīṣyati
S06psp_5u:1578_1: dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati
S06psp_5u:1578_2: tena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vātītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ
S06psp_5u:1579_0: yo hy ānanda tarhi māṃ saṃmukhībhūtaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā satkuryād gurukuryāt
S06psp_5u:1579_2: gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā udgṛhītavyā dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā pravartayitavyā
S06psp_5u:1579_3: yoniśaś ca manasikartavyā satkartavyā gurukartavyā mānayitavyā pūjayitavyā puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākābhiḥ
S06psp_5u:1579_4: prajñāpāramitāṃ satkurvan tu gurukurvan mānayan pūjayan tena pūjito bhavāmi,
S06psp_5u:1580: atītānāgatapratyutpannāś ca buddhā bhagavantaḥ pūjitā bhavanti.
S06psp_5u:1581: yaḥ kaścid ānanda kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā,
S06psp_5u:1582: imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāṃ śrutvā gauravaṃ ca prema ca prasādaṃ (PSP_5:72)
S06psp_5u:1583_0: cotpādayiṣyati atītānāgatapratyutpannanāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatām antike tena gauravañ
S06psp_5u:1583_1: ca prema ca prasādaś cotpādito bhaviṣyati yathā te 'ham ānanda priyaś ca manaāpaś
S06psp_5u:1583_2: cāparityaktaś ca tatheyaṃ gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā priyā manaāpāparityaktā bhavatu
S06psp_5u:1583_3: yathā ekapadam api ta ito gambhīrāyā prajñāpāramitāyā na nāśayitavyaṃ,
S06psp_5u:1584: bahv api te 'ham ānanda bhāṣe prajñāpāramitāyā parīndanām ārabhya saṃkṣiptenānanda yādṛśas te 'haṃ śāstā tādṛśī te prajñāpāramitā śāstā,
S06psp_5u:1585: tasmāt tarhy ānanda prajñāpāramitā yā apramāṇāni parīndanāni,
S06psp_5u:1586: ahaṃ ca te ānandemāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitām anuparīndāmi,
S06psp_5u:1587_0: tasmāt tarhy ānanda sadevamānuṣāsurasya lokasyārocayāmi yasyāparityakto buddho 'parityakto
S06psp_5u:1589: yaḥ kaścid ānanda kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati,
S06psp_5u:1590: pareṣāñ cemāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitām anekaparyāyeṇa vistareṇākhyāsyati deśayiṣyati prajñāpayiṣyati prasthāpayiṣyati vivariṣyati vibhajiṣyaty uttānīkariṣyati saṃprakāśayiṣyati,
S06psp_5u:1591: sa khalu punar ānanda kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā kṣipram anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate,
S06psp_5u:1592: abhyāsannaś ca bhaviṣyati sarvākārajñatāyāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:1593_0: prajñāpāramitā nirjātā hy ānanda buddhānāṃ bhagavatām anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ. ye

S06psp_5u:1595: bodhisattvena mahāsattvenānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbodhukāmena iha prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:1596: eṣā hy ānanda bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mātājanayitrī yad uta prajñāpāramitā,
S06psp_5u:1597_0: ye kecid ānanda bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣiṣyante sarve te niryāsyanty
S06psp_5u:1597_1: anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau. tasmāt tarhy ānandemāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhūyasyā mātrayānuparīndāmi. tat kasya hetoḥ?

S06psp_5u:1599_0: akṣayo hy eṣa kośo yad uta prajñāpāramitākośaḥ. ye 'pi te ānanda pūrvasyāṃ diśi dakṣiṇasyāṃ
S06psp_5u:1599_1: paścimāyām uttarasyām adha ūrdhvaṃ vidikṣu daśadiglokadhātuṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ

S06psp_5u:1600_3: ānanda bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya ekam api prajñāpāramitā pratisaṃyuktaṃ padaṃ deśayeḥ prakāśayer,

S06psp_5u:1610: tiṣṭhatv ānanda purobhaktaṃ saced yāvan nālikāntaraṃ,
S06psp_5u:1611: saced yāvat kṣaṇaṃ vā yāval lavaṃ vā,
S06psp_5u:1612: tiṣṭhatv ānanda lavam antaśo nimeṣamātram api,
S06psp_5u:1613: ayaṃ ānanda tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet. yaḥ śrāvakayānikaḥ pudgalo bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktan dharman deśayet,

S06psp_5u:1616_0: tathā hi sa ātmanā cānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhukāmaḥ parāṃś cānuttarāyai
S06psp_5u:1616_1: samyaksaṃbodhaye saṃpraharṣayati samuttejayati samādāpayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati.

S06psp_5u:1616_4: bahirdhāśūnyatāyāṃ caran yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ carann apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattiṣu
S06psp_5u:1616_7: caran kuśalamūlair vivardhamāno 'sthānam anavakāśo yad anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ
S06psp_5u:1616_8: parihāsyate nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate. asyāṃ khalu punaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ
S06psp_5u:1616_9: catasraḥ pariṣado devamanuṣyayaksagandharvāsuragaruḍakiṃnaramahoragāś ca saṃnipatitāḥ saṃniṣanṇā abhūvan.
S06psp_5u:1618_0: atha khalu bhagavāṃś catasṛṇāṃ parṣadāṃ puratas tathārūpam ṛddhyabhisaṃskāram abhisaṃskṛtavān

S06psp_5u:1621_0: yenarddhyabhisaṃskāreṇa pratisaṃhṛtena tāś catasraḥ pariṣado na bhūyaḥ paśyanti sma.
S06psp_5u:1621_1: tam aksobhyaṃ tathāgatam arhantāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ śrāvakayānikā vā pratyekabuddhayānikā
S06psp_5u:1621_2: vā bodhisattvayānikā vā pudgalās tañ ca buddhakṣetram akṣobhyasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ

S06psp_5u:1623: atha khalu bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ ānandam āmantrayate sma:
S06psp_5u:1624: evaṃ hy ānanda sarvadharmāś cakṣuṣo nābhāsam āgacchanti,

S06psp_5u:1638_2: trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātuḥ nikṣipto veti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:1639_0: iyaṃ sānanda prajñāpāramitāśikṣā yatra śikṣitvā buddhānāṃ bhagavatām atītānāgatapratyutpanneṣu
S06psp_5u:1639_1: dharmeṣu asaṅgajñānadarśanam utpannaṃ yāvatya ānanda śikṣāḥ sarvāsām ānanda śikṣānām
S06psp_5u:1640: ākāśasya ānanda pramāṇaṃ vā paryantaṃ vā udgṛhītavyaṃ manyeta yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ pramāṇaṃ vā paryantaṃ vā grahītavyaṃ manyeta. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:1644: na prajñāpāramitā pramāṇabaddhā. iti mahābodhiprāptaye puṇyabāhulyalakṣaṇaṃ tṛtīyaṃ kāraṇam ity uktāni kāraṇāni

S06psp_5u:1648: akṣayatvād ānanda prajñāpāramitāpramāṇabaddhā viviktād ānanda prajñāpāramitā pramāṇabaddhā,

S06psp_5u:1650_0: ye 'pi te ānanda bhaviṣyanty anāgate 'dhvani tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās
S06psp_5u:1650_1: te 'pi buddhā bhagavanta ita eva prajñāpāramitātaḥ prabhāviṣyante na ca prajñāpāramitā
S06psp_5u:1651: ye 'pi te ānanda etarhi daśadiśi loke tathāgatā arhantaḥ (PSP_5:77)
S06psp_5u:1652_0: samyaksaṃbuddhās tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti dharman deśayanti te 'pi buddhā bhagavanta

S06psp_5u:1653: ākāśaṃ sa ānanda kṣayituṃ manyeta yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ kṣayaṃ manyeta na ca prajñāpāramitā kṣīṇā kṣīyate kṣeṣyate,

S06psp_5u:1656: smṛtyupasthānasamyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgā na kṣīṇā na kṣīyante na kṣeṣyante,
S06psp_5u:1657: āryasatyāpramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattayo na kṣīṇā na kṣīyante na kṣeṣyante,
S06psp_5u:1658: śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitābhijñā na kṣīṇā na kṣīyante na kṣeṣyante,
S06psp_5u:1659_0: sarvavimokṣasamādhisamāpattidhāraṇīmukhāni na kṣīṇā na kṣīyante na kṣeṣyante daśatathāgatabalāni
S06psp_5u:1659_1: catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikābuddhadharmā na kṣīṇā na
S06psp_5u:1660: sarvākārajñatā na kṣīṇā na kṣīyate na kṣeṣyate. na hi teṣāṃ dharmāṇām utpādo 'sti yeṣām utpādo nāsti,
S06psp_5u:1663: atha khalu bhagavāñ jihvendriyaṃ nirṇāmya sarvāvantaṃ mukhamaṇḍalaṃ jihvendriyeṇācchādayitvāyuṣmantaṃ ānandam etad avocat: tat kiṃ manyase?
S06psp_5u:1664: ānandāpi nu īdṛśaṃ jihvendriyaṃ vitathavādi anyathāvādi syāt.
S06psp_5u:1665: ānanda āha: na bhagavan na sugata.
S06psp_5u:1667: tasmāt tarhy ānanda imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ catasṛṇāṃ parṣadāṃ vistareṇākhyāhi deśaya prajñāpaya prasthāpaya vibhaja vibhāvayottānīkuru saṃprakāśaya,
S06psp_5u:1668: ihaivānanda gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sarvadharmā vistareṇopadiṣṭā yatra śrāvakayānikaiś ca pratyekabuddhayānikaiś ca bodhisattvayānikaiś ca pudgalaiḥ śikṣitavyaṃ,
S06psp_5u:1670: iyaṃ punar ānanda gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā sarvākṣarapraveśa sarvānakṣarapraveśā,
S06psp_5u:1671: iyam ānanda gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā sarvadhāraṇīnāṃ mukhaṃ,
S06psp_5u:1673: dhāraṇīṃ dhārayatāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ sarvāḥ pratibhānapratisaṃvido bhaviṣyantiyam ānanda gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā,
S06psp_5u:1675: tasmāt tarhy ānandārocayāmi te prativedayāmi te,
S06psp_5u:1676_0: ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati
S06psp_5u:1676_1: yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati so 'tītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ bodhiṃ dhārayiṣyati,
S06psp_5u:1677: iyaṃ sānanda prajñāpāramitā dhāraṇy uktā mayā,
S06psp_5u:1678: tāṃ tvaṃ prajñāpāramitādhāraṇīṃ dhārayan sarvadharmān dhārayasi. ity uktaṃ mahābodhau saṃpratyayakāraṇam
S06psp_5u:1679: atha khalv āyuṣmataḥ subhūter etad abhavat: gambhīrā bateyaṃ tathāgatānāṃ bodhiḥ,
S06psp_5u:1681: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat: akṣayā hi bhagavan prajñāpāramitā.
S06psp_5u:1682: bhagavān āha: ākāśākṣayatvāt subhūte akṣayā prajñāpāramitā.
S06psp_5u:1685: vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānākṣayatvāt subhūte prajñāpāramitābhinir hartavyā. evaṃ skandhadhātvāyatanākṣayatvāt subhūte prajñāpāramitābhinirhartavyā,
S06psp_5u:1689: evaṃ śīlapāramitākṣayatvāt kṣāntipāramitākṣayatvād vīryapāramitākṣayatvād dhyānapāramitākṣayatvāt prajñāpāramitākṣayatvāt subhūte prajñāpāramitābhinirhartavyā,
S06psp_5u:1693: subhūte prajñāpāramitābhinirhartavyā śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitākṣayatvena pañcābhijñākṣayatvena subhūte prajñāpāramitābhinirhartavyā,
S06psp_5u:1695: daśabalākṣayatvena caturvaiśāradyākṣayatvena pratisaṃvidakṣayatvenāṣṭādaśāveṇikābuddha dharmākṣayatvena subhūte prajñāpāramitābhinirhartavyā,
S06psp_5u:1697: punar aparaṃ subhūte rūpākāśākṣayatvena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitābhinirhartavyā,
S06psp_5u:1719: iyaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pratītyasamutpādavyavalokanā ādyantavivarjitā,
S06psp_5u:1720: āveṇiko 'yaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dharmo bodhimaṇḍaniṣaṇṇasya yad evaṃ pratītyasamutpādaṃ vyavalokayaty,
S06psp_5u:1721_0: evaṃ vyavalokayan pratītyasamutpādaṃ sarvajñajñānaṃ pratilapsyate. yaḥ kaścit subhūte
S06psp_5u:1721_1: bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nenākāśākṣayābhinirhāreṇa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran pratītyasamutpādaṃ vyavalokayiṣyati,

S06psp_5u:1724: sa sarva imaṃ prajñāpāramitāmanasikāram anāgamya vivartiṣyati,

S06psp_5u:1727_0: iti. ye kecit subhūte bodhisattvayānikāḥ pudgalā vivartante sarve ta idam upāyakauśalyam
S06psp_5u:1727_1: anāgamya vivartante 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ. ye kecit subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā
S06psp_5u:1727_2: na vivartante 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ sarve ta imāṃ prajñāpāramitām āgamya na
S06psp_5u:1727_3: vivartante 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodher upāyakauśalyena. evaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā
S06psp_5u:1727_4: bodhisattvena mahāsattven ākāśākṣayābhinirhāreṇa prajñāpāramitā vyavalokayitavyā abhinirhartavyā.
S06psp_5u:1728: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pratītyasamutpādaṃ vyavalokayan na kaṃcid dharmaṃ samanupaśyati,
S06psp_5u:1729: ahetukam utpadyamānan na kaṃcid dharmaṃ samanupaśyati,
S06psp_5u:1730_0: nirudhyamānan na kaṃcid dharmam ātmataḥ samanupaśyati na sattvato na jīvato na jantuto
S06psp_5u:1730_1: na poṣato na puruṣato na pudgalato na manujato na mānavato na kārakato notthāpakato
S06psp_5u:1730_2: na samutthāpakato na vedakato na vedāpakato na jānakato na jānāpakato na paśyakato na paśyāpakato,
S06psp_5u:1731: na nityato nānityataḥ samanupaśyati na sukhato na duṣkhato nātmakato nānātmakato na śāntato nāśāntataḥ.
S06psp_5u:1732: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pratītyasamutpādo (PSP_5:81)
S06psp_5u:1734_0: yasmin samaye subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāñ carati tasmin samaye
S06psp_5u:1734_1: rūpaṃ na samanupaśyati nityaṃ vā anityaṃ vā sukhaṃ vā duṣkhaṃ vā ātmā vā anātmā vā
S06psp_5u:1734_2: śāntaṃ vā aśāntaṃ vā śubhaṃ vā aśubhaṃ vā,

S06psp_5u:2125_2: viharati. vitarkavicārāṇāṃ vyupaśamād adhyātmaṃ saṃprasādāc cetasa ekotībhāvād avitarkam
S06psp_5u:2125_3: avicāraṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ dvitīyaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati. prīteś ca virāgād upekṣako viharati,

S06psp_5u:2128_0: upekṣakaḥ smṛtimān sukhavihārī tṛtīyaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati. sukhasya ca
S06psp_5u:2128_1: prahāṇād duḥkhasya ca prahāṇāt pūrvam eva saumanasyadaurmanasyayor astaṃgamād aduḥkhāsukham
S06psp_5u:2129: sa dhyānānāṃ dhyānāṅgānāṃ nimittaṃ na gṛhṇāti,

S06psp_5u:2133: sa parasattvānāṃ parapudgalānāṃ cetasaiva cittaṃ prajānāti,
S06psp_5u:2134: vistareṇa yāvad anuttaraṃ cittam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāty,
S06psp_5u:2136: vistareṇa yāvad divyena cakṣuṣā viśuddhenātikrāntamānuṣyakena yāvad yathākarmopagān sattvān paśyati,
S06psp_5u:2137: sa iha pañcasv abhijñāsu pratiṣṭhāya buddhakṣetreṇa buddhakṣetraṃ gacchati,
S06psp_5u:2138: buddhān bhagavataḥ paryupāste paripṛcchati paripraśnīkaroti kuśalamūlāny avaropayati,
S06psp_5u:2140: ca kuśalamulāni na śrāvakabhūmau vā na pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā pariṇāmayaty,
S06psp_5u:2141: anyatra sarvasattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ sādhāraṇāni kṛtvānuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati,
S06psp_5u:2142: tathā ca pariṇāmayati yathāsya trividhā buddhir na bhavati,
S06psp_5u:2145: kutra vā pariṇāmayati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhyānapāramitāyāṃ sthito vīryapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti.
S06psp_5u:2147: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhyānapāramitāyāṃ sthitaḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti?
S06psp_5u:2148: bhagavān āha: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhyānapāramitāyāṃ sthito rūpaṃ nopalabhate,
S06psp_5u:2167: anutpādayamāno na nirodhayati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:2168: tathā hi subhūte utpādād vā tathāgatānām anutpādād vā tathāgatānāṃ sthitaivaiṣā dharmāṇāṃ dharmasthititā dharmaniyāmatā sā naivotpadyate na nirudhyate,
S06psp_5u:2169: so 'vikṣiptacittasarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair avirahito bhavati. tac ca kuśalamūlaṃ sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvānuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati,
S06psp_5u:2170: tathā ca pariṇāmayati yathāsya trividhā buddhir na bhavati,
S06psp_5u:2173: kutra vā pariṇāmayati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhyānapāramitāyāṃ sthitaḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti.
S06psp_5u:2174: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:2175: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā dānapāramitāṃ paripūrayati?
S06psp_5u:2178: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sarvadharmāḥ śūnyā iti samanupaśyati. kathaṃ ca subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadharmāḥ śūnyā iti samanupaśyati?
S06psp_5u:2179: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann adhyātmaśūnyatādhyātmaśūnyateti nopalabhate,
S06psp_5u:2181: yāvad abhāvaśūnyatā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyateti nopalabhate. sa āsu śūnyatāsu sthitvā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo rūpan nopalabhate śūnyam iti vā aśūnyam iti vā,
S06psp_5u:2183: vijñānaṃ nopalabhate śūnyam iti vā aśūnyam iti vā,
S06psp_5u:2184: skandhadhātvāyatanāni nopalabhate śūnyānīti vā aśūnyānīti vā,
S06psp_5u:2185: pratītyasamutpādaṃ pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni vā nopalabhate śūnyānīti vā aśūnyānīti vā,
S06psp_5u:2186: sarvapāramitā nopalabhate śūnyā iti vā aśūnyā iti vā,
S06psp_5u:2187: smṛtyupasthānasamyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgā nopalabhate śūnyā iti vā aśūnyā iti vā,
S06psp_5u:2188: āryasatyāpramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattayo nopalabhate sūnyā iti vā aśūnyā iti vā,
S06psp_5u:2190: śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitāni nopalabhate śūnyānīti vā aśūnyānīti vā,
S06psp_5u:2191: abhijñādaśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidāveṇikābuddhadharmā nopalabhate śūnyā iti vā aśūnyā iti vā,
S06psp_5u:2192: anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir nopalabhate śūnyeti vā aśūnyeti vā,
S06psp_5u:2193_0: saṃskṛto vā dhātur asaṃskṛto vā dhātur nopalabhate śūnya iti vā aśūnya iti vā. sa
S06psp_5u:2193_1: iha prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yadyad eva dānan dadāty annaṃ
S06psp_5u:2193_2: vā pānaṃ vā śayanaṃ vā āvasathaṃ vā glānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraṃ vā vastraṃ vā
S06psp_5u:2193_3: suvarṇaṃ vā rūpyaṃ vā maṇimuktāśaṅkhaśilāpravālādīni vā puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapaṭākā
S06psp_5u:2193_4: vā yāvad anyatarānyatarāṇi mānuṣyakāṇi pariṣkāropakaraṇāni dadāti. sa tad dānaṃ śūnyam
S06psp_5u:2194: yo vā dadāti yasyaivā dadāti tad api śūnyam iti aśūnyam iti nopalabhate,
S06psp_5u:2195: tasya mātsaryacittasya codgrahacittasya vāvakāśo na bhavati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:2196: sarva ete dharmāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya (PSP_5:98)
S06psp_5u:2198: prathamacittotpadam upādāya yāvad bodhimaṇḍaniṣaṇṇasya yathā caiva tathāgatasyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya na mātsaryacittaṃ vodgrahacittaṃ votpadyate,
S06psp_5u:2199: tathaiva bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato mātsaryacittaṃ vā udgrahacittaṃ vā nopapadyate,
S06psp_5u:2200: evam eva subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ śāstā yad uta prajñāpāramitā,
S06psp_5u:2201: tāni ca kuśalamūlāni sarvasattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvānuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati,
S06psp_5u:2202: tathā ca pariṇāmayati yathāsya trividhā buddhir na bhavati,
S06psp_5u:2205: kutra vā pariṇāmayati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā dānapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti.
S06psp_5u:2207: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā śīlapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti?
S06psp_5u:2209: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsatttvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā na śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmicittānām avakāśaṃ dadāti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:2212: yac chrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā pariṇāmayati,
S06psp_5u:2218_0: ye 'pi cānye prāṇātipātāt prativiratā bhavanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhavati samanujñaḥ.
S06psp_5u:2218_1: evam adattādānāt kāmamithyācārāt mṛṣāvādāt paruṣavacanāt piśunavacanād abaddhapralāpād
S06psp_5u:2222: ye 'pi cānye mithyādṛṣṭeḥ prativiratā bhavanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhavati samanujñaḥ. tena ca śīlena na kaścid dharmaṃ parāmṛśati śrāvakatvaṃ vā pratyekabuddhatvaṃ vā,
S06psp_5u:2223: prāg evānyad vā tāni ca kuśalamūlāni sarvasattveṣu sādhāraṇāni kṛtvānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati,

S06psp_5u:2229: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā kṣāntipāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti?
S06psp_5u:2231: iha subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitasyānulomikī kṣāntir utpadyate,
S06psp_5u:2233_0: iha na kaścid dharma utpadyate vā nirudhyate vā mriyate vā ākruṣyate vā paribhāṣyate
S06psp_5u:2233_1: vā cchidyate vā bhidyate vā hanyate vā tasya prathamacittotpādam upādāya yāvad bodhimaṇḍaniṣaṇṇasya
S06psp_5u:2233_2: yadi sarvasattvā āgamyākroṣayur vā paribhāṣeran vā loṣṭadaṇḍaśastraprahārān dadyuś
S06psp_5u:2236: na iha kaścid dharma ākruṣyate vā paribhāṣyate vā cchidyate vā bhidyate vā hanyate vā,
S06psp_5u:2237: sa tāni kuśalamūlāni sarvasattvasādhāraṇāni kṛtvānuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati,
S06psp_5u:2238: tathā ca pariṇāmayati yathāsya trividhā buddhir na bhavati,
S06psp_5u:2241: kutra vā parinamayati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā kṣāntipāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti.
S06psp_5u:2243: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā vīryapāramitāṃ parigarhnāti?

S06psp_5u:2245_1: upāyakauśalyena samanvāgataḥ kāyikañ ca caitasikañ ca vīryaṃ saṃjanayyānyaṃ lokadhātum api gatvā,
S06psp_5u:2247: lokadhātusahasram api gatvā lokadhātuśatasahasram api gatvā lokadhātukoṭīniyutaśatasahasram api gatvā sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati. dānapāramitāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati,

S06psp_5u:2269: bhagavān āha: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā,
S06psp_5u:2271: yāvantaḥ kecit samādhayaḥ śrāvakasamādhir vā pratyekabuddhasamādhir vā tān sarvān samāpadyate ca vyuttiṣṭhate ca,
S06psp_5u:2272: samādhau sthitvā aṣṭau vimokṣān anulomaṃ pratilomaṃ samāpadyate ca vyuttiṣṭhate ca. katamān aṣṭau vimokṣān?

S06psp_5u:2274_1: vimokṣaḥ. śūnyatvenādhimuktaḥ śūnyatve cādhimukto bhavaty ayaṃ tṛtīyo vimokṣaḥ. sukhasya
