S06psp_5u:2314_1: savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati.
S06psp_5u:2315: tṛtīyaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati caturthaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati,
S06psp_5u:2316: ākāśānantyāyatanasamāpattiṃ vijñānānantyāyatanasamāpattiṃ ākiṃcanyāyatanasamāpattin naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasamāpattim upasaṃpadya viharati,
S06psp_5u:2323: caturthād dhyānād vyutthāya tṛtīyaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate,
S06psp_5u:2324: tṛtīyād dhyānād vyutthāya dvitīyaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate,
S06psp_5u:2325_0: dvitīyād dhyānād vyutthāya prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate. sa imaṃ siṃhavijṛmbhitaṃ
S06psp_5u:2325_1: samādhiṃ vibhaṅgaṃ kṛtvāvaskandakaṃ samādhiṃ samāpadyate. katamaś ca subhūte bodhisattvasya
S06psp_5u:2326: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo viviktaṃ kāmair viviktaṃ (PSP_5:103)
S06psp_5u:2327: pāpakair akuśalair dharmaiḥ savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati,
S06psp_5u:2328: prathamād dhyānād vyutthito dvitīyaṃ dhyānaṃ upasaṃpadya viharati,
S06psp_5u:2329: dvitīyād dhyānād vyutthitas tṛtīyaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati,
S06psp_5u:2330: tṛtīyād dhyānād vyutthitaś caturthaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati,
S06psp_5u:2331: caturthyād dhyānād vyutthita ākāśānantyāyatanasamāpattim upasaṃpadya viharati,
S06psp_5u:2335: naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasamāpatter vyutthitaḥ saṃjñāvedayitanirodhasamāpattim upasaṃpadya viharati. nirodhasamāpatter vyutthitaḥ prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate,
S06psp_5u:2337: nirodhasamāpatter vyutthito dvitīyaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate dvitīyād dhyānād vyutthito nirodhasamāpittiṃ samāpadyate,
S06psp_5u:2350: nirodhasamāpatter vyutthito naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatānasamāpattiṃ samāpadyate naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasamāpatter vyutthito 'samāhite citte tiṣṭhaty,
S06psp_5u:2369: prathamād dhyānād vyutthito 'samāhite citte tiṣṭhati. sa ihāvaskandake samādhau sthitvā sarvadharmasamatām anuprāpnoti,
S06psp_5u:2370: tāni ca kuśalamūlāni sarvasattvasādhāraṇāni kṛtvānuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati,
S06psp_5u:2371: tathā ca pariṇāmayati yathāsya trividhā buddhir na bhavati,
S06psp_5u:2374: kutra vā pariṇāmayati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vaskandakasamāpattiṃ samāpadyate ca vyuttiṣṭhate ca.
S06psp_5u:2376: subhūtir āha: bahuṣu sthāneṣu śikṣitavyaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena na kvacic chikṣitavyam.
S06psp_5u:2377: bhagavān āha: evam etat subhūte evam etat,
S06psp_5u:2378: bahuṣu sthāneṣu śikṣitavyaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena na kvacic chikṣitavyam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:2379: tathā hi te dharmā nopalabhyante yatra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_5u:2380: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:2381: yat punar bhagavaṃs tathāgatena me saṃkṣiptena ca vistareṇa ca dharmā bhāṣitāḥ,
S06psp_5u:2382_0: tatra bodhisattvena mahāsattvenānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhukāmenemāḥ ṣaṭ
S06psp_5u:2382_1: pāramitāḥ saṃkṣiptena ca vistareṇa ca paryavāptavyāḥ paryavāpya yāvad vācā parijitāḥ
S06psp_5u:2382_2: kartavyā yāvad vācā parijitāḥ kṛtvā manasā pratyavekṣitavyā,
S06psp_5u:2383: tathā ca cittacetasikā dharmā na pravartante,
S06psp_5u:2384: asmin punaḥ saṃkṣepavistare śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ṣaṇnāṃ pāramitānāṃ sarvadharmāṇāñ ca saṃkṣepavistaraṃ jñāsyati.
S06psp_5u:2385: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ (PSP_5:105)
S06psp_5u:2388_0: rūpasya vā vedanāyā vā saṃjñāyā vā saṃskārāṇāṃ vā vijñānasya vā saṃkṣiptavistarañ
S06psp_5u:2388_1: ca tathatāṃ jānānaḥ. evaṃ skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādasya vā pratītyasamutpādāṅgānāṃ
S06psp_5u:2389_0: evaṃ sarvapāramitānāṃ vā saptatriṃśatāṃ bodhipakṣyāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ vā āryasatyāpramāṇadhyānārūpyavimokṣasamādhisamāpattidhāraṇīmukhānāṃ
S06psp_5u:2389_2: vā sarvākārajñatāyā vā saṃkṣiptavistaraṃ tathatāṃ jānānaḥ,
S06psp_5u:2391: subhūtir āha: katamā sā bhagavaṃs tathatā?
S06psp_5u:2392: bhagavān āha: yasyās tathatāyā notpādaḥ prajñāyate,
S06psp_5u:2393_0: na sthitir nānyathātvaṃ prajñāyate iyaṃ sā tathatā yatra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena
S06psp_5u:2393_1: śikṣitavyam. evaṃ bhūtakoṭiṃ jānāno bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ saṃkṣiptavistaraṃ jñāsyati.
S06psp_5u:2394: subhūtir āha: katamā sā bhagavan bhūtakoṭiḥ?
S06psp_5u:2396: akoṭir bhūtakoṭir atra koṭyāṃ śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ saṃkṣiptavistaraṃ jñāsyati,
S06psp_5u:2397: evaṃ dharmadhātuṃ jānāno bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ saṃkṣiptavistaraṃ jñāsyati.
S06psp_5u:2400: ākāśadhātur dharmadhātur yasya dhātor na cchedaḥ prajñāyate na paricchedaḥ. evaṃ ca dharmadhātuṃ jānāno bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ saṃkṣiptavistaraṃ jñāsyati.
S06psp_5u:2401: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ bhagavan sarvadharmāṇāṃ saṃkṣiptavistaraṃ jñātavyam?
S06psp_5u:2402: bhagavān āha: yathā sarvadharmā na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktāḥ.
S06psp_5u:2403: subhūtir āha: katame bhagavan sarvadharmā ye na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktāḥ?
S06psp_5u:2404: bhagavān āha: rūpan na saṃyuktaṃ na visaṃyuktaṃ,
S06psp_5u:2407: evaṃ skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādāḥ pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni ca na saṃyuktāni na (PSP_5:106)
S06psp_5u:2409: evaṃ yāvat saṃskṛto dhātur asaṃskṛto dhatur na saṃyukto na visaṃyuktaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:2410: na hy asyāsti svabhāvo yaḥ saṃyujyate vā visaṃyujyate vā yaś cāsvabhāvaḥ so 'bhāvo,
S06psp_5u:2411: yaś cābhāvaḥ so 'bhāvena sārdhaṃ na saṃyukto na visaṃyukta,
S06psp_5u:2414: ayaṃ punar bhagavann abhisaṃkṣepo bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyātra hi bhagavann abhisaṃkṣepapāramitāyām ādikarmikeṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śikṣitavyaṃ,
S06psp_5u:2416: ihaiva punar abhisaṃkṣepe śikṣimāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ saṃkṣepavistaraṃ jñāsyati.
S06psp_5u:2417: bhagavān āha: tīkṣṇendriyasyāpi bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāyaṃ praveśo,
S06psp_5u:2420: kasyacin na praveśaḥ śikṣitukāmasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāyaṃ praveśo,
S06psp_5u:2421_0: na khalu kuśīdasyāyaṃ praveśo na hīnavīryasya muṣitasmṛter na vikṣiptacittasyāyaṃ
S06psp_5u:2421_1: praveśaḥ ārabdhavīryasyākuśīdasyopasthitasmṛter ayaṃ praveśaḥ śikṣitukāmasya cāvinivartanīyabhūmau
S06psp_5u:2421_2: sarvākārajñatām anuprāptukāmasya cāyaṃ praveśaḥ. iti saṃkṣepavistarājñānavikalpau
S06psp_5u:2422: saced yathopadiṣṭāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣiṣyate śikṣitvā dānapāramitāṃ śīlapāramitāṃ kṣāntipāramitāṃ vīryapāramitāṃ dhyānapāramitāṃ prajñāpāramitām anuprāpsyati,
S06psp_5u:2423: adhyātmaśūnyatāṃ bahirdhāśūnyatām adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāṃ yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāṃ smṛtyupasthānasamyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgān anuprāpsyaty,
S06psp_5u:2427: sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyati. tasya khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato yāni kānicit mārakarmāṇy utpatsyante,
S06psp_5u:2429_0: tasmād upāyakauśalyaṃ parigṛhītukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
S06psp_5u:2429_1: caritavyam. yasmin samaye bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayati,
S06psp_5u:2431: tasmin samaye 'saṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu ye buddhā bhagavantas tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti dharmañ (PSP_5:107)
S06psp_5u:2432: ca deśayanti te taṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ samanvāharanti prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carantam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:2433: ato nirjātā hi subhūte 'tītānāgatapratyutpannā buddhā bhagavanto yad uta ṣaḍbhyaḥ pāramitābhyaḥ,
S06psp_5u:2434: tasmāt tarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataivaṃ pratikāṅkṣitavyam,
S06psp_5u:2435_0: aham apy enān dharmān anuprāpsyāmi ye tair atītānāgatapratyutpannair buddhair bhagavadbhir
S06psp_5u:2435_1: anuprāptāḥ. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataivaṃ yogam āpattavyam,
S06psp_5u:2436_0: evaṃ prayujyamāno bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣipram anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate.
S06psp_5u:2436_1: tasmāt tarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvākārajñatāmanasikārāvirahitena
S06psp_5u:2436_2: bhavitavyam. sacet punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ caran prajñāpāramitāyām
S06psp_5u:2437: sa khhalu punar bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bahutarapuṇyaṃ prasaviṣyati,
S06psp_5u:2438_0: na tv eva ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvās tān kaścid eva dānena saṃtarpayec
S06psp_5u:2438_1: chīle pratiṣṭhāpayet kṣāntau pratiṣṭhāpayed vīrye pratiṣṭhāpayet samādhau pratiṣṭhāpayet
S06psp_5u:2438_2: prajñāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayed vimuktau pratiṣṭhāpayed vimuktijñānadarśane pratiṣṭhāpayet,
S06psp_5u:2439: srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpayet sakṛdāgāmiphale pratiṣṭhāpayed anāgāmiphale pratiṣṭhāpayed arhattve pratiṣṭhāpayet pratyekabodhau pratiṣṭhāpayet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:2440_1: srotaāpattiphalaṃ sakṛdāgāmiphalam anāgāmiphalam arhattvaṃ pratyekabodhiḥ. ye 'pi
S06psp_5u:2440_2: te buddhā bhagavanto daśadiglokadhātuṣu tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti,
S06psp_5u:2441: te 'pito nirjātā yad uta prajñāpāramitātaḥ. ye 'pi te subhūte ' tītānāgatapratyutpannā buddhā bhagavantas te 'pīta eva prabhāvitā yad uta prajñāpāramitātaḥ.
S06psp_5u:2442_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte yo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo muhūrtaṃ vā divasaṃ vā divasaśataṃ
S06psp_5u:2442_1: vā saṃvatsaraṃ vā saṃvatsaraśataṃ vā kalpaṃ vā kalpaśataṃ vā yāvad asaṃkhyeyān api
S06psp_5u:2442_2: kalpāni māṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair bhāvayiṣyati,
S06psp_5u:2443_0: sa bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasaviṣyati. na tv eva ye gaṅgānadīvālukāsameṣu lokadhātuṣu
S06psp_5u:2443_1: sattvās tān kaścid eva dānena saṃtarpayec chīle kṣāntau vīrye samādhau prajñāyāṃ
S06psp_5u:2449: ato nirjātā hi te buddhā bhagavanto yair idaṃ dānamayaṃ puṇyakriyāvastuprajñāptaṃ,
S06psp_5u:2452: srotaāpattiphalaṃ sakṛdāgāmiphalam anāgāmiphalam arhattvaṃ pratyekabuddhatvaṃ prajñāptam.
S06psp_5u:2454: yaḥ punar aparaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ yathopadiṣṭāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitaḥ,
S06psp_5u:2455: sa khalu punar bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīyaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyaḥ. tathāgatasamanvāgataḥ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ,
S06psp_5u:2456: upāyakauśalyena samanvāgato bahubuddhakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraparyupāsitaḥ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyaḥ. avaropitakuśalamūlaḥ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ,
S06psp_5u:2458: ṣaṭpāramitāvatīrṇaḥ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyaḥ. viṃśatiśūnyatābhāvitaḥ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ,
S06psp_5u:2462: kumārabhūtaḥ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyaḥ. abhiprāyaparipūrṇaḥ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ,
S06psp_5u:2464: kuśalamūlair avirahitaḥ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyaḥ. anākṣiptapratibhānaḥ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ,
S06psp_5u:2465: dhāraṇīpratilabdhaḥ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyaḥ. rūpapariniṣpattis tasya pratikāṅkṣitavyā,
S06psp_5u:2466_0: vyākaraṇasaṃpanno gotrasaṃpannaḥ saṃcintyabhavaḥ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyaḥ.
S06psp_5u:2467: vedanākuśalaḥ saṃjñākuśalaḥ saṃskārakuśalo vijñānakuśalaḥ skandhadhātvāyatanakuśalaḥ pratītyasamutpādakuśalaḥ pratītyasamutpādāṅgakuśalo (PSP_5:109)
S06psp_5u:2470: sarvākārajñatā manasikārakuśalaḥ. rūpaṃ rūpeṇa śūnyam iti kuśalaḥ,
S06psp_5u:2478: bodhipakṣyā dharmā bodhipakṣyair dharmaiḥ śūnyāḥ iti kuśalaḥ,
S06psp_5u:2485: aṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmā aṣṭādaśāveṇikair buddhadharmaiḥ śūnyā iti kuśalaḥ,
S06psp_5u:2497: itīme 'nuśaṃsāḥ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ.
S06psp_5u:2501: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāñ caritavyaṃ?
S06psp_5u:2505: rūpaśāntatayā subhūte rūpavaśikatayā rūpatucchatayā rūpāsāratayā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyaṃ,
S06psp_5u:2517: kiyac ciraṃ sa bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran prajñāpāramitāyāṃ cīrṇo bhavati?
S06psp_5u:2524: subhūtir āha: kiṃ punar bhagavaṃś cittāntarānām avakāśan dadatā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyam?
S06psp_5u:2525: bhagavān āha: anyeṣāṃ subhūte manasikārāṇām avakāśam adadatā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyaṃ,
S06psp_5u:2530: tathā ca caritavyā tathā cābhinirhartavyā tathā ca bhāvayitavyā,
S06psp_5u:2533: kiṃ punar bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran prajñāpāramitām abhinirharan prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayan sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyati?
S06psp_5u:2534: bhagavān āha: na subhūte. iti samyaksaṃbodher amanasikāravikalpaḥ
S06psp_5u:2535: subhūtir āha: bhāvayan punaḥ sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyati?
S06psp_5u:2536: bhagavān āha: na subhūte. iti bhāvanāvikalpaḥ
S06psp_5u:2537: subhūtir āha: abhāvayan punaḥ sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyati?
S06psp_5u:2538: bhagavān āha: na subhūte. ity abhāvanāvikalpaḥ
S06psp_5u:2540: subhūtir āha: naiva bhāvayan nābhāvayan sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyati?
S06psp_5u:2541: bhagavān āha: na subhūte. iti naivabhāvanānābhāvanāvikalpaḥ
S06psp_5u:2542: subhūtir āha: tat kathaṃ bhagavan sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyati?
S06psp_5u:2547: bhagavān āha: yathā dharmadhātuḥ. iti yathāvikalpaḥ
S06psp_5u:2551: yathātmadhātuḥ sattvadhātur jīvadhātur jantudhātuḥ poṣadhātuḥ puruṣadhātuḥ pudgaladhātuḥ.
S06psp_5u:2553: kathaṃ bhagavan tathatā bhūtakoṭidharmadhātur ātmadhātuḥ sattvadhātur jīvadhātur jantudhātuḥ poṣadhātuḥ puruṣadhātuḥ pudgaladhātuḥ?
S06psp_5u:2555: subhūte api nu sa ātmā vā sattvo vā jīvo vā jantur vā poso vā puruṣo vā pudgalo vā upalabhyate.
S06psp_5u:2558: anupalabhamānaḥ subhūte ātmānaṃ vā sattvaṃ vā jīvaṃ vā jantuṃ vā poṣaṃ vā puruṣaṃ vā pudgalaṃ vā,
S06psp_5u:2559: kathaṃ sattvadhātuṃ vā yāvat pudgaladhātuṃ vā prajñāpayiṣyati. evaṃ prajñāpāramitām apy aprajñapayamānaḥ sarvadharmān apy aprajñapayamānaḥ sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyati.
S06psp_5u:2560: subhūtir āha: kiṃ punar bhagavann aprajñapanīyā prajñāpāramitā?
S06psp_5u:2567: yāvat sarvadharmāḥ saṃskṛtā vāsaṃskṛtā vā śrāvakadharmā vā pratyekabuddhadharmā vā yāvad buddhadharmā vā.
S06psp_5u:2568: subhūtir āha: yadi bhagavann aprajñapanīyāḥ sarvadharmāḥ, kutaḥ (PSP_5:113)
S06psp_5u:2574: srotaāpannā vā sakṛdāgāmino vānāgāmino vārhanto vā pratyekabuddhā vā samyaksaṃbuddhā vā prajñāyante.
S06psp_5u:2575: bhagavān āha: kat kiṃ manyase? subhūte 'pi nu sattvaprajñāptir upalabhyate.
S06psp_5u:2577: bhagavān āha: anupalabhamānaḥ subhūte sattvaṃ kuto nārakaṃ prajñāpayiṣyati tiryagyonigatān,
S06psp_5u:2578: yamalokaṃ vā manuṣyaṃ vā devaṃ vā srotaāpannān vā sakṛdāgāmino vā anāgāmino vā arhato vā pratyekabuddhān vā samyaksaṃbuddhān vā kutaḥ prajñāpayiṣyati?
S06psp_5u:2579: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratāprajñapanīyeṣu dharmeṣu śikṣitavyam. iti sattvaprajñāptivikalpaḥ
S06psp_5u:2580: subhūtir āha: na nu bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā rūpe śikṣitavyaṃ,
S06psp_5u:2592: bhagavān āha: rūpeṣu subhūte śikṣitavyam anutkṣepāprakṣepatayā,
S06psp_5u:2602: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ bhagavan rūpe anutkṣepāprakṣepatayā śikṣitavyaṃ?
S06psp_5u:2603: vedanāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu, kathaṃ bhagavan vijñāne 'nutkṣepāprakṣepatayā śikṣitavyaṃ?
S06psp_5u:2606: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ bhagavan anutpādato 'nirodhataḥ śikṣitavyam?
S06psp_5u:2608: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ bhagavann anabhisaṃskāratayā śikṣitavyam?
S06psp_5u:2609: bhagavān āha: svalakṣaṇaśūnyān dharmān samanupaśyann anabhisaṃskāratayā śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_5u:2610: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ bhagavan svalakṣaṇaśūnyāḥ sarvadharmā iti śikṣitavyam?
S06psp_5u:2611: bhagavān āha: rūpaṃ rūpeṇa śūnyaṃ draṣṭavyaṃ,
S06psp_5u:2614: evaṃ cakṣuḥ śrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ jihvā kāyo,
S06psp_5u:2616: evaṃ rūpaṃ śabdagandharasasparṣṭavyadharmāḥ śabdagandharasasparṣṭavyadharmaiḥ śūnyā draṣṭavyāḥ,
S06psp_5u:2620: evaṃ śrotrasaṃsparśo ghrāṇasaṃsparśo jihvāsaṃsparśaḥ kāyasaṃsparśo manaḥsaṃsparśo manaḥsaṃsparśena śūnyo draṣṭavyaḥ,
S06psp_5u:2621: cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayā vedanā cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayayā vedanayā śūnyā draṣṭavyā,
S06psp_5u:2626: manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayā vedanā manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayayā vedanayā śūnyā draṣṭavyā,
S06psp_5u:2631: bahirdhāśūnyatā bahirdhāśūnyatayā śūnyā draṣṭavyā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatayā śūnyā draṣṭavyā,
S06psp_5u:2650: āveṇikā buddhadharmā āveṇikaiḥ buddhadharmaiḥ śūnyā draṣṭavyāḥ,
S06psp_5u:2651: anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir anuttarayā samyaksaṃbodhyā śūnyā draṣṭavyā. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena svalakṣaṇaśūnyeṣu dharmeṣu caritavyam.
S06psp_5u:2652: subhūtir āha: yadi bhagavan rūpaṃ rūpeṇa śūnyaṃ,
S06psp_5u:2654: vijñānaṃ vijñānena śūnyam. evaṃ yāvad anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir anuttarayā samyaksaṃbodhyā śūnyā. tat kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carir bhavati?
S06psp_5u:2655: bhagavān āha: acariḥ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitācariḥ.
S06psp_5u:2656: subhūtir āha: kena kāraṇena bhagavann acariḥ?
S06psp_5u:2657: bhagavān āha: tathā hi subhūte sā prajñāpāramitā nopalabhyate,
S06psp_5u:2663: tad api nopalabhyate. evaṃ hi subhūte acarir bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitācarir yatraite sarvaprapañcā nopalabhyante.
S06psp_5u:2664: subhūtir āha: yadi bhagavan na cariḥ prajñāpāramitācarir bhavati,
S06psp_5u:2665: tat kathaṃ bhagavann ādikarmikeṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyam?
S06psp_5u:2667: iha subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prathamacittotpādam upādāyānupalambheṣu sarvadharmeṣu śikṣitavyaṃ,
S06psp_5u:2676_1: smṛtyupasthānāni bhāvayatānupalambhayogena smṛtyupasthānāni bhāvayi tavyāni. evaṃ
S06psp_5u:2683: āveṇikān buddhadharmān bhāvayatānupalambhayogena āveṇikā buddhadharmā bhāvayitavyāḥ,
S06psp_5u:2685: subhūtir āha: kiyatā bhagavann upalambho bhavati? kiyatā bhagavann anupalambho bhavati?
S06psp_5u:2686: bhagavān āha: yāvad dvayan tāvad upalambho, yāvad advayan tāvad anupalambhaḥ.
S06psp_5u:2687: subhūtir āha: kiyatā bhagavan dvayaṃ vā advayaṃ vā bhavati?
S06psp_5u:2688: bhagavān āha: yāvac cakṣurūpaṃ yāvat manodharmāś ca,
S06psp_5u:2693: na bodhiś ca na buddhaś ca,
S06psp_5u:2696: subhūtir āha: kiṃ punar bhagavann upalambho 'nupalambhaḥ, athānupalambha upalambhaḥ?
S06psp_5u:2700_0: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte upalambhānupalabdhisamatānupalambhaḥ. evaṃ khalu subhūte
S06psp_5u:2700_1: bodhisattvena mahāsattvenānupalambhasamatāyāṃ śikṣitavyam. evaṃ śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo
S06psp_5u:2702: yadi bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran naivopalambhe sajjati nānupalambhe,
S06psp_5u:2703: kathaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā bhūmer bhūmiḥ paripūrayitavyā,
S06psp_5u:2706: na subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann upalambhe sthitvā bhūmer bhūmiṃ paripūrayati,
S06psp_5u:2707: na copalarabhe sthitvā śaktyā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā bhūmer bhūmiṃ paripūrayitum. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:2710: so 'pi nopalabhyate yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāñ caritavyam. iti śaktivikalpaḥ
S06psp_5u:2712: yadi bhagavan prajñāpāramitā nopalabhyate. tat kathaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāñ caratā dharmeṣu pravicayaḥ kartavyaḥ?
S06psp_5u:2731: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caraṃs tathā dharmeṣu pravicayaṃ karoti,
S06psp_5u:2744: subhūtir āha: yadi bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāñ caran rūpaṃ nopalabhate,
S06psp_5u:2747_0: yāvad anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhin nopalabhate. tat kathaṃ dānapāramitāṃ paripūrya śīlapāramitāṃ
S06psp_5u:2747_1: paripūrya kṣāntipāramitāṃ paripūrya vīryapāramitāṃ paripūrya dhyānapāramitāṃ paripūrya
S06psp_5u:2750: sattvān paripācya sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyati sarvākārajñatām anuprāpya dharmacakraṃ pravartayiṣyati,
S06psp_5u:2753: bhagavān āha: na subhūte bodhisattvo rūpasya kṛtena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati,
S06psp_5u:2754: na vedanāyā na saṃjñāyā na saṃskārāṇāṃ,
S06psp_5u:2756: na skandhadhātvāyatanānāṃ na pratītyasamutpādasya na pratītyasamutpādāṅgānāṃ kṛtena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati,
S06psp_5u:2758: na śūnyatāmukhānāṃ na bodhipakṣyānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ kṛtena,
S06psp_5u:2762: subhūtir āha: kasyedānīṃ kṛtena bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati?
S06psp_5u:2763: bhagavān āha: na kasyacit kṛtena bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:2764: tathā hi subhūte 'kṛtā avikṛtā anabhisaṃskṛtāḥ sarvadharmāḥ,
S06psp_5u:2766: bodhisattvo 'py akṛto 'vikṛto 'nabhisaṃskṛtaḥ. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyam akṛtāvikṛtānabhisaṃskṛtānabhisaṃskārayogena.
S06psp_5u:2768: subhūtir āha: yadi bhagavann akṛtā avikṛtā anabhisaṃskṛtāḥ sarvadharmāḥ,
S06psp_5u:2769: kathaṃ yeṣāṃ bhagavaṃs trayāṇāṃ yānānāṃ vyavasthānaṃ bhavati?
S06psp_5u:2773: na subhūte 'kṛtānām avikṛtānām anabhisaṃskṛtānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ kiṃcid vyavasthānam upalabhyate,
S06psp_5u:2774: anabhisaṃskṛtānām anabhisaṃcetayitānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ vyavasthānaṃ ca nopalabhyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:2796: bodhipakṣyān dharmān manyate bodhipakṣyān dharmān upalabhate,
S06psp_5u:2803: bodhiṃ manyate bodhim upalabhate. tasyaivaṃ bhavaty,
S06psp_5u:2805: ahaṃ sattvān parimocayiṣyāmi saṃsārataḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:2806: tathā hi subhūte yad buddhena pañcabhiś cakṣurbhir nopalabdhaṃ rūpaṃ,
S06psp_5u:2815: tatsamohapuruṣo buddhvā vākhyāya sattvān icchati saṃsārāt parimocayitum.
S06psp_5u:2816: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat: yad bhagavān evam āha,
S06psp_5u:2817_0: tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena pañcabhiś cakṣurbhir nopalabdhās te sattvā yān
S06psp_5u:2817_1: āsaṃsārāt parimocayed iti. tat katham idānīṃ bhagavatānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya
S06psp_5u:2817_2: sattvās triṣu rāśiṣu vyākṛtāḥ samyaktvaniyatā vā mithyātvaniyatā vāniyatā vā?
S06psp_5u:2819: na mayā subhūte 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya kathaṃcid api sattva upalabdhaḥ,
S06psp_5u:2821: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte ya ime sattvā adravye dravyasaṃjñinas tāṃs tato abhūtagrahād dhārayāmi lokavyavahāreṇa naḥ punaḥ paramārthena.
S06psp_5u:2822: subhūtir āha: na punar bhagavatā paramārthe sthitvā bodhir abhisaṃbuddhā?
S06psp_5u:2824: subhūtir āha: yadi bhagavatā naiva paramārthe sthitvānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbuddhā,
S06psp_5u:2826: katham idānīṃ bhagavatā tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena bodhir abhisaṃbuddhā bhavati?
S06psp_5u:2827: bhagavān āha: anabhisaṃbuddhā subhūte tathāgatenānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ,
S06psp_5u:2828: sā ca na kvacit sthitā saṃskṛte vā dhātāv asaṃskṛte vā dhātau. tadyathāpi nāma subhūte tathāgatanirmito na kvacit sthitaḥ saṃskṛte vā dhātāv asaṃskṛte vā dhātau,
S06psp_5u:2829: sa ca tathāgatanirmito gacchati cāgacchati ca tiṣṭhati ca niṣīdati ca,
S06psp_5u:2837_0: caturbhir apramāṇaiś catasṛbhir ārūpyasamāpattibhiḥ pañcabhir abhijñābhiś caturbhiḥ
S06psp_5u:2837_1: smṛtyupasthānaiś caturbhiḥ samyakprahāṇaiś caturbhir ṛddhipādaiḥ pañcabhir indriyaiḥ
S06psp_5u:2837_2: pañcabhir balaiḥ saptabhir bodhyaṅgair āryāṣṭāṅgena mārgeṇa śūnyatāsamādhinā animittasamādhināpraṇihitasamādhinā (PSP_5:121)
S06psp_5u:2839_0: aṣṭavimokṣair navānupūrvavihārasamāpattibhir daśabhis tathāgatabalaiś caturbhir vaiśāradyaiś
S06psp_5u:2839_1: catasṛbhiḥ pratisaṃvidbhiḥ mahāmaitryā mahākaruṇayā samādhidhāraṇīmukhair aṣṭādaśabhir
S06psp_5u:2840: sa ca nirmito 'parimāṇān sattvān abhinirmāya triṣu rāśiṣu vyākuryāt. tat kiṃ manyase?
S06psp_5u:2841: subhūte 'pi nu tena kaścit sattvas triṣu rāśiṣu vyākṛtaḥ.
S06psp_5u:2843: bhagavān āha: evam eva subhūte tathāgatena sarvadharmā nirmitopamā jñātā,
S06psp_5u:2844: na ca kaścit sattvo vinītaḥ. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitā bhāvayitavyā,
S06psp_5u:2846: subhūtir āha: api nu bhagavan sarvadharmā nirmitopamāḥ.
S06psp_5u:2847: bhagavān āha: evam etat subhūte evam etat.
S06psp_5u:2848: subhūtir āha: yadi bhagavan sarvadharmā nirmitopamās tathāgatasya nirmitasya ca kaḥ prativiśeṣaḥ?
S06psp_5u:2850: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:2851: tathāgatasya ca subhūte nirmitasya ca na kaścid viśeṣo,
S06psp_5u:2853: nirviśeṣaḥ subhūte tathāgataś ca nirmitaś ca. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:2854: tathā hi yat tathāgataḥ karma karoti, tan nirmitaḥ karma karoti.
S06psp_5u:2855: subhūtir āha: kaccit punar bhagavan na sati tathāgate nirmitaḥ karma karoti?
S06psp_5u:2857: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ yathā punar bhagavan na sati tathāgate tathāgatanirmitaḥ karma karoti?
S06psp_5u:2859: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte sacet tathāgato bhavyasattvam anupalabhamāno nirmitan nirmāya parinirvṛtaḥ,
S06psp_5u:2860: tena ca nirmitenārdhakalpaṃ buddhakṛtyaṃ sa paścād buddhakṛtyaṃ kṛtvā parinirvṛta iti janaḥ saṃjānīte,
S06psp_5u:2861: na ca nirmitānāṃ kaścid utpādo na nirvāṇam. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyaṃ, (PSP_5:122)
S06psp_5u:2862: yad uta nirmitopamān sarvadharmān adhimucyate. iti yānatrayavikalpaḥ
S06psp_5u:2864: yadi bhagavan nirmitasya tathāgatasya ca viśeṣo nāsti dakṣiṇā pariśuddhiḥ kathaṃ bhaviṣyati?
S06psp_5u:2865: ya ime bhagavaṃs tathāgate dakṣiṇāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayanti,
S06psp_5u:2866: sā na jātu kṣīyate yāvat te sattvā anupadhiśeṣanirvāṇadhātau parinirvāsyante,
S06psp_5u:2867: evam eva ye nirmite dakṣiṇāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayanti,
S06psp_5u:2868: sā na jātu kṣīyate yāvat te sattvā anupadhiśeṣanirvāṇadhātau parinirvāsyanti.
S06psp_5u:2869: bhagavān āha: yayā subhūte dharmatayā tathāgataḥ sadevakasya lokasya dakṣiṇīyo bhavati,
S06psp_5u:2870: tayaiva dharmatayā nirmito 'pi sadevasya lokasya dakṣiṇīyaḥ. tiṣṭhatu tāvat subhūte tathāgatapratiṣṭhāpitā dakṣiṇā,
S06psp_5u:2871: tiṣṭhatu nirmitapratiṣṭhāpitā dakṣiṇā yaḥ kaścit subhūte kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tathāgataṃ maitratayā manasikariṣyati,
S06psp_5u:2872_0: sarvo 'sau tasya kuśalamūlasya paryantam adhigamya duṣkhasyāntaṃ kariṣyati. tiṣṭhatu
S06psp_5u:2872_1: maitraṃ vā manasikāro yaḥ kaścit subhūte kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā ākāśe puṣpāṇi
S06psp_5u:2872_2: kṣepsyati tathāgataṃ manasikṛtvā sarvo 'sau tasya kuśalamūlasya paryantam adhigamya
S06psp_5u:2874: tiṣṭhatv ākāśe puṣpāṇi yaḥ kaścit subhūte kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā namo buddhānām iti manasikariṣyati,
S06psp_5u:2875: sarvo 'sāv anupūrveṇa duḥkhasyāntaṃ kariṣyati. evaṃ maharddhikā subhūte tathāgatapratiṣṭhāpitā dakṣiṇā,
S06psp_5u:2877: tad anena te subhūte paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyaṃ,
S06psp_5u:2878: tathāgatasya ca tathāgatanirmitasya ca na kiṃcit nānākaraṇam upalabhyate dharmāṇāṃ dharmatāṃ pramāṇīkṛtyam. iti dakṣiṇāviśuddhivikalpaḥ
S06psp_5u:2879: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyaṃ,
S06psp_5u:2883: evaṃ dhyānapāramitāyā vīryapāramitāyāḥ kṣāntipāramitāyāḥ śīlapāramitāyā iyaṃ dānapāramitāyā dharmateti na vikopayitavyā,
S06psp_5u:2884: evaṃ yāvat sarvadharmeṣv ime sarvadharmā iyaṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ dharmateti na vikopayitavyā.
S06psp_5u:2885: subhūtir āha: yadi bhagavan sarvadharmāṇān dharmatā na vikopayitavyā,
S06psp_5u:2886: yat punar bhagavaṃs tathāgatena vikopitaṃ rūpam idam,
S06psp_5u:2897: evaṃ kuśalā dharmā evam akuśalā dharmāḥ sāsravā anāsravā laukikā lokottarās sādhāraṇā asādhāraṇāḥ saṃskṛtā asaṃskṛtā dharmā nirdiṣṭāḥ,
S06psp_5u:2898: tan mā haiva bhagavatā dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā vikopitā bhavet?
S06psp_5u:2900: nāmanimittā hi te dharmā nirdiṣṭā dharmāṇāṃ sūcanakṛtā,
S06psp_5u:2901: kathaṃ paro 'vatariṣyatiti na dharmāṇān dharmatā vikopitā bhavet.
S06psp_5u:2902: subhūtir āha: yadi bhagavan nāmanimittā hi te dharmā nirdiṣṭāḥ pareṣām avatāraṇāya,
S06psp_5u:2903: kathaṃ bhagavarm anāmakā animittāḥ sarvadharmā nāma nimittena vyāhṛtāḥ?
S06psp_5u:2906: bhagavān āha: na subhūte vyavahāro nāmanimittam abhiniveśo vā nātra subhūte nāmni vyavaharāmi,
S06psp_5u:2907: na nimitte 'nimitte 'bhiniveśo vā. na hi subhūte tathāgataśrāvako vā nāmni nimitte vābhiniviśate. na hi subhūte nāma nāmny abhiniviśate,
S06psp_5u:2917: na hy ete nāmamātre 'vatiṣṭhante. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena nāmamātre sthitvā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyaṃ,
S06psp_5u:2919: subhūtir āha: yadi bhagavan nāmamātram idaṃ sarvasaṃskṛtaṃ,
S06psp_5u:2920: kasyedānīṃ kṛtena bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhaye cittam utpādyānekavidhāṃ saṃsāracārikāṃ pratyanubhavati,
S06psp_5u:2940: bhagavān āha: yaṃ subhūtir evam āha,
S06psp_5u:2942: tat kasyedānīṃ kṛtena bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhaye cittam utpādyānekavidhāṃ saṃsāracārikāṃ pratyanubhavatīti,
S06psp_5u:2944: tac ca nāma nāmnā śūnyaṃ nimittaṃ nimittena śūnyaṃ,
S06psp_5u:2945: tasmād bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhisattvacārikāṃ caran sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyati,
S06psp_5u:2947: dharmacakraṃ pravartya sattvāṃs tribhir yānaiḥ parinirvāpayati,
S06psp_5u:2948: tasya ca nāmanimittasya notpādo na nirodho na sthitir na sthiter anyathātvaṃ prajñāyate.
S06psp_5u:2950: subhūtir āha: sarvākārajñatā sarvākārajñateti bhagavan vadasi.
S06psp_5u:2952: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ punar bhagavan sarvākārajñatā tathāgatena nirdiṣṭā,
S06psp_5u:2955: āsāṃ bhagavaṃs tisṛṇāṃ sarvajñatānāṃ kiṃ nānākaraṇam?
S06psp_5u:2956: bhagavān āha: sarvākārajñatā subhūte tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya,
S06psp_5u:2959: subhūtir āha: kena kāraṇena bhagavan sarvākārajñatā tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya?
S06psp_5u:2961: yāvantaḥ subhūte ākārā liṅgāni nimittāni yair ākārair yair liṅgair yair nimittais te dharmāḥ sūcyante,
S06psp_5u:2962: te ākārās tāni liṅgāni tāni nimittāni tathāgatenānubaddhāni tenocyate tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya sarvākārajñatā. iti sarvākārajñatāsaṃmohavikalpaḥ
S06psp_5u:2963: subhūtir āha: kena kāraṇena bhagavan mārgajñatā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām?
S06psp_5u:2965: bhagavān āha: sarvamārgāḥ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena notpādayitavyāḥ,
S06psp_5u:2969: ye ca bodhimārgās te ca mārgāḥ paripūrayitavyāḥ taiś ca mārge mārgakaraṇīyaṃ kartavyan na cānena bhūtakoṭiḥ sākṣātkartavyā.
S06psp_5u:2970: subhūtir āha: kiṃ punar bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena bhūtakoṭir na sākṣātkartavyā?
S06psp_5u:2972: nāparipūrya praṇidhānaṃ nāparipācya sattvān nāpariśodhya buddhakṣetran tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena bhūtakoṭiḥ sākṣātkartavyā,
S06psp_5u:2973: tena kāraṇenocyate bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārgajñatā. iti mārgākārajñatāsaṃmohavikalpaḥ
S06psp_5u:2974: subhūtir āha: kena kāraṇena bhagavan sarvajñatā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānām?
S06psp_5u:2976: etāvad eva subhūte sarvaṃ yāvad evādhyātmikāś ca bāhyāś ca dharmās te ca sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhair jñātā,
S06psp_5u:2977: na punaḥ sarvamārgeṇa sarvākāreṇa. iti sarvajñatāsaṃmohavikalpaḥ
S06psp_5u:2978: subhūtir āha: kiṃ punar bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena mārge sthitvā bhūtakoṭiḥ sākṣātkartavyā?
S06psp_5u:2986: subhūtir āha: tat katham idānīṃ bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena bhūtakoṭiḥ sākṣātkartavyā?
S06psp_5u:2988: subhūte api nu tava mārge sthitasyānupādāyāsravebhyaś cittaṃ vimuktam.
S06psp_5u:2995: bhagavān āha: tava naiva mārge nāmārge sthitasya?
S06psp_5u:2997: api tu khalu punar me bhagavaṃś cittaṃ vimuktaṃ yathā na kvacit sthitvā syām.
S06psp_5u:2999: evam etat subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena na kvacit sthitvā bhūtakoṭiḥ sākṣātkartavyā.
S06psp_5u:3001: yāḥ punar imā bhagavan sarvākārajñatā ca mārgajñatā ca sarvajñatā ca kaccid bhagavann āsāṃ tisṛṇāṃ sarvajñatānāṃ kleśaprahāṇasya nānātvam asti,
S06psp_5u:3004: bhagavān āha: na subhūte kleśaprahāṇasya nānātvam asti,
S06psp_5u:3007: subhūtir āha: kiṃ punar bhagavan sarvajñatāyām anuprāptāyām aśeṣaprahāṇam asaṃskṛtaṃ bhavati?
S06psp_5u:3008: bhagavān āha: evam etat subhūte evam etat.
S06psp_5u:3009: subhūtir āha: kiṃ punar bhagavann asaṃskṛtasya nānātvam upalabhyate?
S06psp_5u:3010: bhagavān āha: na subhūte 'saṃskṛtasya nānātvam upalabhyate.
S06psp_5u:3011: subhūtir āha: yadi nopalabhyate kuta etan nirdiśyate?
S06psp_5u:3012: asya vāsanānusaṃdhikleśaprahāṇam, asya na vāsanānusaṃdhikleśaprahāṇam iti.
S06psp_5u:3019: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat: yadi bhagavann abhāvo mārgaḥ,
S06psp_5u:3022: ayaṃ srotaāpanno 'yaṃ sakṛdāgāmy ayam anāgāmy ayam arhann ayaṃ pratyekabuddho 'yan tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ.
S06psp_5u:3024: na khalu subhūte asaṃskṛtaṃ bhāvayati api tu lokavyavahāraṃ pramāṇīkṛtyocyate na punaḥ paramārthena śakyā prabhāvanā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:3026: api tu khalu punar yaiḥ pūrvānto vyavacchinnas teṣāṃ paścimā koṭiprajñāptā.
S06psp_5u:3029: bhagavān āha: evam etat subhūte evam etat,
S06psp_5u:3030: svalakṣaṇaśūnyānāṃ subhūte sarvadharmāṇāṃ pūrvā koṭir na prajñāyate,
S06psp_5u:3033: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte ye te sattvāḥ svalakṣaṇaśūnyān dharmān na jānanti,
S06psp_5u:3034: teṣām evaṃ nirdiṣṭam iyaṃ pūrvā koṭir iyaṃ paścimā koṭir,
S06psp_5u:3035: na punaḥ svalakṣaṇaśūnyeṣu dharmeṣu pūrvā koṭir na paścimā koṭir upalabhyate,
S06psp_5u:3036: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena svalakṣaṇaśūnyeṣu dharmeṣu prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyaṃ,
S06psp_5u:3037: svalakṣaṇaśūnyeṣu dharmeṣu caran na kvacid abhiniviśate 'dhyātmikeṣu vā bāhyeṣu vā saṃskṛteṣu vāsaṃskṛteṣu vā śrāvakadharmeṣu vā pratyekabuddhadharmeṣu vā.
S06psp_5u:3038: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:3042_0: paramapāramitaiṣā subhūte sarvadharmāṇām agamanārthena prajñāpāramitety ucyate. api
S06psp_5u:3042_1: tu khalu punaḥ subhūte etayā prajñāpāramitayā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhā bodhisattvāś
S06psp_5u:3042_2: ca mahāsattvās tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ pāraṅgatās tenārthena prajñāpāramitety
S06psp_5u:3042_3: ucyate. api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte paramārthena yo 'rthaḥ sarvadharmāṇām abhinnaḥ,
S06psp_5u:3043: sa iha prajñāpāramitāyāṃ tais tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaiḥ,
S06psp_5u:3044: sarvadharmeṣu pāro nopalabdhas tenārthenocyate prajñāpāramitā. iti mārgasaṃmohavikalpaḥ
S06psp_5u:3045: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte prajñāpāramitāyāṃ tathatāntargatā,
S06psp_5u:3047_0: dharmadhātur antargataḥ tenocyate prajñāpāramiteti. api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte neyaṃ
S06psp_5u:3047_1: prajñāpāramitā kenacid dharmeṇa saṃyuktā vā visaṃyuktā vā sanidarśanā vānidarśanā
S06psp_5u:3047_2: vā sapratighā vāpratighā vā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:3050_0: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā sarvadharmāṇāṃ cārikā sarvapratibhānānāṃ
S06psp_5u:3050_1: sarvālokānām anācchedyeyaṃ subhūte prajñāpāramitā māreṇa vā mārakāyikābhir devatābhiḥ
S06psp_5u:3052: yāvan na kenacid anyatīrthikaiḥ pratyamitrair vā iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā śakyā cchettuṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:3053: tathā hi te 'tra prajñāpāramitāyāṃ nopalabhyante sarva evaivaṃ khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyām arthe caritavyam. ity asamatvasaṃmohavikalpaḥ
S06psp_5u:3054: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattveneha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām arthe caritavyam anityārthe caritavyaṃ,
S06psp_5u:3062: duḥkhaparijñatārthe samudayaprahāṇārthe nirodhasākṣātkriyārthe mārgajñatārthe anvayajñānārthe caritavyaṃ,
S06psp_5u:3063_1: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyām arthe caritavyam.
S06psp_5u:3064: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:3065: yadi bhagavann iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām arthaś cānarthaś ca nopalabhyate,
S06psp_5u:3066: tat kathaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattveneha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām arthe caritavyam?
S06psp_5u:3068: iha subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena gambhīre 'rthe prajñāpāramitārthe carataivaṃ caritavyaṃ,
S06psp_5u:3074: idaṃ dṛṣṭigato me 'rtho 'nartha iti na caritavyam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:3075: na hi rāgadveṣamohānāṃ tathatā kasyacid artham anarthaṃ karoti,
S06psp_5u:3076: na dṛṣṭigatānāṃ tathatā kasyacid artham anarthaṃ karoti. rūpaṃ me 'rtho 'nartha iti na caritavyaṃ,
S06psp_5u:3079: evaṃ skandhadhātvāyatanāni me 'rtho 'nartha iti na caritavyaṃ,
S06psp_5u:3084: bodhipakṣyā me dharmā artho 'nartha iti na caritavyaṃ,
S06psp_5u:3090: anuttarā me samyaksaṃbodhir artho 'nartha iti na caritavyam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:3091: tathā hi subhūte tathāgatenānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya na kaścid dharma upalabdho yo 'rthaṃ vā kuryād anarthaṃ vā kuryād,
S06psp_5u:3092_0: api nu khalu punaḥ subhūte utpādād vā tathāgatānām anutpādād vā tathāgatānāṃ sthitaivaiṣā
S06psp_5u:3092_1: dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā dharmadhātur dharmasthititā dharmaniyāmatā sā naiva kasyacid arthaṃ
S06psp_5u:3093: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvenārthānartho varjayitvā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyam.
S06psp_5u:3094: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:3095: kena kāraṇena bhagavan prajñāpāramitā nānarthakarī nārthakarī?
S06psp_5u:3096: bhagavān āha: tathā hi subhūte saṃskṛtadharmāṇām asaṃskṛtadharmāṇām akāraṇaṃ prajñāpāramitā,
S06psp_5u:3097: tena kāraṇena prajñāpāramitā na kasyacid arthaṃ vā karoty anarthaṃ vā.
S06psp_5u:3098: subhūtir āha: punar bhagavann asaṃskṛto 'rthaḥ sarvāryāṇāṃ buddhānāṃ buddhaśrāvakāṇāṃ vā.
S06psp_5u:3099: bhagavān āha: asaṃskṛto 'rthaḥ sarvāryāṇāṃ buddhānāṃ buddhaśrāvakāṇāṃ ca,
S06psp_5u:3100: pratyupasthito na punar apakāreṇa vopakāreṇa vā,
S06psp_5u:3101: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte ākāśasya tathatā na kasyacid apakāreṇa vopakāreṇa vā pratyupasthitā,
S06psp_5u:3102: evam eva subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitā na kasyacid dharmasyāpakāreṇa vopakāreṇa vā pratyupasthitā.
S06psp_5u:3104: kiṃ punar bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'saṃskṛtāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitvā sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyati?
S06psp_5u:3106: iha punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'saṃskṛtāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitvā sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyati,
S06psp_5u:3108: subhūtir āha: kiṃ punar bhagavann advayadharmo 'dvayadharmam anuprāpnoti?
S06psp_5u:3110: subhūtir āha: kiṃ punar bhagavan dvayadharmo 'dvayadharmam anuprāpnoti?
S06psp_5u:3113: subhūtir āha: katham idānīṃ bhagavann anuprāpyate?
S06psp_5u:3114: bhagavān āha: yathā nādvayo na dvayo dharma upalabhyate.
S06psp_5u:3115: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ bhagavan nādvayo na dvayo dharma upalabhyate?
S06psp_5u:3116: bhagavān āha: anupalambhaṃ prati na rūpam anupalambhena prāpnoti,
S06psp_5u:3117: na vedanān na saṃjñān na saṃskārān,
S06psp_5u:3118: na vijñānam anupalambhena prāpnoti. iti dvayābhāvasaṃmohavikalpaḥ
S06psp_5u:3120: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:3121: gambhīrā bhagavan prajñāpāramitā duṣkarakārakā bhagavan bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau prasthitā na ca nāmasattva upalabhyate na sattvaprajñāptis,
S06psp_5u:3122: teṣāṃ ca sattvānāṃ kṛtaśo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhum abhisaṃprasthitāḥ. tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan kaścid eva puruṣa ākāśe apratiṣṭhāne stambam icched dhāpayitum,
S06psp_5u:3123: evam eva bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sattvānāṃ kṛtenecchet sarvākārajñatām anuprāptum.
S06psp_5u:3124: bhagavān āha: evam etat subhūte evam etat,
S06psp_5u:3125: duṣkarakārakā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye sattvānāṃ kṛtaśaḥ sarvākārajñatārtham abhipratiṣṭhante,
S06psp_5u:3126: tāñ ca sarvākārajñatām anubudhya sarvasattvān saṃsārāt parimocayiṣyanti. iti sarvākārajñatāyā abhāvālambanajñānam
S06psp_5u:3127: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte puruṣaḥ stambam icched vāpanāya sa ca puruṣas tasya stambasya na mūlaṃ jānīyād na śākhāṃ na tvacchedaṃ na pattraṃ na palāśaṃ na puṣpaṃ jānīyāt,
S06psp_5u:3128: sa tasya stambasya kāṇḍaṃ vāpayeta vāpayitvā kālena kālaṃ gopāyatodakaṃ dadyād arthaṃ tasya tat kāṇḍam anupūrveṇa śākhāsaṃpannañ ca bhavet,
S06psp_5u:3133_0: puṣpāṇi ca phalāni cānubhuñjīta. evam eva subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sarvasattvānāṃ
S06psp_5u:3133_1: kṛtaśo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhum abhisaṃprasthitā anupūrveṇa ṣaṭsu
S06psp_5u:3134_0: tataḥ sarvasattvānāṃ pattrapuṣpaphalopajīvyā bhavanti. tatredaṃ subhūte pattraṃ bodhisattvānāṃ
S06psp_5u:3134_1: mahāsattvānāṃ yad āgamya sattvās tribhyo 'pāyebhyaḥ parimucyante. tatredaṃ puṣpaṃ
S06psp_5u:3135_0: vā cāturmahārājakāyikeṣu deveṣūpapadyante trayastriṃśeṣu yāmeṣu tuṣiteṣu nirmāṇaratisu
S06psp_5u:3135_2: tatredaṃ phalaṃ yad āgamya sattvāḥ srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhante,
S06psp_5u:3140: tad eva ca phalam āgamya sattvāḥ sarvākārajñatam anuprāpnuvanti,
S06psp_5u:3142: tatra ye dakṣiṇāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayanti te sarve 'nupūrveṇa tribhir yānaiḥ parinirvānti,
S06psp_5u:3143: yad uta śrāvakayānena vā pratyekabuddhayānena vā mahāyānena vā,
S06psp_5u:3146: na ca sattvaprajñāptis te ca sattvā ātmagrāhataḥ parimocyante. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyaṃ,
S06psp_5u:3147: na ceha kaścit sattvo vā sattvaprajñāptir vopalabhyate,
S06psp_5u:3148: yeṣāṃ sattvānām ahaṃkṛte na sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyāmīti.
S06psp_5u:3149: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:3150: tathāgata eva bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:3151: tathā hi bhagavan bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam āgamya sarvanarakā ucchidyante,
S06psp_5u:3158: bhagavān āha: evam etat subhūte evam etat,
S06psp_5u:3159: tathāgata evam eva subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ. sacet punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye nābhipratiṣṭhet,
S06psp_5u:3160: nātītānāgatapratyutpannā buddhā bhagavanto 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhā nābhisaṃbhotsyante nābhisaṃbudhyante. na pratyekabuddhānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhaviṣyati,
S06psp_5u:3164: srotaāpannānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo na bhaviṣyati. na sarvanarakā ucchetsyante,
