S06psp_5u:3354: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:3355: bodhisattvacaryā bodhisattvacaryeti bhagavann ucyate kasyaitad adhivacanam?
S06psp_5u:3357: bodhisattvacaryeti subhūte bodhaye caryaiṣā bodhicārikā tasmād bodhisattvacaryety ucyate.
S06psp_5u:3358: subhūtir āha: kva sā bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsavasya bodhisattvacaryā?
S06psp_5u:3359: bhagavān āha: rūpaṃ śūnyam iti carati,
S06psp_5u:3409: evam atra carati yathā bodhim advayī karoti na dvaidhī karoti. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran bodhaye carati. iti prayoge vipratipattiḥ
S06psp_5u:3410: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat: buddho buddha iti bhagavann ucyate,
S06psp_5u:3413: bhūtārtho buddha ity ucyate. api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte bhūtā asya dharmā abhisaṃbuddhās tasmād buddha ity ucyate,
S06psp_5u:3414: bhūto 'syārthaḥ pratividdhas tasmād buddha ity ucyate. api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte sarvadharmā yathāvadabhisaṃbuddhās tasmād buddha ity ucyate. iti buddharatne vipratipattiḥ
S06psp_5u:3415: subhūtir āha: bodhir iti bhagavan kasyaitad adhivacanam?
S06psp_5u:3416: bhagavān āha: bodhir iti subhūte śūnyatāyā etad adhivacanaṃ,
S06psp_5u:3420_0: dharmadhātor etad adhivacanam. api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte nāmadheyamātram etad bodhir
S06psp_5u:3420_1: iti. api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte abhedārtho bodhyarthaḥ. api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte
S06psp_5u:3420_2: bodhis tathatāvitathatānanyatathatānanyathībhāvas tasmād bodhir ity ucyate. api tu
S06psp_5u:3420_3: khalu punaḥ subhūte nāmanimittamātram etad bodhir iti tasmād bodhir ucyate. api tu
S06psp_5u:3420_4: khalu punaḥ subhūte buddhānām eva bhagavatām eṣā bodhis tasmād bodhir ity ucyate.
S06psp_5u:3420_5: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte buddhair eṣā bhagavadbhir abhisaṃbuddhās tasmād bodhir
S06psp_5u:3421: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:3422: yo bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattva imā yair bodhaye carati,
S06psp_5u:3429: kasya dharmasyāgame vā caraty apagame vā hānau vā vṛddhau vā utpādāya vā nirodhāya vā saṃkleśāya vyavadānāya vā?
S06psp_5u:3430: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:3431: yaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva imā yair bodhaye carati,
S06psp_5u:3438_0: na kasyacid dharmasyāgame vā caraty apagame vā hānau vā vṛddhau vā utpādāya vā nirodhāya
S06psp_5u:3438_1: vā saṃkleśāya vyavadānāya vā. na hi subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhiḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
S06psp_5u:3438_2: carata ārambaṇayogena pratyupasthitā ācaye vā apacaye vā hānau vā vṛddhau vā utpādāya
S06psp_5u:3438_3: vā nirodhāya vā saṃkleśāya vā vyavadānāya vā pratyupasthitā.
S06psp_5u:3440: yadi bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahyāsattvasya bodhir na kasyacid dharmasyārambaṇayogena pratyupasthitā,
S06psp_5u:3441: tat katham idānīṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran dānapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti,
S06psp_5u:3456: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:3457: na hi subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dvayena bodhisattvacarir,
S06psp_5u:3458: na hi bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dvayena dānapāramitāyāṃ carati,
S06psp_5u:3473: subhūtir āha: yadi bhagavan dānapāramitāyāṃ na dvayena caraty,
S06psp_5u:3474: evaṃ śīlakṣāntivīryadhyānapāramitāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ na dvayena carati,
S06psp_5u:3479: tat katham idānīṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kuśalamūlair vivardhate prathamacittotpādam upādāya yāvat paścimakaś cittotpādaḥ kuśalamūlair vivardhate?
S06psp_5u:3480: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:3481: ye subhūte dvayena caranti na te vivardhante kuśalamūlair dharmaiḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:3482: dvaye niśritya hi subhūte sarvabālapṛthagjanās te na vivardhate kuśalamūlair dharmair,
S06psp_5u:3483: bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punar advayena carati tena prathamacittotpādam upādāya kuśalamūlair dharmair vivardhate,
S06psp_5u:3484: yāvat paścimakaś cittotpādaḥ kuśalamūlair dharmair vivardhate. tenānavamardanīyo bhavati sadevamānuṣāsureṇa lokena,
S06psp_5u:3485_0: yair akuśalair dharmair avamarditaḥ samānaḥ śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau
S06psp_5u:3485_1: vāpated ity ebhiś cānyaiś cākuśalair dharmaiḥ saṃhriyamāṇo dānapāramitāyāṃ caran
S06psp_5u:3487: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na kuśalair dharmair vivardhate,
S06psp_5u:3489: adhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ caran na kuśalair dharmair vivardhate,
S06psp_5u:3492: sarvākārajñatāyāṃ caran na kuśalair dharmair vivardhate. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyam.
S06psp_5u:3494: kiṃ punar bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kuśalamūlānāṃ kṛtaśaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati?
S06psp_5u:3495: bhagavān āha: na subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kuśalamūlānāṃ kṛtaśaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati,
S06psp_5u:3499: kalyāṇamitrair aparigṛhīto bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatām anuprāptum.
S06psp_5u:3500: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ bhagavan paryupāsya buddhān bhagavataḥ kuśalamulāni (PSP_5:143)
S06psp_5u:3501: paripūrya kalyāṇamitraparigṛhīto bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnoti?
S06psp_5u:3503: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prathamacittotpādam upādāya tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān paryupāste,
S06psp_5u:3504_0: yaṃ ca te buddhā bhagavanto dharmaṃ bhāṣante sūtraṃ geyaṃ vyākaraṇam itivṛttakaṃ
S06psp_5u:3504_1: jātakaṃ saṃgrahavaipulyādbhutadharmāvadānopadeśāṃs tān sarvān udgṛhṇāty udgṛhya kāyena
S06psp_5u:3504_2: vācā suparijitān kṛtvā manasā tatprekṣitān karoti,
S06psp_5u:3508: pratisaṃvidbhir utpāditābhis tasya jātivyativṛttasyāpi te dharmā na jātu vipraṇasyanti yāvat sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnoti,
S06psp_5u:3509: tatra tais tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaiḥ kuṣalamūlāny avaropayati,
S06psp_5u:3510: taiś ca kuśalamūlaiḥ parigṛhīto na jātv apāyair vākṣaṇair votpadyate,
S06psp_5u:3514: taiś ca kuśalamūlaiḥ parigṛhītaḥ kalyāṇamitraiś ca na jātu virahito bhavati buddhair bhagavadbhir bodhisattvair mahāsattvaiḥ śrāvakaiś ca ye buddhayānasya varṇaṃ bhāṣante,
S06psp_5u:3515: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā buddhā bhagavantaḥ paryupāsitavyāḥ,
S06psp_5u:3518: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:3519: yaḥ punar bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo nāpi buddhān bhagavataḥ paryupāste,
S06psp_5u:3522: mā haiva bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnuyāt.
S06psp_5u:3524: na khalu subhūte buddhān bhagavato 'paryupāsyānavaropitakuśalamūlaḥ kalyāṇamitrair aparigṛhītaḥ sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnuyāt. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:3525_0: buddhān eva tāvad bhagavataḥ paryupāsya kuśalamūlāny avaropya kalyāṇamitrāṇi ca sevitvā
S06psp_5u:3525_1: bhajitvā paryupāsyaivaṃ kuśalamūlasamanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatām
S06psp_5u:3525_2: anuprāptum asamarthaḥ prāg eva buddhān bhagavato 'paryupāsya kuśalamūlāny anavaropya
S06psp_5u:3525_3: kalyāṇamitrair aparigṛhītaḥ sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnuyād iti nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate,
S06psp_5u:3528: kuśalamulāni cāvaropitavyāni kalyāṇamitrāṇi ca sevitavyāni bhaktavyāni paryupāsitavyāni.
S06psp_5u:3530: kena kāraṇena bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo buddhāṃś ca bhagavataḥ paryupāsya kuśalamūlāni cāvaropya kalyāṇamitrāṇi ca sevitvā bhaktvā paryupāsya sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnuyāt?
S06psp_5u:3532_0: ye nopāyena śruto bhavati teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatām antikāt sadharmas tāni ca kuśalamūlāni
S06psp_5u:3532_1: nāvaropitāni tāni ca kalyāṇamitrāṇi sevitāni bhaktitāni paryupāsitāni yāny asyopāyam
S06psp_5u:3535: yenopāyakauśalyena samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnoti?
S06psp_5u:3536: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:3537_0: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prathamacittotpādam upādāya dānapāramitāyāṃ caran
S06psp_5u:3537_1: sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair dānaṃ dadāti buddhebhyo bhagavadbhyaḥ
S06psp_5u:3538: sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikāraiḥ samanvāgato na cāsya dānasaṃjñā bhavati,
S06psp_5u:3541: tathā hi sa svalakṣaṇaśūnyān dharmān jānāti,
S06psp_5u:3542: asadbhūtān apariniṣpannān anabhinirvṛttāṃś ca sarvadharmān paśyati,
S06psp_5u:3549: na ca dānaphalam upajīvati yad dānaphalaṃ saṃsāre paribhuñjītānyatra sattvaparitrāṇatayā sattvaparimocanatayā dānapāramitāyāṃ carati.
S06psp_5u:3550: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śīlapāramitāyāṃ caran prathamacittotpādam upādāya sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikāraiḥ śīlaṃ rakṣati,
S06psp_5u:3551: tasya naiva rāge cittaṃ patati na doṣe na mohe nānuśaye na paryutthāne patati,
S06psp_5u:3553: ye bodhaye paripanthakās tadyathā mātsaryacittaṃ vā dauḥśīlyacittaṃ vā kṣubdhacittaṃ vā kauśīdyacittaṃ vā hīnacittaṃ vā bhrāntacittaṃ (PSP_5:145)
S06psp_5u:3554: vā dauṣprajñacittaṃ vā mānātimāno 'dhimāno 'smimānaḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddhacittaṃ vā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:3555: tathā hi sa svalakṣaṇaśūnyān dharmān jānāti,
S06psp_5u:3556: asadbhūtān apariniṣpannān anabhinirvṛttāṃś ca sarvadharmān paśyati,
S06psp_5u:3561: sa śīlapāramitāyāṃ caran sattvāṃś ca paripācayati,
S06psp_5u:3563: na ca śīlaphalam upajīvati yac chīlaphalaṃ saṃsāre paribhuñjītānyatra sattvaparitrāṇatayā sattvaparimocanatayā śīlapāramitāyāṃ carati.
S06psp_5u:3564: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ caran prathamacittotpādam upādāya sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārais tāṃ kṣāntiṃ bhāvayati,
S06psp_5u:3565: sa svakeṣv api prāṇeṣu vyavaropyamāneṣu na pratidahyate,
S06psp_5u:3567_0: sa jīvitād vyaparopyamāno 'pi sarvasve vāpahriyamāṇe dāre vākṛṣyamāṇe mṛṣāvāda ucyamānaḥ
S06psp_5u:3567_1: piśunaṃ paruṣaṃ saṃbhinnaṃ vocyamāna ākruṣyamāṇo vā tāḍyamāno vā cchidyamāno vā na
S06psp_5u:3567_2: kṣubhyati sattvānām eva hitam utpādayati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:3569: asadbhūtān apariniṣpannān anabhinirvṛttāṃś ca sarvadharmān paśyati,
S06psp_5u:3572: so 'nenopāyakauśalyena samanvāgataḥ kuśalair dharmair vivardhate sa kuśalair dharmair vivardhamānaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ carati,
S06psp_5u:3573: sa kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ caran sarvasattvāṃś ca paripācayati,
S06psp_5u:3575: na ca kṣāntiphalam upajīvati yat kṣāntiphalaṃ saṃsāre paribhuñjītānyatra sattvaparitrāṇatayā sattvaparimocanatayā kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ carati.
S06psp_5u:3576: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vīryapāramitāyāṃ caran prathamacittotpādam upādāya sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair vīryam ārabhate,
S06psp_5u:3577: dṛḍhasaṃnāho dṛḍhaparākramo na kauśīdyaṃ vā alasacittaṃ votpādayati,
S06psp_5u:3578_0: sa bodher arthāya duḥkham api na gaṇapatidakṣo 'nalaso 'pi śaktibhir vāryamāṇo manuṣyaduṣkham
S06psp_5u:3578_1: asuraduḥkhaṃ tiryagyoniduḥkhaṃ narakaduṣkham api na gaṇapatir api śaktibhir vāryamāṇaḥ. tat (PSP_5:146)
S06psp_5u:3580: tathā hi sa svalakṣaṇaśūnyān dharmān jānāti,
S06psp_5u:3581: asadbhūtān apariniṣpannān anabhinirvṛttāṃś ca sarvadharmān paśyati,
S06psp_5u:3585: sa kuśalair dharmair vivardhamāno vīryapāramitāyāṃ caran sattvāṃś ca paripācayati,
S06psp_5u:3587: na ca vīryaphalam upajīvati yad vīryaphalaṃ saṃsāre paribhuñjītānyatra sattvaparitrāṇatayā sattvaparimocanatayā vīryapāramitāyāṃ carati.
S06psp_5u:3588: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhyānapāramitāyāṃ caran prathamacittotpādam upādāya sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair dhyānaṃ samāpadyate,
S06psp_5u:3589: cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā na nimittagrāhī bhavati nānuvyañjanagrāhī bhavati,
S06psp_5u:3590: yathāvikaraṇam evaṃ cakṣurindriyeṇāsaṃvarasaṃvṛtaṃ viharantam abhidhyā daurmanasyāḥ pāpakā akuśalā dharmāś cittam anuśraveyuḥ,
S06psp_5u:3591: teṣāṃ saṃvarāya pratipadyate rakṣati cakṣurindriyam evaṃ śrotreṇa śabdān śrutvā,
S06psp_5u:3595: manasā dharmān vijñāya na nimittagrāhī bhavati,
S06psp_5u:3597: yathāvikaraṇam evaṃ manaindriyenāsaṃvarasaṃvṛtaṃ viharantam abhidhyā daurmanasyāḥ pāpakā akuśalā dharmāś cittam anuśraveyuḥ,
S06psp_5u:3600: sa gacchann api tiṣṭhann api niṣaṇṇo 'pi śayāno 'pi bhāṣamāno 'pi tūṣṇībhūto 'pi samāhitāvasthāṃ na jahāti na vijahāti,
S06psp_5u:3602_0: śāntakāyaḥ śāntavāk śāntacitto rahasyarahasi vāvikalpiteryāpatho yaiḥ kecid apy annapānaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraiḥ
S06psp_5u:3602_1: saṃtuṣṭaḥ surabhaḥ supoṣyaḥ kalyāṇācāragocaraḥ saṃgaṇikāyā api vivekagocaraḥ lābhe
S06psp_5u:3602_2: 'lābhe ca sa nirvikāro 'nunnatāvanataḥ sukhe duṣkhe stutau nindāyāṃ yaśasyayaśasi
S06psp_5u:3602_3: jīvite ca maraṇe ca samo nirvikāro 'nunnatāvanataḥ,
S06psp_5u:3603: śatrau ca mitre ca sādhau cāsādhau ca manaāpavartiny amanaāpavartiny āryeṣu śabdesv anāryeṣu (PSP_5:147)
S06psp_5u:3604: śabdeṣu vivikteṣu vyavakīrṇeṣu ca samo nirvikāro 'nunnatāvanataḥ priyāpriyeṣu rūpeṣv anurodhavirodhāpagaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:3605: tathā hi sa svalakṣaṇaśūnyān dharmān jānāti,
S06psp_5u:3606: asadbhūtān apariniṣpannān anabhinirvṛttāṃś ca sarvadharmān paśyati,
S06psp_5u:3610: sa kuśalair dharmair vivardhamāno dhyānapāramitāyāṃ carati,
S06psp_5u:3611: sa dhyānapāramitāyāṃ caran sattvāṃś ca paripācayati,
S06psp_5u:3613: na dhyānaphalam upajīvati yad dhyānaphalaṃ saṃsāre paribhuñjītānyatra sattvaparitrāṇatayā sattvaparimocanatayā dhyānapāramitāyāṃ carati.
S06psp_5u:3614_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran prathamacittotpādam
S06psp_5u:3614_1: upādāya sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair na duṣprajño bhavati na parapraṇeyo
S06psp_5u:3615: ātmasattva jīvajantu poṣapuruṣa pudgalamanujamānavakārakavedakajānakapaśyakavigataś ca bhavati sarvadṛṣṭivigataḥ sarvaśūnyatāvigato nirvikalpo nirvikāraḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:3616: tathā hi sa svalakṣaṇaśūnyān dharmān jānāti,
S06psp_5u:3617: asadbhūtān apariniṣpannān anabhinirvṛttāṃś ca sarvadharmān paśyati,
S06psp_5u:3622: sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sattvāṃś ca paripācayati,
S06psp_5u:3624: na ca prajñāphalam upajīvati yat prajñāphalaṃ saṃsāre paribhuñjītānyatra sattvaparitrāṇatayā sattvaparimocanatayā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati.
S06psp_5u:3625: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate,
S06psp_5u:3630: prathamacittotpādam upādāya sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair na ca teṣāṃ vipākaṃ parigṛhṇāti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:3631: tathā hi sa tenopāyakauśalyena samanvāgato bhavati,
S06psp_5u:3632: yenopāyakauśalyena samanvāgatas tāni ca dhyānāny apramāṇārūpyasamāpattīḥ samāpadyamānaḥ sa (PSP_5:148)
S06psp_5u:3634: asadbhutān apariniṣpannan anabhinirvṛttāṃś ca sarvadharmān paśyati,
S06psp_5u:3638: sa kuśalair dharmair vivardhamāno dhyānāpramāṇārūpyasamāpattīś ca samāpadyate.
S06psp_5u:3639: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran darśanabhāvanāprahātavye 'smin mārge carati,
S06psp_5u:3641: na sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ nānāgāmiphalaṃ nārhattvam anuprāpnoti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:3642: tathā hi sa svalakṣaṇaśūnyān sarvadharmān jānāti,
S06psp_5u:3643: asadbhūtān apariniṣpannān anabhinirvṛttāṃś ca sarvadharmān paśyati,
S06psp_5u:3647: sa kuśalair dharmair vivardhamānaḥ saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyeṣu dharmeṣu carati,
S06psp_5u:3648: bodhipakṣyeṣu dharmeṣu caran śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmim atikramatīyaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyānutpattikair dharmaiḥ kṣāntiḥ.
S06psp_5u:3649: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann aṣṭavimokṣān samāpadyate,
S06psp_5u:3653: na sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ nānāgāmiphalaṃ nārhattvam anuprāpnoti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:3654: tathā hi sa svalakṣaṇaśūnyān dharmān jānāti,
S06psp_5u:3655: asadbhūtān apariniṣpannān anabhinirvṛttāṃś ca sarvadharmān paśyati,
S06psp_5u:3660: sa vimokṣasamādhisamāpattyāryasatyaśūnyatānimittāpraṇihiteṣu caran śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmim avakrāmatīyaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyānutpattikadharmavyākaraṇakṣāntiḥ.
S06psp_5u:3661: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran daśasu tathāgatabaleṣu parijayaṃ karoti,
S06psp_5u:3663: catasṛṣu pratisaṃvitsv aṣṭādaśasv āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu mahāmaitryāṃ mahākaruṇāyāṃ ca,
S06psp_5u:3666: sarvasattvāś ca na paripācitā bhavanti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:3667: tathā hi sa svalakṣaṇaṃ śūnyān dharmān jānāti,
S06psp_5u:3668: asadbhūtān apariniṣpannān anabhinirvṛttāṃś ca sarvadharmān paśyati,
S06psp_5u:3670: akiṃcitsamarthatāṃ ca sarvadharmāṇāṃ saṃskāraṃ lakṣaṇam avatarati,
S06psp_5u:3672: sa kuśalair dharmair vivardhamāno daśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidāveṇikābuddhadharmeṣu mahāmaitryāṃ mahākaruṇāyāṃ caran buddhakṣetraṃ ca pariśodhayati,
S06psp_5u:3673: sattvāṃś ca paripācayati. evaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyam.
S06psp_5u:3674: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:3678: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat: evam etat subhūte evam etat,
S06psp_5u:3679: paramabuddhimantaḥ subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ya evaṃ gambhīreṣu dharmeṣu caranti,
S06psp_5u:3680: vipākaṃ ca na pratigṛhṇanti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:3681: tathā hi subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ svabhāvato na calanti.
S06psp_5u:3682: subhūtir āha: kasmāt svabhāvān na calanti?
S06psp_5u:3684: yat punar āyuṣmān subūtir evam āha katamasmāt svabhāvān na calanti,
S06psp_5u:3686: na vedanāyā na saṃjñāyā na saṃskārāṇāṃ,
S06psp_5u:3691: śīlapāramitāyāḥ kṣāntipāramitāyā vīryapāramitāyā dhyānapāramitāyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ svabhāvān na calanti,
S06psp_5u:3692: adhyātmaśūnyatāyā bahirdhāśūnyatāyā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāḥ svabhāvān na calanti,
S06psp_5u:3693: apramāṇasvabhāvād dhyānārūpyasamāpattisvabhāvāt smṛtyupasthānasvabhāvāt samyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgasvabhāvād āryāṣṭāṅgamārgasvabhāvān na calanti,
S06psp_5u:3697: daśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidāveṇikābuddhadharmasvabhāvān na calanti mahāmaitrīmahākaruṇāsvabhāvān na calanti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:3698: tathā hi subhūte ya eṣa dharmo niḥsvabhāvaḥ so 'bhāvaḥ.
S06psp_5u:3700: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:3701: tat kiṃ punar bhagavann abhāvenābhāvaḥ śakyo 'bhisaṃboddhum?
S06psp_5u:3703: subhūtir āha: tat kiṃ punar bhagavan bhāvena bhāvaḥ śakyo 'bhisaṃboddhum?
S06psp_5u:3705: subhūtir āha: tat kiṃ bhagavann abhāvena bhāvaḥ śakyo 'bhisaṃboddhum?
S06psp_5u:3707: subhūtir āha: tat kiṃ bhagavan bhāvenābhāvaḥ śakyo 'bhisaṃboddhum?
S06psp_5u:3709: subhūtir āha: tan mā haiva bhagavan na prāptir nābhisamayo bhaviṣyati?
S06psp_5u:3714: bhagavān āha: asyābhisamayo na punar anena catuḥprakārābhinihāreṇa.
S06psp_5u:3715: subhūtir āha: katham idānīṃ bhagavann abhisamayaḥ?
S06psp_5u:3717: sa tādṛśo 'bhisamayo yatraite prapañcā na saṃvidyante,
S06psp_5u:3720: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:3721: kiṃ punar bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prapañcaḥ?
S06psp_5u:3722: bhagavān āha: rūpan nityam anityam iti vā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prapañcaḥ,
S06psp_5u:3724: vijñānaṃ nityam anityam iti vā prapañcaḥ,
S06psp_5u:3727: vijñānaṃ sukhaṃ duḥkham iti vā prapañcaḥ,
S06psp_5u:3733: vijñānaṃ śāntam aśāntam iti vā prapañcaḥ,
S06psp_5u:3734: rūpaṃ parijñeyam aparijñeyam iti vā prapañcaḥ,
S06psp_5u:3737: vijñānaṃ parijñeyam aparijñeyam iti vā prapañcaḥ,
S06psp_5u:3738_1: iti vā prapañcaḥ. duṣkham āryasatyaṃ parijñeyam iti prapañcaḥ,
S06psp_5u:3746: catvāri samyakprahāṇāni catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ pañcendriyāṇi pañca balāni sapta bodhyaṅgāni bhāvayitavyānīti prapañcaḥ,
S06psp_5u:3750: srotaāpattiphalaṃ sakṛdāgāmiphalam anāgāmiphalam arhattvam atikramiṣyāmīti prapañcaḥ,
S06psp_5u:3759: adhyātmaśūnyatāṃ bahirdhāśūnyatām adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāṃ yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāṃ bhāvayiṣyāmīti prapañcaḥ,
S06psp_5u:3760: catvāri vaiśāradyāni daśatathāgatabalāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān utpādayiṣyāmīti prapañcaḥ,
S06psp_5u:3762: sarvavāsanānusaṃdhikleśān prahāsyāmīti prapañcaḥ. tasmād bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran rūpaṃ nityam anityam ity aprapañcan na prapañcayati,
S06psp_5u:3766: parijñeyam aparijñeyam ity aprapañcan na prapañcayati,
S06psp_5u:3768: vijñānaṃ nityam anityam aprapañcan na prapañcayati,
S06psp_5u:3772: parijñeyam aparijñeyam ity aprapañcan na prapañcayati. evaṃ skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādān pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni ca nityam anityam iti,
S06psp_5u:3777_0: parijñeyam aparijñeyam iti vāprapañcan na prapañcayati. evaṃ sarvapāramitāḥ sarvaśūnyatā
S06psp_5u:3778: srotaāpannasakṛdāgāmyanāgāmyarhattvapratyekabuddhabodhim atikramiṣyāmity aprapañcan na prapañcayati. sarvākārajñatām atikramiṣyāmity aprapañcan na prapañcayati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:3781: na hi svabhāvo 'bhāvaṃ vā sthāpayitvā anyat kiñcid upalabhate,
S06psp_5u:3784: yena vā prapañcayet. tasmāt tarhi subhūte niṣprapañcaṃ rūpaṃ,
S06psp_5u:3789_0: sarvapāramitāḥ sarvaśūnyatāḥ sarvabodhipakṣyā dharmāḥ sarvasamādhayaḥ sarvadhāraṇīmukhāny
S06psp_5u:3793: anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir niṣprapañcā. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena niṣprapañcena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyam.
S06psp_5u:3795: kathaṃ bhagavan rūpaṃ niṣprapañcaṃ yāvad vijñānaṃ niḥprapañcaṃ peyālaṃ yāvad bodhir niṣprapañcā?
S06psp_5u:3796: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat: nāsti subhūte rūpasya svabhāvo,
S06psp_5u:3797: nāsti vedanāyā nāsti saṃjñāyā nāsti saṃskārāṇāṃ nāsti vijñānasya svabhāvo,
S06psp_5u:3798_1: pāramitānāṃ svabhāvo nāsti śūnyatāmukhānāṃ svabhāvaḥ. evaṃ nāsti bodhipakṣyadharmāryasatyāpramāṇadhyānārūpyavimokṣasamādhisamāpattidhāraṇīmukhaśūnyatānimittāpraṇihitābhijñādaśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidāveṇikabuddhadharmāṇāṃ
S06psp_5u:3799: yasya svabhāvaṃ nāsti so 'prapañco 'nena subhūte kāraṇena niṣprapañcaṃ rūpaṃ,
S06psp_5u:3804: sarvāḥ pāramitāḥ sarvaśūnyatā bodhipakṣyā dharmā niṣprapañcāḥ,
S06psp_5u:3808: sarvākārajñatā niṣprapañcā. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhi sattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran bodhisattvaniyāmam avakrāmati.
S06psp_5u:3809: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:3810: yadi bhagavan na kasyacid dharmasya svabhāva upalabhate,
S06psp_5u:3811: tat katamena mārgeṇa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhisattvaniyāmam avakrāmati?
S06psp_5u:3812: kiṃ śrāvakamārgeṇa vā pratyekabuddhamārgeṇa vā buddhamārgeṇa vā?
S06psp_5u:3813: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:3814_0: na subhūte śrāvakamārgeṇa vā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhisattvaniyāmam avakrāmati
S06psp_5u:3814_1: na pratyekabuddhamārgeṇa vā na buddhamārgeṇa vā. api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo
S06psp_5u:3815: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte arhan sarvamārgeṣu śikṣitvā samyaktvaniyāmam avakrāmati,
S06psp_5u:3817: yāvan na phalamārgam utpādayati. evam eva subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvamārgān utpādya bodhisattvaniyāmam avakrāmati,
S06psp_5u:3819: yāvan na vajropamaḥ samādhiḥ pratilabdho bhavati,
S06psp_5u:3820: tataḥ sa ekalakṣaṇasamāyuktayā prajñayā sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnoti. iti viparyāse vipratipattiḥ
S06psp_5u:3821: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:3822: yadi bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvamārgān paripūrya bodhisattvaniyāmam avakrāmati,
S06psp_5u:3824: anyaḥ srotaāpannasyānyaḥ sakṛdāgāmitāyāḥ pratipannakasyānyaḥ sakṛdāgāmino 'nyo 'nāgāmitāyāḥ pratipannakasyānyo 'nāgāmino 'nyo 'rhattvapratipannakasyānyo 'rhato mārgaḥ,
S06psp_5u:3827: tat kathaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvamārgān paripūrya bodhisattvaniyāmam avakrāmati? (PSP_5:154)
S06psp_5u:3828: yadi bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvamārgāḥ paripurayitavyāḥ,
S06psp_5u:3829: mā khalu bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'ṣṭamakamārgam utpādyāṣṭamako bhaviṣyati,
S06psp_5u:3831: bhāvanāmārgam utpādya sakṛdāgāmitāyai pratipannakaḥ sakṛdāgāmī bhaviṣyaty,
S06psp_5u:3835: asthānaṃ bhagavann anavakāśo yad bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'ṣṭamakamārgam utpādyāṣṭamakaḥ,
S06psp_5u:3836: syād aṣṭamako bhūtvā bodhisattvaniyāmam avakrāmed iti,
S06psp_5u:3840: evaṃ srotaāpattiphalaṃ prāpya sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ prāpyānāgāmiphalaṃ prāpyārhattvaṃ prāpya pratyekāṃ bodhiṃ prāpya bodhisattvaniyāmam avakrāmed iti,
S06psp_5u:3843: nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate. tat kathaṃ bhagavan jānīyāma vayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvamārgān utpādya bodhisattvaniyāmam avakrāmatiti?
S06psp_5u:3844: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat: evam etat subhūte evam etat,
S06psp_5u:3845_0: asthānaṃ subhūte anavakāśo yad bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'ṣṭamako bhūtvā srotaāpattiphalaṃ
S06psp_5u:3845_1: prāpya sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ prāpyānāgāmiphalaṃ prāpyārhattvaṃ prāpya pratyekāṃ bodhiṃ
S06psp_5u:3850: kathaṃ bhagavann etān mārgān prāpya bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnoti?
S06psp_5u:3851: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:3852: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prathamacittotpādam upādāya ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu carann aṣṭau bhūmīr jñānena ca darśanena cātikrāmati. katamā aṣṭa?
S06psp_5u:3853: yad uta śuklavidarśanābhūmir gotrabhūmir aṣṭamakabhūmir darśanabhūmis tanūbhūmir vītarāgabhūmiḥ kṛtāvībhūmiḥ pratyekabuddhabhūmir,
S06psp_5u:3854: ayaṃ bhūminirdeśaḥ. sa imā aṣṭau bhūmīr jñānena darśanena cātikramya mārgajñatayā bodhisattvaniyāmam avakrāmati,
S06psp_5u:3856: sarvākārajñatājñānena sarvavāsanānusaṃdhikleśān prajahāti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:3857: tathā hi subhūte yad aṣṭamakasya jñānañ ca prahāṇañ ca sā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kṣāntir,
S06psp_5u:3858: yaṃ srotaāpannasya jñānañ ca prahāṇañ ca sā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kṣāntir,
S06psp_5u:3859: yat sakṛdāgāmino jñānañ ca prahāṇañ ca sā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kṣāntir,
S06psp_5u:3860: yad anāgāmino jñānañ ca prahāṇañ ca sā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kṣāntir,
S06psp_5u:3861: yad arhato jñānañ ca prahāṇañ ca sā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kṣāntir,
S06psp_5u:3862_0: yat pratyekabuddhasya jñānañ ca prahāṇañ ca sā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kṣāntiḥ.
S06psp_5u:3862_1: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvamārgān sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ
S06psp_5u:3863_0: bodhisattvaniyāmam avakramya sarvākārajñatājñānena ca sarvavāsanānusaṃdhikleśān prajahāti.
S06psp_5u:3863_1: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvamārgān paripūryānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir
S06psp_5u:3863_2: abhisaṃbodhavyā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya sarvasattvānāṃ phalopabhogena bhavitavyam.
S06psp_5u:3864: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:3865: ya ime bhagavan mārgā ākhyātāḥ śrāvakamārgaḥ pratyekabuddhamārgo buddhamārgaḥ,
S06psp_5u:3867: bhagavān āha: iha subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvamārgākārajñatāviśuddhir utpādayitavyā,
S06psp_5u:3868: tatreyaṃ subhūte sarvadharmā mārgākārajñatāviśuddhiḥ. yair ākārair yair liṅgair yair nimittaiḥ sarvamārgākārajñatā visuddhir bhavati,
S06psp_5u:3869: te ākārās tāni liṅgāni tāni nimittāni bodhisattvena mahāsattvenābhisaṃboddhavyāni,
S06psp_5u:3870: abhisaṃbudhya pareṣām ākhyātavyāni nirdeśayitavyāni prakāśayitavyāni prajñepayitavyāni prasthāpayitavyāni,
S06psp_5u:3871: vivaritavyāni parebhyo vinayārthāya yathā pare jānīyur iti. tatra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvasattvarutasaṃketaghoṣāḥ samudānayitavyā uccārayitavyāś ca,
S06psp_5u:3872_0: yai rutasaṃketaghoṣaiḥ trisāhasre mahāsāhasre lokadhātau vijñāpayati yadidaṃ pratiśrutkopamā
S06psp_5u:3872_1: jñānena. tad anena subhūte paryāyeṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvamārgākārajñatā paripūrayitavyā,
S06psp_5u:3874: nairayikānāṃ sattvānāṃ nairayiko mārgo jñātavyo hetur jñātavyaḥ phalaṃ jñātavyaṃ tataś ca nairayikamārgān nivārayitavyāḥ,
S06psp_5u:3878: sattvānāṃ tiryagmārgo jñātavyo hetur jñātavyo phalaṃ jñātavyaṃ tataś ca tiryagmārgān nivārayitavyāḥ,
S06psp_5u:3880_0: phalato nivārayitavyāḥ. evaṃ kiṃnarāṇāṃ mahoragānāṃ nāgānāṃ yakṣāṇāṃ rākṣasānāṃ gandharvāṇām
S06psp_5u:3880_1: asurāṇāṃ garuḍānāṃ guhyakānāṃ cāraṇānāṃ vidyādharāṇāṃ siddhānāṃ sādhyānāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ
S06psp_5u:3880_2: mārgo jñātavyo hetur jñātavyaḥ phalaṃ jñātavyaṃ,
S06psp_5u:3881: cāturmahārājakānāṃ devānāṃ trayastriṃśānāṃ yāmānāṃ tuṣitānāṃ nirmāṇaratīnāṃ paranirmitavaśavartināṃ devānāṃ mārgo jñātavyo hetur jñātavyaḥ phalaṃ jñātavyaṃ,
S06psp_5u:3882: brahmapāriṣadyānāṃ devānāṃ brahmapurohitānāṃ mahābrahmāṇo mārgo jñātavyo hetur jñātavyaḥ phalaṃ jñātavyam,
S06psp_5u:3883_0: ābhāsvarāṇāṃ parīttābhānām apramāṇābhānāṃ parīttaśubhānāṃ apramāṇaśubhānāṃ śubhakṛtsnānām
S06psp_5u:3883_1: anubhrakānāṃ puṇyaprasavānāṃ bṛhatphalānām asaṃjñisattvānāṃ śuddhāvāsānām aspṛhāṇām
S06psp_5u:3884_1: devānāṃ mārgo jñātavyo hetur jñātavyaḥ phalaṃ jñātavyam. catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni bhāvayitavyāni,
S06psp_5u:3898: catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā jñātavyāḥ,
S06psp_5u:3899: mahāmaitrī mahākaruṇā jñātavyā. yaiś ca mārgair ye sattvāḥ srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpayitavyāḥ tān srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpayati,
S06psp_5u:3900: ye sakṛdāgāmiphale pratiṣṭhāpayitavyāḥ tān sakṛdāgāmiphale pratiṣṭhāpayati,
S06psp_5u:3901: ye anāgāmiphale pratiṣṭhāpayitavyāḥ tān anāgāmiphale pratiṣṭhāpayati,
S06psp_5u:3903: ye pratyekāyāṃ bodhau pratiṣṭhāpayitavyā tān pratyekāyāṃ bodhau pratiṣṭhāpayati,
S06psp_5u:3904: ye 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayitavyās tān anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayati,
S06psp_5u:3906: bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya yatra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śikṣitvā sattvānām āśayam avatarati,
S06psp_5u:3907: sattvānām āśayam avatīrya tathā dharmaṃ deśayati yathāsya sā dharmadeśanāmoghākṣaṇā bhavati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:3908: tathā hy asya puruṣendriye parāparajñānaṃ suvibhaktaṃ suvijñātaṃ ca bhavati,
S06psp_5u:3909: sattvānāṃ gatiṃ cyutim upapattiṃ ca prajānāti. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyam,
S06psp_5u:3910: atra hi prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyaṃ sarvadharmā antargatā,
S06psp_5u:3912: yatra bodhisattvair mahāsattvaiś caritavyaṃ śrāvakayānikair vā pratyekabuddhayānikair vā caritavyam.
S06psp_5u:3913: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:3914: yadi bhagavan ye bodhipakṣyā dharmā yāvad yā bodhiḥ sarva ete dharmā na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktāḥ,
S06psp_5u:3916: tat kathaṃ bhagavan bodhipakṣyā dharmā bodher āhārikā bhavanti?
S06psp_5u:3917: evaṃ bhagavan na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktā arūpiṇo 'nidarśanā apratighā ekalakṣaṇā yad utālakṣaṇā dharmā na kasyacid dharmasyāhārikā vāpahārikā vā,
S06psp_5u:3918: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavann ākāśan na kasyacid dharmasyāhārakaṃ vāpahārakaṃ vā. evam eva bhagavan svalakṣaṇaśūnyā dharmā na kasyacid dharmasyāhārakā vāpahārakā vā.
S06psp_5u:3919: bhagavān āha: evam etat subhūte evam etat,
S06psp_5u:3920: na subhūte svalakṣaṇaśūnyā dharmāḥ kasyacid dharmasyāhārakā vāpahārakā vā,
S06psp_5u:3921: ye vā subhūte sattvāḥ svalakṣaṇaśūnyān dharmān na jānanti,
S06psp_5u:3923: ime bodhipakṣyā dharmā bodher āhārakā bhavanti.
S06psp_5u:3925_0: api tu khalu subhūte yañ ca rūpaṃ yā ca vedanā yā ca saṃjñā ye ca saṃskārā yac ca
S06psp_5u:3925_1: vijñānaṃ ye ca skandhā ye ca dhātavo yāni cāyatanāni yaś ca pratītyasamutpādo yāni
S06psp_5u:3925_2: ca pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni yā ca dānapāramitā yā ca śīlapāramitā yā ca kṣāntipāramitā
S06psp_5u:3925_3: yā ca vīryapāramitā yā ca dhyānapāramitā yā ca prajñāpāramitā yā cādhyātmaśūnyatā
S06psp_5u:3925_4: yā ca bahirdhāśūnyatā yā cādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā yā ca yāvad abhāvasvabhāva śūnyatā
S06psp_5u:3925_5: yac ca prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ yac ca dvitīyaṃ dhyānaṃ yac ca tṛtīyaṃ dhyānaṃ yac ca caturthaṃ dhyānaṃ,
S06psp_5u:3926: yac cākāśānantyāyatanaṃ yac ca vijñānānantyāyatanaṃ yac cākiṃcanyāyatanaṃ yac ca naivasaṃjñānā saṃjñāyatanaṃ yā ca mahāmaitrī yā ca mahākaruṇā yā ca mahāmuditā yā ca (PSP_5:158)
S06psp_5u:3927_1: śūnyatā yac cānimittaṃ yac cāpraṇihitaṃ ye cāṣṭavimokṣā yāś ca navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayo
S06psp_5u:3927_2: yāni cāryasātyāni yāś cābhijñā ye ca samādhayo yāni ca dhāraṇīmukhāni yāś ca daśabodhisattvabhūmayo
S06psp_5u:3927_3: yāni ca daśatathāgatabalāni yāni ca catvāri vaiśāradyāni yāś ca catasraḥ pratisaṃvido
S06psp_5u:3927_4: ye cāṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā yā ca mahākaruṇā yā ca yāvat sarvākārajñatā,
S06psp_5u:3928_0: ārye 'smin dharmavinaye sarva ete dharmā na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktā arūpiṇo 'nidarśanā
S06psp_5u:3928_1: apratighā ekalakṣaṇā yad utālakṣaṇāḥ. te ca khalu punaḥ subhūte tathāgatena sattvānām
S06psp_5u:3928_2: avatāraṇārthāya lokavyavahāreṇa vyavakṛtās te dharmā prajñāpayitavyāḥ,
S06psp_5u:3929: na punaḥ paramārthena. tatra subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvatra śikṣitavyaṃ jñānena ca darśanena ca śikṣitvā kecid dharmāḥ pratibodhavyāḥ kecin na pratibodhavyāḥ
S06psp_5u:3931: katame dharmā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena jñānena ca darśanena ca śikṣitvā na pratibodhavyāḥ?
S06psp_5u:3934: śrāvakabhūmiḥ pratyekabuddhabhūmiś ca śikṣitvā jñānena ca darśanena ca na pratibodhavyā,
S06psp_5u:3935: sarvākārajñatā jñānena ca darśanena ca pratibodhavyā,
S06psp_5u:3936: sarvākārajñatājñānena sarvākāraiḥ sarvadharmāś ca pratibodhavyāḥ. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ārye 'smin dharmavinaye prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_5u:3937: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:3938: āryo dharmavinayo 'nāryo dharmavinaya iti bhagavann ucyate,
S06psp_5u:3942: kiyatā bhagavann anāryo dharmavinaya ity ucyate?
S06psp_5u:3943: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:3944: iha subhūte śrāvakāḥ pratyekabuddhā bodhisattvāś ca mahāsattvāś ca tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā rāgena na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktā,
S06psp_5u:3955: prathamena dhyānena na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktā,
S06psp_5u:3957: caturthena dhyānena na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktā,
S06psp_5u:3958: maitryā karuṇayā muditayopekṣayā na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktāḥ,
S06psp_5u:3959: ākāśānantyāyatanena vijñānānantyāyatanenākiṃcanyāyatanena naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanena na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktāḥ,
S06psp_5u:3961: āryasatyaiḥ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitair na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktāḥ,
S06psp_5u:3962: aṣṭavimokṣair navānupūrvavihārasamāpattibhiḥ pañcabhir abhijñābhir na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktāḥ,
S06psp_5u:3970: yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatayā na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktāḥ,
S06psp_5u:3971: daśabhis tathāgatabalair na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktāḥ,
S06psp_5u:3972: caturbhir vaiśāradyaiś catasṛbhiḥ pratisaṃvidbhir aṣṭādaśābhir āveṇikair buddhadharmair na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktāḥ,
S06psp_5u:3973: saṃskṛtadhātāv asaṃskṛtadhātau na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:3974: tathā hi sarvadharmā arūpiṇo 'nidarśanā apratighā ekalakṣaṇā yad utālakṣaṇāḥ,
S06psp_5u:3975: te arūpiṇo 'rūpibhiḥ sārdhaṃ na saṃyuktā vā na visaṃyuktā vā,
S06psp_5u:3976: anidarśanā nidarśanaiḥ sārdhaṃ na saṃyuktā vā na visaṃyuktā vā,
S06psp_5u:3977: apratighā apratighaiḥ sārdhaṃ na saṃyuktā vā na visaṃyuktā vā,
S06psp_5u:3978: alakṣaṇā alakṣaṇaiḥ sārdhaṃ na saṃyuktā vā na visaṃyuktā vā. iti vipakṣapratipakṣayor vipratipattiḥ
S06psp_5u:3979: imā subhūte 'rūpiṇo 'nidarśanā apratighā ekalakṣaṇā yad utālakṣaṇā pāramitā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ yatra bodhisattvair mahāsattvaiḥ śikṣitavyaṃ,
S06psp_5u:3980: yatra śikṣitvā na kasyacid dharmasya lakṣaṇam upalabhyate.
S06psp_5u:3981: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:3982: na punar bhagavan rūpalakṣaṇe śikṣitavyaṃ na vedanālakṣaṇe na saṃjñālakṣaṇe na saṃskāralakṣaṇe na vijñānalakṣaṇe śikṣitavyaṃ,
S06psp_5u:3986: nābdhātulakṣaṇe na tejodhātulakṣaṇe na vāyudhātulakṣaṇe nākāśadhātulakṣaṇe (PSP_5:160)
S06psp_5u:3989: na śīlapāramitālakṣaṇe na kṣāntipāramitālakṣaṇe na vīryapāramitālakṣaṇe na dhyānapāramitālakṣaṇe na prajñāpāramitālakṣaṇe śikṣitavyaṃ,
S06psp_5u:3990: nādhyātmaśūnyatālakṣaṇe na bahirdhāśūnyatālakṣaṇe nādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatālakṣaṇe na yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatālakṣaṇe śikṣitavyaṃ,
S06psp_5u:3992: na dvitīyadhyānalakṣaṇe na tṛtīyadhyānalakṣaṇe na caturthadhyānalakṣaṇe śikṣitavyaṃ,
S06psp_5u:3993: na mahāmaitrīlakṣaṇe na mahākaruṇālakṣaṇe na muditālakṣaṇe nopekṣālakṣaṇe śikṣitavyaṃ,
S06psp_5u:3994: nākāśānantyāyatanalakṣaṇe na vijñānānantyāyatanalakṣaṇe nākiṃcanyāyatanalakṣaṇe naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanalakṣaṇe śikṣitavyaṃ,
S06psp_5u:4015: subhūtir āha: yadi bhagavann eteṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ lakṣaṇe na śikṣitavyaṃ,
S06psp_5u:4016: kathaṃ bhagavan na śikṣitvā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dharmāṇāṃ dharmalakṣaṇe śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmim atikramiṣyati?
S06psp_5u:4020: dharmacakram apravartya kathaṃ sattvān saṃsārāt parimocayiṣyati śrāvakayānena vā pratyekabuddhayānena vā buddhayānena vā?
S06psp_5u:4022: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat: yadi subhūte kasyacid dharmasya lakṣaṇaṃ syāt,
S06psp_5u:4023: tadā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena lakṣaṇe śikṣitavyaṃ syād,
S06psp_5u:4024: yasmāt tarhi sarvadharmā alakṣaṇā arūpiṇo 'nidarśanā apratighā ekalakṣaṇā yad utālakṣaṇās tasmāt tad bodhisattvena mahāsattvena nāpi lakṣaṇe śikṣitavyam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:4025: yadi pūrvaṃ lakṣaṇam abhaviṣyat paścād alakṣaṇaṃ na bhaved,
S06psp_5u:4026: yasmāt tarhi subhūte pūrvam eva te sarvadharmā alakṣaṇās tasmāt tarhy apy alakṣaṇās,
S06psp_5u:4027: tasmād bodhisattvena mahāsattvena nāpi lakṣaṇe śikṣitavyaṃ,
S06psp_5u:4028: nāpy alakṣaṇe śikṣitavyam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:4029: utpādād vā tathāgatānām anutpādād vā tathāgatānāṃ sthita evaiṣa lakṣaṇadhātuḥ.
S06psp_5u:4031: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:4032: yadi bhagavann alakṣaṇāḥ sarvadharmā na vilakṣaṇāḥ,
S06psp_5u:4034: tat kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitābhāvanā bhavati?
S06psp_5u:4035: na hi bhagavann avibhāvya prajñāpāramitāṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śakyā śrāvakabhūmir vā pratyekabuddhabhūmir vā atikramitum,
S06psp_5u:4036: anatikramya śrāvakabhūmiṃ vā pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ vā na śakyo bodhisattvena mahāsattvena bodhisattvaniyāmam avakramituṃ,
S06psp_5u:4037: bodhisattvaniyāmam anavakramya na śakyānutpattikair dharmaiḥ kṣāntir utpādayitum,
S06psp_5u:4038: anutpattikair dharmaiḥ kṣāntim anutpādya na śakyā bodhisattvābhijñā utpādayituṃ,
S06psp_5u:4040: buddhakṣetram apariśodhya na śakyāḥ sattvān paripācāyituṃ,
S06psp_5u:4041: sattvān aparipācya na śakyā sarvākārajñatām anuprāptuṃ,
S06psp_5u:4042: sarvākārajñatām ananuprāpya na śakyaṃ dharmacakraṃ pravartayituṃ,
S06psp_5u:4043: dharmacakram apravartya na śakyāḥ sattvāḥ srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpayituṃ,
S06psp_5u:4047: nāpi śakyāḥ sattvā dānamaye puṇyakriyāvastūni pratiṣṭhāpayituṃ,
S06psp_5u:4050: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat: evam etat subhūte evam etat,
S06psp_5u:4053: subhūtir āha: katham alakṣaṇasya dharmasya prajñāpāramitābhavanā bhavati?
S06psp_5u:4054: bhagavān āha: na subhūte prajñāpāramitābhāvanā bodhisattvasya mahāsāttvasyaikalakṣaṇā anekalakṣaṇā,
S06psp_5u:4055: alakṣaṇā bhāvanā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitābhāvanā bhavati.
S06psp_5u:4056: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ bhagavann alakṣaṇā bhāvanā prajñāpāramitābhāvanā bhavati?
S06psp_5u:4058: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ bhagavan sarvadharmabhāvanāvibhāvanā prajñāpāramitābhāvanā bhavati?
S06psp_5u:4172: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:4174: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ, kathaṃ vijñānabhāvanāvibhāvanā prajñāpāramitābhāvanā?
S06psp_5u:4178: sakṛdāgāmiphalam anāgāmiphalam arhattvaphalaṃ pratyekabodhir yāvat kathaṃ bhagavan sarvavāsanānusaṃdhikleśaprahāṇabhāvanāvibhāvanā prajñāpāramitābhāvanā?
S06psp_5u:4179: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:4180: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran rūpaṃ bhāva iti na bhāvayati,
S06psp_5u:4182: vijñānaṃ bhāva iti na bhāvayati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:4186: anuśayaparyutthānāni bhāva iti na bhāvayati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06psp_5u:4190: tathā hi subhūte bhāve eṣo 'ham iti saṃjñā,
S06psp_5u:4193: yo dvābhyām antābhyāṃ saktas tasya nāsti vimokṣo,
S06psp_5u:4194_0: nāsti subhūte bhāvasaṃjñinaḥ smṛtyupasthānabhāvanā na samyakprahāṇabhāvanā narddhipādabhāvanā
S06psp_5u:4194_1: nendriyabhāvanā na balabhāvanā na bodhyaṅgabhāvanā nāryāṣṭāṅgamārgabhāvanā na duḥkhāryasatyabhāvanā
S06psp_5u:4194_2: na samudayāryasatyabhāvanā na nirodhāryasatyabhāvanā na mārgāryasatyabhāvanā na śūnyatābhāvanā
S06psp_5u:4194_4: na navānupūrvavihārasamāpattibhāvanā na sarvaśūnyatābhāvanā na samādhidhāraṇīmukhabhāvanā
S06psp_5u:4196: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat: tat kim iti bhagavan bhāvaḥ? kim ity abhāvaḥ?
S06psp_5u:4197: bhagavān āha: dvayaṃ subhūte bhāvaḥ, advayam abhāvaḥ.
S06psp_5u:4198: subhūtir āha: kim iti bhagavan dvayaṃ? kim ity advayam?
S06psp_5u:4223: yāvat saṃskārās tāvat sattvā na parimucyante jātyā jarayā vyādhinā maraṇena śokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsaiḥ. tad anena subhūte paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyaṃ,
S06psp_5u:4225: nāsti śīlaṃ nāsti kṣāntir nāsti vīryaṃ nāsti dhyānaṃ nāsti prajñā nāsti mārgo nāsti jñānaṃ nāsty abhisamayo nāsty antaśo 'nulomikī kṣāntiḥ. kutaḥ punā rūpasya parijñā,
S06psp_5u:4234: kutaḥ sarvākārajñatāyāḥ parijñā yasya nāsti mārgabhāvanā,
S06psp_5u:4241: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:4242: yadi bhagavan bhāvasaṃjñina ānulomikī kṣāntir nāsti kutaḥ punaḥ prāptiḥ kuto 'bhisamayaḥ?
S06psp_5u:4243: kiṃ punar bhagavann abhāvasaṃjñina ānulomikī kṣāntiḥ? (PSP_5:167)
S06psp_5u:4244: śuklavidarśanābhūmir vā gotrabhūmir vā aṣṭamakabhūmir vā darśanabhūmir vā tanūbhūmir vā vītarāgabhūmir vā kṛtāvībhūmir vā pratyekabuddhabhūmir vā bodhisattvabhūmir vā,
S06psp_5u:4245: yā ca mārgabhāvanām āgamya kleśān prajahīta śrāvakabhūmipratisaṃyuktān vā pratyekabuddhabhūmipratisaṃyuktān vā,
S06psp_5u:4248: sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnuvan sarvavāsanānusaṃdhikleśān prajahīta. punar bhagavan nābhāvasaṃjñinaḥ kasyacid dharmasya sthānaṃ vā nirodho vā utpādo vā bhavati,
S06psp_5u:4250: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat: evam etat subhūte evam etan,
S06psp_5u:4252: na śuklavidarśanābhūmir na gotrabhūmir nāṣṭamakabhūmir na darśanabhūmir na tanūbhūmir na vītarāgabhūmir na kṛtāvībhūmir na pratyekabuddhabhūmir na bodhisattvabhūmir,
S06psp_5u:4253: na sā mārgabhāvanāyāṃ mārgabhāvanām āgamya kleśān prajahīta śrāvakabhūmipratisaṃyuktān vā pratyekabuddhabhūmipratisaṃyuktān vā,
S06psp_5u:4258: kiṃ punar bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato bhāvasaṃjñā vā bhāvaty abhavasaṃjñā vā,
S06psp_5u:4259: rūpasaṃjñā vā vedanāsaṃjñā vā saṃjñāsaṃjñā vā saṃskārasaṃjñā vā vijñānasaṃjñā vā,
S06psp_5u:4261: rāgasaṃjñā vā rāgaprahāṇasaṃjñā vā doṣasaṃjñā vā doṣaprahāṇasaṃjñā vā mohasaṃjñā vā mohaprahāṇasaṃjñā vā,
S06psp_5u:4262_0: avidyāsaṃjñā vāvidyāprahāṇasaṃjñā vā saṃskārasaṃjñā vā saṃskāraprahāṇasaṃjñā vā vijñānasaṃjñā
S06psp_5u:4262_1: vā vijñānaprahāṇasaṃjñā vā nāmarūpasaṃjñā vā nāmarūpaprahāṇasaṃjñā vā ṣaḍāyatanasaṃjñā
S06psp_5u:4262_2: vā ṣaḍāyatanaprahāṇasaṃjñā vā sparśasaṃjñā vā sparśaprahāṇasaṃjñā vā vedanāsaṃjñā
S06psp_5u:4263_0: tṛṣṇāsaṃjñā vā tṛṣṇāprahāṇasaṃjñā vopādānasaṃjñā vopādānaprahāṇasaṃjñā vā bhavasaṃjñā
S06psp_5u:4263_1: vā bhavaprahāṇasaṃjñā vā jātisaṃjñā vā jātiprahāṇasaṃjñā vā jarāmaraṇasaṃjñā vā jarāmaraṇaprahāṇasaṃjñā vā,
S06psp_5u:4264: śokaparidevasaṃjñā vā śokaparidevaprahāṇasaṃjñā vā duṣkhasaṃjñā vā duṣkhaprahāṇasaṃjñā vā daurmanasyopāyāsasaṃjñā vā daurmanasyopāyāsaprahāṇasaṃjñā vā,
S06psp_5u:4265: duḥkhasaṃjñā vā duḥkhaprahāṇasaṃjñā vā samudayasaṃjñā vā samudayaprahāṇasaṃjñā vā nirodhasaṃjñā vā nirodhaprahāṇasaṃjñā vā mārgasaṃjñā vā mārgaprahāṇasaṃjñā vā,
S06psp_5u:4266: sarvākārajñatāsaṃjñā vā sarvākārajñatāprahāṇasaṃjñā vā sarvavāsanānusaṃdhikleśasaṃjñā vā sarvavāsanānusaṃdhikleśaprahāṇasaṃjñā vā.
S06psp_5u:4268: naitat subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ kvacid dharme bhāvasaṃjñā vābhāvasaṃjñā vā,
S06psp_5u:4269: eṣaiva subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyānulomikī kṣāntir yatra nāsti bhāvasaṃjñā vābhāvasaṃjñā vā,
S06psp_5u:4270: eṣaivāsya mārgabhāvanā yatra nāsti bhāvasaṃjñā nābhāvasaṃjñā,
S06psp_5u:4271: etad evāsya phalaṃ yatra nāsti bhāvasaṃjñā nābhāvasaṃjñā. abhāvaḥ khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mārgaḥ,
S06psp_5u:4275: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat: yadi bhagavann abhāvasvabhāvāḥ sarvadharmāḥ,
S06psp_5u:4277: yeṣām abhisaṃbodhāya sarvadharmeṣu ca vaśavartitā visayavartitā cānuprāptā?
S06psp_5u:4278: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:4279_0: ihāhaṃ subhūte pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ caran ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caran viviktaṃ kāmair
S06psp_5u:4279_1: viviktaṃ pāpakair akuśalair dharmaiḥ savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ prathamaṃ
S06psp_5u:4281: teṣāñ ca dhyānānāṃ dhyānāṅgānāṃ ca nimittam anudgṛhṇaṃs taiś ca dhyānair dhyānāṅgaiś ca na manye,
S06psp_5u:4283: dhyānāni dhyānāṅgāni ca nopalabhe. so 'han tāni catvāri dhyānāny ākāraviśuddhāny upasaṃpadyotsāhaṃ dhyānaṃ vipākaṃ kṛtvā vābhijñājñānasākṣātkriyāyai cittam abhinirṇāmayāmi,
S06psp_5u:4289: so 'han tāsāṃ sākṣātkriyānāṃ nimittam anudgṛhṇaṃs tābhir abhijñābhir na manye,
S06psp_5u:4291: so 'han tāḥ pañcābhijñā ākāśasamāḥ paśyāmi samāpadye,
S06psp_5u:4292: so 'haṃ punaḥ subhūte ekalakṣaṇasamāyuktayā prajñayānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya yāvad idaṃ duṣkhaṃ,
S06psp_5u:4296: daśabhis tathāgatabalaiḥ samanvāgataś caturbhir vaiśāradyaiś catasṛbhiḥ pratisaṃvidbhir aṣṭādaśabhir āveṇikair buddhadharmaiḥ samanvāgataḥ sattvāṃs triṣu rāśiṣu vyākaromi.
S06psp_5u:4297: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:4298: kathaṃ bhagavaṃs tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhenābhāvasvabhāvāni catvāri dhyānāny utpāditāni ṣaḍ abhijñā utpāditāḥ sattvāsattayā ca sattvās triṣu rāśiṣu vyākṛtāḥ?
S06psp_5u:4299: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:4300: sacet subhūte kāmānāṃ vā pāpakānām akuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ svabhāvo vā bhāvo vābhāvo vā bhaviṣyan,
S06psp_5u:4301: nāhaṃ subhūte pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ caran nābhāvasvabhāvān pāpakān akuśalān dharmān viditvā prathamaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya vyahārṣaṃ,
S06psp_5u:4302: yasmāt tarhi subhūte kāmānāṃ svabhāvo vābhāvo vā bhāvo vā nāsti,
S06psp_5u:4303: pāpakānām akuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ svabhāvo vābhāvo vā bhāvo vā nāsty anyatrābhāvasvabhāvāt,
S06psp_5u:4304: tasmād ahaṃ pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ caran viviktaṃ kāmair viviktaṃ pāpakair akuśalair dharmaiḥ savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya vyahārṣaṃ,
S06psp_5u:4305: evaṃ yāvac caturthaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya vyahārṣam. sacet subhūte abhijñānāṃ svabhāvo vābhāvo vā bhāvo vā abhaviṣyan,
S06psp_5u:4306: nāhaṃ subhūte sarvābhijñā abhāvasvabhāvā iti viditvānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsye yāvat sattvāṃs tribhyo rāśibhyo na vyupaśamayiṣye,
S06psp_5u:4307: yasmāt tarhi subhūte sarvābhijñānāṃ svabhāvo vābhāvo vā bhāvo vā nāsty anyatrābhāvasvabhāvāt,
S06psp_5u:4308: tasmāt tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sarvābhijñā abhāvasvabhāvā iti viditvānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhaḥ syāṃ,
S06psp_5u:4314: āryapañcaviṃśatisāhasrikāyāṃ bhagavatyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām abhisamayālaṃkārānusāreṇa saṃśodhitāyāṃ mūrdhābhisamayādhikāraḥ śikṣāpariśuddhiparivartaḥ pañcamaḥ
